ha: Annabawa da manzannin Ubangiji ba suka kasance suna magana da mutane da kalmomi na falsafa ba ne; duk kuwa da cewa akwai bukatar falsafar wajen fahimtar hakikanin abubuwan da suke fadi.

en: If the person who put pages of the Holy Quran on spears really believed in the Book, the Holy Quran asks, "Why are you fighting Imam Ali (a.s.)?"
ha: Don haka idan har wannan mutumin da ya daga Alkur'ani da gaske ne ya yi imani da shi, to Alkur'ani ya fadi cewa da wani dalili ne za ka yi yaki da Ali.

en: Those who have reduced hajj to a religious-tourist trip and have hidden their enmity and malevolence towards the faithful and revolutionary people of Iran under the name of “politicizing hajj”, are themselves small and puny satans who tremble for fear of jeopardizing the interests of the Great Satan, the U.S.
ha: Wadanda suka takaita aikin hajji zuwa wata tafiya ta ziyara da yawon shakatawa sannan kuma suka boye kiyayyar da suke yi da al'ummar Iran muminai ma'abota juyi da sunan "ana kokarin siyasantar da aikin Hajj" su din nan kananan Shaidanu ne kaskantattu da suke tsoro da karkarwa don kada manufofin Babbar Shaidaniya -Amurka- su fada cikin hatsari.

en: There was one point in the statements that the American president made in recent days: he admitted to America's past mistakes.
ha: Akwai wasu batutuwa da ake iya gani cikin maganganun da shugaban Amurka yake yi cikin ‘yan kwanakin nan.

en: One can clearly notice in his lifestyle all the methods that could have been used by a descendant of the Holy Prophet (s.w.a.) to preserve the great legacy of Islam which has been passed down by the Holy Prophet (s.w.a.) and his father as well as their genuine followers. We can clearly see everything in the lifestyle of the Lord of the Martyrs (a.s.) - everything ranging from clarification, to forewarning, to promotion of Islam, to provoking the conscience of prominent figures of his time during a sermon in Mina.
ha: Duk wasu hanyoyin da dan Manzon Allah zai iya amfani da su wajen kiyaye wannan abin gado na Musulunci mai girma - wanda abin gado ne na kakansa da mahaifinsa da mabiya tafarkinsu -Shugaban shahidai ya bi su wajen kare Musulunci; kama daga yin bayani da jan kunne, kama daga kokarin isar da sako, kama daga farkarwa da motsa lamiran mutane na musamman - wato wadanda muke kiransu da zababbun cikin al'umma ko kuma masu fadi a ji - wanda daya daga cikin alamun hakan ita ce wannan huduba ta Mina (da Imam Husaini ya yi).

en: We have certain things in common.
ha: Muna da ayyuka da muka yi tarayya a cikinsu.

en: Later on Allah the Exalted prepared the way for the immigration of the Holy Prophet (s.w.a.) to Medina, and he managed to establish this Islamic system and this civilization in Medina.
ha: Daga baya kuma Allah Madaukakin Sarki ya samar da wani yanayi da ya ba wa Manzon Allah (s.a.w.a) damar yin hijira zuwa garin Madina da kuma samar da irin wannan al'umma da irin wannan ci gaba mai girman gaske.

en: There was not a day when hundreds and thousands of kind and sympathetic messages from people were not showered on the heart and soul of this humble person like the life-giving drops of rain that breathe new life into the heart of a dead person or an infertile piece of land.
ha: Babu wata rana da za ta gushe, ba tare da daruruwa ko kuma ma dubban sakonnin nuna kauna, tamkar ruwan saman da ke sake raya zuciyar duk wani matacce ko kuma wata kasa da ta bushe ba, sun iso gare ni ba.

en: Our Revolution is alive, so it defends itself and it always wins, just as it did in the year 1388.
ha: To amma wannan juyi (na mu) a raye ya ke; a saboda haka ya ke kare kansa, yana ci gaba da samun nasara, babu ja da baya; kamar yadda kuka ga ya faru a shekarar 1388 (2009 bayan zaben shugaban kasar da aka gudanar).

en: His Eminence cited verses from the Holy Quran and said that Imamate can be divided into two different categories. "In one kind of Imamate, a perfect example of which is the leadership of the divine prophets, just leaders lead the people towards the ultimate goal of human life. In the other kind of Imamate, which is exemplified by the leadership of the Pharaoh, the people are lead towards corruption, fire and destruction."
ha: Har ila yau kuma yayin da yake Jagoran ta hanyar dogaro da ayoyin Alkur'ani mai girma ya raba imananci zuwa gida biyu yana mai cewa: A wani wajen annabawan Allah su ne alama ta wannan shugabanci da imamanci, shugabanni ne na adalci wadanda bisa umurni da shiryarwa ta Ubangiji suke shiryar da dan'adam zuwa ga tafarkin da ya dace ya rayu a kanta. A daya nau'in kuma Fir'auna shi ne alamar wannan shugabanci, wanda ya ke jan mutane zuwa ga fasadi da wuta da kuma halaka.

en: There have always been certain people who have tried to apply the poems of Shah Nimatullah Wali to different people in different centuries and I have seen some of these people.
ha: A ko da yaushe an sami wasu mutane da suke jingina wakokin Shah Ni'imatullah Wali - tsawon lokaci sannan kuma a lokuta da dama - ga wasu mutane daban-daban a karnoni daban-daban da suka gabata, wanda ni na ga hakan.

en: Then the Americans tried to preserve the structure of the Egyptian regime.
ha: To amma sun gagara kiyaye wannan tushe don ya ci gaba da amfaninsu.

en: Three decades have passed since the second greatest event in our country - that is to say, the establishment of the Islamic Republic which was the second most important event after the introduction of Islam. The Revolution awakened the world of Islam. It affected the political equations not just in the region, but in the entire world.
ha: A yau kasar mu da al'ummar mu bayan gushewar shekaru talatin na faruwar wannan mafi girman lamari bayan shigowar Musulunci wannan kasa ta mu - wato tsayar da tsarin Musulunci, wanda ya kasance mafi girman lamari - sannan kuma ya janyo hankulan duniyar musulmi ba wai kawai a wannan yankin ba face dai a fagage na siyasa na duniya ya yi tasirinsa sannan kuma alhamdu lillahi al'ummar mu cikin wadannan shekaru talatin sun sami ci gaba masu yawa a bangarori daban-daban, a yau din nan ma akwai bukatar masananmu su sanya idanuwa zuwa ga goben wannan kasar don su ga me ake bukata, sannan kuma me suke so su aikata.

en: I congratulate all my honorable countrymen who live across our dear and vast country, all Iranians who live in different parts of the world and have pinned their hopes on their beloved homeland, the self-sacrificing youth, men, and women who have made great sacrifices for the lofty goals of the Revolution and the country and who have laid down their lives and offered their youth to the Revolution and the glory of the country, the honorable families of our martyrs, our disabled war veterans and their self-sacrificing families, all those who made sacrifices during the war, and those who work and make efforts for the glory of the country on the auspicious occasion of Norouz and the beginning of the new year - which is the beginning of spring and revitalization of nature.
ha: Ina isar da sakon tayar murnar wannan babban idi da kuma sabuwar shekara - wanda mafari ne na wannan lokaci mai kyawun dabi'a - ga dukkanin al'ummar mu masu girma a duk inda suke rayuwa a duk fadin wannan kasar, haka nan kuma ga dukkanin Iraniyawa a duk inda suke a duk fadin duniya wadanda kuma suke da idanuwan fata ga kasarsu mai girma, musamman ma ga matasa, maza da mata daga cikin wadanda suka sadaukar da rayukansu wajen cimma manyan manufofi na juyin juya halin Musulunci da kuma wannan kasar; suka gabatar da rayuwarsu da rayukansu saboda wannan juyi da kuma daukakar kasar nan; haka nan ga iyalan shahidai masu girma, da wadanda suka sami raunuka a wajen yaki da iyalansu masu sadaukarwa, haka nan ga dukkanin masu sadaukarwa da kuma dukkanin wadanda suka ba da himma wajen daukakar wannan kasa da kuma gudanar da ayyukansu.

en: Our youth are making progress in this arena with high morale, and they believe that they can do anything, anything for which the country has the necessary infrastructures.
ha: Matasan mu suna ci gaba da gudanar da wannan aiki cikin karfin gwuiwa, sannan kuma sun yarda da cewa dukkanin wadannan ayyuka wadanda tushe ne na ci gaban wannan kasar lamurra ne da za su iya gudanar da su.

en: Therefore, it is necessary to be careful.
ha: A saboda haka wajibi ne mu lura.

en: It is necessary to be constantly vigilant.
ha: A ra'ayina wajibi ne a dau lamarin samar da sabbin abubuwa da dukkan karfi.

en: Such acts are unheard of in Iran. In the Islamic era and in the Islamic Republic, harassing non-Muslims by Muslims is unheard of.
ha: A Iran dai ba mu da irin wannan yanayin; wato a lokacin Jamhuriyar Musulunci ba a taba samun lokacin da wasu musulmi suka kai hari ga wadanda ba musulmi ba.

en: There are many things that I would like discuss with you dear friends, brothers and youth, but there is not enough time. I hope Allah the Exalted bestows success on you.
ha: Ni dai ina da abin fadi da yawa gare ku 'yanuwa maza da mata masu girma; to amma babu lokaci. ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da ya ba ku dacewa da kuma taimaka muku. Ya Ubangiji Allah!

en: Being pessimistic about one's capabilities is ingratitude to God's blessings, and neglecting help from God and the laws of creation amounts to slipping into the morass of entertaining "evil thoughts about Allah."
ha: Mummunan zato ga irin karfin da ake da shi, kafirce wa ni'imar Ubangiji ne; sannan kuma gafala ce daga taimako na Ubangiji da kuma fadawa cikin tarkon zamiya. "masu zaton mugun zato game da Allah" (Suratul Fath 48:6).

en: Deadly raids of drones on defenseless families in the villages and underprivileged areas of Afghanistan and Pakistan, which have turned weddings into mourning ceremonies on many occasions, the Blackwater crimes in Iraq and the killing of Iraqi civilians and prominent figures, supporting bombers in Iran, Iraq and Pakistan, assassinating nuclear scientists in Iran with the cooperation of MOSSAD, shooting down the Iranian passenger plane in the Persian Gulf and killing around 300 innocent children, men and women - these are examples of this disgraceful and unforgettable trail of crimes.
ha: Hare-haren da jiragen sama marasa matuka na Amurka suke kai wa kan iyalai marasa kariya a kauyuka da garuruwan kasar Afghanistan da Pakistan wadanda a lokuta da dama sun mayar da bukukuwan aure zuwa ga bukukuwa na juyayi, ayyukan ta'addancin kungiyar Black Water a kasar Iraki da kisan gillan da ake yi wa masanan kasar, taimakon kungiyoyi masu dana bama-bamai a kasar Iran da Iraki da Pakistan, kashe masanan fasahar nukiliya a Iran bisa taimakon kungiyar MOSSAD (kungiyar leken asirin haramtacciyar kasar Isra'ila), harbe jirgin fasinja na Iran a Tekun Fasha da kashe kimanin kananan yara dari uku da kuma maza da mata matafiya.....(dukkanin wadannan ayyuka) wani bangare ne na wadannan danyen aiki na su da ba za a taba mancewa da su ba.

en: They label as terrorists the resistance fighters who are defending their legitimate right of countering occupiers and interferers, but they do not recognize as terrorists their evil and mercenary centers which are threatening the life and security of innocent people.
ha: A wajen su 'yan gwagwarmayar da suke amfani da wannan hanya ta gwagwarmaya wajen neman halaltattun hakkokinsu da kuma fada da 'yan mamaya to wadannan 'yan ta'adda ne, to amma ba sa ganin lalatattun 'yan amshin shatansu wadanda suka zamanto annoba ga rayuka da tsaron mutanen da ba su ci ba su sha ba a matsayin 'yan ta'adda.

en: Dear God, make the world of Islam and the Islamic Ummah stronger and more successful on a daily basis.
ha: Ya Ubangiji Allah! Ka kara ba wa al'ummar musulmi karfi da daukaka a kullum.

en: A vigilant look at the scene of domestic conflicts clearly reveals the enemy's hands behind these tragedies.
ha: Dubi da idon basira cikin irin rikice-rikice na cikin gida da ke faruwa a kasashen musulmi, a fili zai iya bayyanar da hannayen makiya cikin hakan.

en: Therefore, books are a valuable phenomenon and a precious entity.
ha: A saboda haka littafi wani lamari ne mai muhimmanci da kuma kimar gaske.

en: And Allah the Exalted will bless their efforts.
ha: Lalle Allah Madaukakin Sarki zai sanya albarka cikin lamarin.

en: They lived a happy life just like other taghuti governments in the world, all in the name of laborers.
ha: Suna rayuwa ta jin dadin tamkar sauran dawagitan duniya; duk dai da sunan ma'aikata.

en: Sometimes they even harass the female family members of the pilgrims. Who are these people?
ha: Wadannan mutane (masu aikata irin wannan danyen aiki) ba ‘yan Shi'a ne ba kuma ‘yan Sunna ba ne.

en: And we had started to believe these things. Instilling a sense of inability - with the purpose of making nations lose faith in their capabilities - is one of the effective ways in which domineering powers spread their domination over different nations.
ha: Kuma wasu sun yarda da hakan. Daya daga cikin makami mai tasiri da makiya suka rika wajen tabbatar da ikonsu a kan sauran al'ummomi, shi ne sanya musu jin cewa ‘ba za su iya ba', don mutane su yanke kauna, su dinga fadin cewa babu wani abin da za mu iya yi.

en: They should promise that they will not prefer the interests of foreigners over the interests of the Iranian nation under different pretexts.
ha: A aikace suna fifita manufofin wadancan mutane sama da manufofin kasa. Lalle wannan kuskure ne.

en: For the first time in the history of revolutions in the world, a Revolution has been carried out that will present itself to the world and will pursue its original principles with all its power. And by Allah's favor, the Revolution will achieve its ultimate goals.
ha: A karon farko cikin tarihin juye-juyen hali daban daban na duniya ne aka samar da wani juyi wanda kuma ya gabatar da kansa ga duniya wanda kuma bai yi watsi da maganganu da akidunsa na farko ba sannan kuma ya ci gaba da riko da su da dukkan karfinsa, kuma da yardar Allah zai kai ga manufarsa ta karshe.

en: Therefore, this movement is an important movement.
ha: A saboda haka, wannan yunkurin wani yunkuri ne mai muhimmanci.

en: Why are they threatening another country with a nuclear attack?
ha: Me ya sa kake barazanar amfani da makaman nukiliya?

en: During the reign of taghut, we had to depend on foreigners even for the smallest elements of production and machinery.
ha: A lokacin dagutu, don samar da komai kashin abubuwan da ake bukata a masana'antu da injuna sai mun bukaci ‘yan kasashen waje.

en: The liberation of Palestine from the savage claws of the Zionists is also a great objective.
ha: Haka nan kuma ‘yantar da Palastinu daga zaluncin sahyoniyawa ma wata manufa ce mai girma.

en: I announced that the opposite was true.
ha: Na gaya musu cewa lalle lamarin sabanin haka ne.

en: As I have pointed out before, the conditions were the conditions of Badr and Khaybar - that is to say, conditions in which we had to accept and overcome challenges and hardships.
ha: Kamar yadda na fadi a wani lokaci a baya, yanayin da muke ciki (a halin yanzu) yanayi ne na Badar da Khaibar; wato yanayi ne na tinkarar kalubale da wahalhalun da suka bijiro da kuma yin galaba a kansu.

en: Unfortunately some people who do not have any evil motives fell into this trap.
ha: Abin bakin cikin shi ne cewa yadda wasu mutane wadanda ake zaton ba su da mummunar manufa su ka fada wannan tarko na su.

en: Shia scholars have influence over Shia Muslims, and Sunni scholars have influence over Sunni Muslims. They should make use of their influence in order to eliminate the common problems.
ha: Malamin Shi'a yana da bakin magana a cikin mutanensa, haka shi ma malamin Sunna yana da bakin magana cikin jama'arsa, su yi amfani da wannan karfi da bakin maganan da suke da shi wajen magance wadannan matsaloli da aka yi tarayya cikinsu.

en: Economic experts unanimously agree that targeted subsidies can resolve this problem. They agree that wasteful and low-yield production can be remedied and a balance can be created between input and output.
ha: Bisa kididdigar masanan tattalin arziki - wanda dukkaninsu sun yi tarayya kan hakan - ana iya gyara hakan ta hanyar aiwatar da wannan shiri na manufantar da irin tallafin da ake bayarwa; hakan zai iya daidaita irin abubuwan da ake samarwa da kuma amfani da shi.

en: This is the appropriate interpretation of guardianship - guardianship of the revolutionary movement and progress.
ha: A saboda haka wannan ita ce ma'anar kariya ta hakika sannan kuma cikakkiyar ma'anarta; kiyaye yunkuri irin na juyi da kuma ci gaba irin na juyi.

en: We seminarians should learn from them. You dear youth should move forward on the basis of such principles.
ha: Wajibi ne mu dalibi mu koyi irin wadannan abubuwa. Wajibi ne ku din nan matasa ku bi wannan tafarkin da kuma ci gaba.

en: Imam Khomeini continued his denunciation of the Shah's programs, issuing a manifesto that also bore the signatures of eight other senior scholars.
ha: Har ila yau Imam Khumaini ya sake bukatar maraja'ai da manyan malaman garin Kum da su zauna don tattaunawa kan halin da ake ciki da kuma yiyuwar sake kaddamar da wani sabon yunkuri.

en: The Conference on Islamic Awakening, the Conference on Palestinian Intifada, the Conference on Disarmament and Non-Proliferation, the World Without Terrorism Conference and the Islamic Awakening and Youth Conference were among the activities which were carried out in Tehran.
ha: Gudanar da tarurrukan farkawa ta Musulunci, taron Palastinu, taron kwance damarar makamai, taron kasa da kasa na duniya ba tare da ayyukan ta'addanci ba, taron matasa da farkawa ta Musulunci, dukkanin wadannan suna daga cikin ayyukan da aka gudanar a Tehran.

en: Security is an essential and vital requirement for all affairs.
ha: Tsaro tushe ne na dukkanin ayyuka.

en: Our young students - who were acting as the first line of defense in the Iranian nation's camp of resistance - courageously captured America's embassy, and those who were in the embassy were taken hostage.
ha: Amma haka matasanmu masu jaruntaka da karfin gwuiwa wanda suka kasance su ne a sahun gaban gwagwarmyar al'ummar Iran suka kama ofishin jakadancin irin wannan Amurkan; suka tsare mutanen da suke wajen.

en: In this bloody event, the evil and criminal hand of prejudiced and misguided Wahhabis - who were supported by foreign espionage organizations - left families and hearts bereaved, hearts that had been enlightened by the light of love and respect for the Holy Prophet's (s.w.a.) household and purified by the light of pure knowledge and monotheism.
ha: A cikin wannan zubar da jinin, hannuwan mabarnata masu laifi, karkatattun masu bakar gaba na wahabiyanci ya fito fili tare kuma da samun taimakon masu son haddasa fitina na kungiyoyin leken asirin kasashen waje. Zukata sun girgiza kuma iyalai sun fada cikin alhini da kuma tafasar zukatansu a cikin kaunar ahlul-Baiti amincin Allah a gare su, kuma zukatan su ka tsarkaka da hasken ilimi da tsarkakken tauhidi.

en: I decided to go there.
ha: Na tafi wajen.

en: This is what I believe.
ha: Wannan shi ne abin da muke fadi; wannan ita ce maganar da muke yi.

en: It is necessary to promote the logical, firm and deep-rooted teachings of Islam, which have been extracted from the Holy Quran, Sunnah and the statements of the infallible Imams (a.s.) - firm and reasonable intellectual principles which are in line with the needs of human beings and human societies.
ha: A yi watsi da maganganu marasa tushe; a yi riko da koyarwar Musulunci karfafa kuma masu tushe da suka samo asali daga Alkur'ani da Sunna da maganganun Ma'asumai (amincin Allah ya tabbata a gare su); dalilai da suka yi daidai da hankali, hankali ya yarda da su sannan kuma suka yi daidai da bukatun dan'adam da kuma al'umma.

en: Today, the communication media have removed the geographical borders. Hence, don't allow them to besiege you within fabricated and mental borders.
ha: A halin yanzu da kafafen sadarwa suka rusa ganuwar kan iyakokin kasashe, kada ku bari a kange ku cikin kirkirarrun kan iyakoki na boge.

en: Our Armed Forces and the Army of the Islamic Republic proved this.
ha: Dakarun mu masu makami, dakarun sojin Jamhuriyar Musulunci masu girma sun tabbatar da hakan.

en: There should be well-defined and appropriate cooperation between mosques and educational centers in all areas.
ha: A yi kokarin kulla alaka tsakanin masallaci da cibiyoyin ilimi na kowane waje gwargwadon yadda aka tsara kuma wanda ya dace.

en: Why?
ha: Saboda me?

en: North African countries, which are unfortunately suffering from deep domestic conflicts today, should pay attention to this responsibility more than other countries. They should pay more attention to the issue of knowing the enemy and its plots and methods.
ha: Wajibi ne kasashen arewacin Afirka, wadanda abin bakin ciki suke fuskantar gagarumar sabani da rikici na cikin gida, su yi la'akari da wannan nauyi mai girman gaske na fahimtar makiya da kuma hanyoyin da suke bi wajen gudanar da ayyukansu.

en: It is necessary to appreciate both Iranian capital and Iranian labor.
ha: Sakamako na jari da aiki shi ne samar da kayayyaki na cikin gida.

en: These days the Horn of Africa and particularly tragedy-hit Somalia are witness to one of the most painful human crises in which drought and famine are threatening the lives of millions of Muslim people of Somalia, especially women and children, in the silence and indifference of international organizations.
ha: A cikin wadannan ranaku yankin kusurwar Afirka musamman kasar Somaliya da take cikin mawuyacin hali yana fuskantar mafi munin bala'in fari da yunwa mai sosa rai sakamakon bayyanar fari a yankin da kin tabuka wani abin a zo a gani da cibiyoyin kasa da kasa suka yi (wajen magance matsalar), hakan ya sanya rayukan miliyoyin musulman kasar Somaliya musamman mata da kananan yara cikin gagarumin hatsari da kuma fuskantar barazana.

en: Elsewhere in his speech, His Eminence referred to "The Year of Economic Jihad" and added: "The enemies are continuing their efforts in cultural, security, political and other areas. Moreover, they have focused their attack against Islam and the Islamic Republic on economy in order to create a rift between the people and the government. Therefore, it is necessary to fight the enemy with all our power, relying on our sincerity, understanding and insight."
ha: A wani bangare na jawabin nasa sannan kuma yayin da yake ishara da shekarar kokarin bunkasa tattalin arziki (sunan da aka ba wa shekara ta bana a Iran), Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya bayyana cewar: A ci gaba da kokarin da makiya suke yi (na cutar da Iran) a fagagen al'adu, tsaro, siyasa da sauran fagage, sun ba da himma kan batun (takunkumin) tattalin arziki a fadan da suke yi da Musulunci da Jamhuriyar Musulunci, da nufin haifar da rikici tsakanin mutane da gwamnati. A saboda haka wajibi a ci gaba da fada da makiyan cikin dogaro da tsarkin zuciya, fahimta da kuma basira.

en: Although there are a number of youth among the students of Qom who come from other cities, the majority of the students who have attended this meeting are from Qom.
ha: Duk da cewa a cikin daliban jami'ar (da suka zo nan) akwai matasan da suka zo daga sauran garuruwa na daban, to amma mafi yawa ko kuma kusan dukkanin (matasan da suke a nan) na garin Kum ne.

en: The socialist view that considers labor and management as enemies is one view of labor. According to another view, which is completely western, management is considered to be in full control of labor, and labor is seen as a simple tool in the hands of management.
ha: Wannan wata mahanga ce, wadda mahanga ce ta gaba da kuma kiyayya tsakanin ma'aikata da wadanda suka dauke su aiki. Mahanga ta daban kuma ita ce mahangar kasashen yammaci wato wanda ma'aikata suke wa aiki, sarki ne a kan ma'aikatansu, shi ne yake da iko a kansu, ma'aikaci wani kayan aiki ne kawai a hannun wadanda suka duke shi aikin.

en: They call this freedom and they call the opposite behavior restriction.
ha: Don haka suka karya wannan garkuwar kana kuma suna ci gaba da karyawar.

en: Unscholarly and undocumented work that is based on fantasies and illusions, rather than valid sources and documents, pushes people away from the state of waiting and prepares the ground for false claimants. It is necessary to seriously avoid such things.
ha: Ayyukan da babu ilimi a cikinsu wadanda kuma ba su dogara da wani tushe na ilimi da inganci ba, abubuwa da suka ginu bisa zato kawai, irin wadannan abubuwa suna nesanta mutane daga hakikanin jiran dako, sannan kuma da samar da fage da kuma dama ga masu da'awar karya; lalle wajibi ne a nesanci hakan.

en: These are two essential characteristics.
ha: Wadannan abubuwa ne na asasi guda biyu.

en: Speaking at the meeting, His Eminence referred to the importance of strengthening political and economic relations between Iran and Iraq, stressing: "The arena of increasing cooperation between Iran and Iraq in different areas is vast and there is no obstacle in the way of developing relations with Iraq and promoting regional cooperation with this country."
ha: A yayin wannan ganawar, Jagoran juyin juya halin Musuluncin ya yi ishara da muhimmancin karfafa alaka ta siyasa da tattalin arziki tsakanin kasashen Iran da Iraki inda ya ce: Lalle akwai fagage masu yawa da za a iya fadada alakar da ke tsakanin kasashen biyu. en: Conversely, they can make them bad-natured and malevolent. They can train their students to be optimistic, self-confident, hopeful, and hardworking, or they can make them hopeless and isolated.

When answering different questions that preoccupied me and other youth at that time, Shahid Motahhari was not like certain so-called religious intellectuals who used to present non-religious concepts as religion.
ha: Dangane da amsa tambayoyi daban-daban da a wancan lokacin suka shagaltar da kwakwalan matasanmu, shahid Mutahhari bai kasance kamar sauran masu ikirarin tunani na addini wadanda suke gabatar da abubuwan da ‘yan kasashen waje suke bukata ta hanyar irin tunaninsu amma da harshe na addini ba; face dai yana gabatar da ma'anoni na hakika na addini wadanda kuma suka dace da lokacin da ake ciki.

en: He was alone. The Imam was alone in his own homeland and hometown, but he resisted with patience.
ha: Imam a kasar su ya zama bako, a garin su ya zama bako; to sai dai ya tsaya kyam.

en: As a result of these conflicts, biased and obstinate people in certain areas in the world behead other people in large numbers. You should be careful about this. Considering the fact that today there is video, Internet and different other means of communication, you should take care not to recite a kind of poem which provokes some biased and dim-witted people - after they hear about your poem - into shedding the blood of a group of innocent women and children.
ha: Idan har aka yi amfani da wake wajen rarraba kan al'umma da yada kabilanci wanda ya sanya a halin yanzu ake samun wasu mutane masu tsananin kabilanci suna kashe mutane a bangarori daban-daban na duniya..., lalle hakan amfani ne mai muni. A saboda haka wajibi ne ku yi taka tsantsan. Kuna iya rera wata waka a nan, to amma a halin yanzu da ake da hanyoyin isar da sakonni irin su bidiyo, internet da sauran kafafen isar da sakon cikin gaggawa, nan take wannan wakar za ta yadu, sai wasu jahilai masu tsaurin ra'ayi su tunzura, jama'a su fada wa junansu, a zubar da jini a nan da can.

en: The dear people of Kurdistan should identify their enemies perceptively, and the security officials of the province should place cracking down on these muharib murderers at the top of their agenda.
ha: Al'ummar lardin Kurdestan dai da kyau sun san makiyansu, sannan kuma (wajibi ne) jami'an tsaron wannan lardin su sanya fada da wadannan masu zubar da jinin mutane a matsayin babban aikin da suka sa a gaba.

en: Leader Meets Teachers - Khamenei.ir
ha: Jagora Ya Gana Da Dubban Malaman Kasar Iran

en: Our efforts should not just be focused on removing the immediate obstacles from our path - this is not a great achievement. We must focus our efforts on reaching the peaks.
ha: Bai kamata himmar ku ta zamanto kawai cewa mu din nan mun sami damar daga wannan dutsen ba - wannan ba wani abu ba ne - wajibi ne himmar mu ta zamanto mun kai ga koluluwa.

en: The hajj should be the manifestation of the willpower and strong determination of the Islamic Ummah against the measures that are aimed at undermining Islamic unity or thwarting the progress of the Islamic Ummah - the measures that are aimed at undermining the flag of Islam, which is thankfully being carried by the Islamic Republic today. We should be alert.
ha: Wajibi ne aikin hajji ya zamanto wata alama ta bayyanar da irin irada da tsayayyiyar azama da al'ummar musulmi suke da ita wajen fuskantar irin wadannan ayyuka wadanda suke cutar da hadin kai tsakanin musulmi, ko kuma suke cutar da irin ci gaban kasashen musulmi, ko kuma suke son su cutar da tutar Musulunci da aka daga ta a tsakanin musulmi wanda a yau alhamdu lillahi Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran ita ce ta daga wannan tutar sama sosai.

en: Today I will take this opportunity to speak about three issues.
ha: A yau a yayin wannan dama da Allah Madaukakin Sarki Ya samar da ita, zan yi magana ne kan wasu batutuwa guda uku.

en: The art of our magnanimous Imam was that he managed to encourage the people to enter the arena.
ha: Babbar fasahar Imamin mu mai girma ita ce ya sami damar shigo da mutane cikin fage.

en: I realized that they were determined and they were saying, "We can. We will do this on our own.
ha: To amma da idanuwana na ga cewa (masananmu) sun yi himma suna fadin cewa lalle za mu iya.

en: More precisely, today Islam is in need of this movement. The movement of the Islamic Republic has had its influence on the world.
ha: Daga nan kuma sai batun tasirin wannan yunkuri cikin dukkanin yunkurin juyin juya halin Musulunci. Hakan shi da kansa zai iya haifar da wannan abin da ake so din.

en: That is to say, you should encourage the youth of the country through interviews and the speeches that you deliver in the media, television and other such things.
ha: Wato a cikin maganganunku da mutane, a fagen zamantakewa da kuma tattaunawar da za ku yi a kafafen watsa labarai, a talabijin da makamantansu, ku kwadaitar da matasan kasar nan.

en: One of the major ways to do this is to raise a family, safeguard the family environment and preserve love in the family.
ha: Haka nan kuma daga cikin mafi muhimmancin hakan shi ne yadda za a kiyaye iyali da tabbatar da so da kauna cikin iyali.

en: The Imam (r.a.) carried out such a great movement in the country, and he paid the price for it.
ha: Irin wannan gagarumin yunkuri ne marigayi Imam ya aiwatar a wannan kasar, sannan kuma ya jure wa dukkanin wahalhalun da suke ciki.

en: Your presence, determination, knowledge, and sincerity can affect the fate and history of the country as well as the future of this nation.
ha: Kasantuwarku, irin iradar da kuke da ita, masaniyarku, da kuma darajar irin ikhlasin da kuke da shi dukkaninsu suna iya taka gagarumar rawa cikin makomar wannan kasar, cikin tarihin kasar nan, cikin makomar wannan al'umma, ba wai kawai makoma ta shekaru goma ko shekaru ashirin ba, makomar shekaru dari da dari biyu na wannan kasar da kuma yin tasiri.

en: The 13th of Aban is the day when students were massacred in the streets of Tehran.
ha: Abin da ya faru shi ne cewa a ranar sha uku ga watan Aban (na shekarar 1978) wasu dalibai ‘yan makaranta sun fito kan wadannan tituna na Tehran.

en: Therefore, I strongly enjoin you to attend to planning, observe fundamental strategies, attract, preserve and train revolutionary and competent forces, show efficient presence in the area of cyberspace, and trust and rely on Allah the Exalted.
ha: A saboda haka ina kara jaddada maka muhimmancin yin tsare-tsare, kiyaye manyan siyasosi na kasa, janyowa, kiyayewa da kuma tarbiyyantar da ma'aikata ma'abota juyin juya hali da kuma aiki tukuru bugu da kari kan yin tasiri a fagagen watsa labarai na zamani, sannan da kuma dogaro da Allah Madaukakin Sarki.

en: In this way, they managed to keep the Iranian nation backwards in politics, science and economic activities as well as in all other arenas of life.
ha: Da hakan ne suka ciyar da al'ummar Iran baya na tsawon shekaru dari a fagagen siyasa, ilimi, tattalin arziki da sauran fagage na rayuwa.

en: The first part of my speech is a brief look at the events that happened in our country in the year 1390 and at the regional and global developments that were related to us.
ha: Batu na farko, dubi ne a gurguje cikin abubuwan da suka faru a gare mu, a kan al'ummarmu da kasarmu da kuma abubuwan da suka shafe mu a fagage na duniya da wannan yankin.

en: There was a day when certain people used to come to our region and determine the destiny of this region through their military presence, but those days are gone.
ha: A halin yanzu dai lokacin da wasu mutane za su zo wannan yankin su tilasta wa al'ummominsa abin da suke so ta hanyar amfani da karfin soji ya wuce.

en: There are events that take place in the country from time to time in which foreigners clearly have a hand. These events do not just happen without anybody being involved. They happen as a result of their medium-term and long-term plans.
ha: Kamar yadda babu yadda za a iya cewa irin abubuwan da a wasu lokuta suke faruwa a kasar nan wadanda 'yan kasashen waje suke da hannu cikinsu, a ce haka kawai suka faru, ba yanzu kawai aka haifar da su ba; sunfaru ne sakamakon wadansu tsare-tsare na karamin lokaci da kuma dogon lokaci da aka yi ne.

en: Leader Meets with Iraqi Prime Minister - Khamenei.ir
ha: Jagora Imam Khamenei Ya Gana Da Firayi Ministan Iraki Nuri Al-Maliki

en: One example is the issue of producing twenty-percent enriched fuel for the research reactor in Tehran, which produces the important radiopharmaceuticals that our country needs.
ha: Misalin hakan shi ne batun samar da makamashin nukiliya kashi ashirin cikin dari da cibiyar bincike ta Tehran take bukata inda ake samar da magunguna masu muhimmanci da kasar nan take bukata.

en: Everybody felt that the Iranian nation was praiseworthy.
ha: Dukkaninsu sun kasance masu jinjinawa al'ummar Iran.

en: The second requirement is to strengthen spirituality and the spirit of religious faith in society.
ha: Na biyu shi ne karfafa ababen da suke kyautata ruhi da imani da kuma kishin addini cikin al'umma.

en: In this regard there is no need to do something that is expensive.
ha: Babu wata bukatar ta gudanar da ayyukan da za a kashe kudade masu yawa.

en: The excellent and detailed report, which was presented by the honorable President, was very informative. There were outstanding points in the report and it is very good if these points are made public so that everybody knows what efforts have been made and what services have been rendered.
ha: Lalle wannan rahoto da mai girma shugaban kasa ya gabatar wani rahoto ne da ya tabo bangarori da yawa. Akwai wadansu batutuwa masu muhimmanci da suke a fili a cikin rahoton, ina ma da a ce wadannan bayanai za su isa ga kunnuwan mutane kowa ya san irin kokari da wahalar da ake sha da kuma irin hidimar da aka yi.

en: Therefore, their behavior is the enemy of humanity.
ha: A saboda haka halayensu suka zamanto masu adawa da bil'adama.

en: It is necessary to have the power to resist and to exercise self-restraint, which makes you prepared.
ha: Wajibi ne ka zamanto kana da karfi na gwagwarmaya da kuma tsayin daka, wajibi ne ka zamanto kana da karfi na kin mika kai.

en: Memorizing the Holy Quran is one of the things that can teach us to reflect on the Holy Quran.
ha: Daya daga cikin abubuwan da za su saukaka mana yin tunani cikin Alkur'ani shi ne haddace Alkur'anin.

en: They help the neighboring countries as much as they can, and when it comes to us, they create as many obstacles as they can.
ha: Suna taimakon kasashen da suke makwabtaka da mu gwargwadon yadda za su iya, to amma daga lokacin da lamarin ya zo bangaren mu sai su yi ta kokarin haifar da gibi cikin hakan.

en: For example, the sanctions known as the "D'Amato-Kennedy Bill" - which were of course not very important and were proposed and followed up in the US Congress by somebody called D'Amato - were passed when the issue of nuclear energy was not even being discussed.
ha: Duk da cewa ba wani takunkumi ne mai muhimmanci ba, to amma dai har yanzu sunansa na nan, wato takunkumi ne da aka fi saninsa da sunan takunkumin "D'Amato" - wanda takunkumi ne da wani mutum ne mai wannan sunan da ya gabatar da shi a majalisar Amurka - wannan takunkumin dai na wani lokaci ne wanda a lokacin babu ma wata maganar nukiliya ma.

en: Currently more than fifty percent of the world's oil flows out of the Persian Gulf and in the future the global flow of oil will depend on three oil-rich countries in the Persian Gulf region.
ha: A wancan lokacin za su dogara ne da man fetur din da yake fitowa daga yankin Tekun Fasha wanda sama da kashi hamsin cikin dari na man duniya yana fitowa ne daga wannan yankin.

en: Through cooperation and relying on the common principles discussed in the Quran and Sunnah, Muslims will be able to stand against this hypocritical fiend and defeat it through their willpower and determination.
ha: Al'ummar musulmi ta hanyar hadin kai da dogaro da tushe da asasin da suka yi tarayya a kansu da suka fito daga cikin Alkur'ani da sunnar (Ma'aiki) za su iya samun karfin da za su iya tsayin daka a gaban irin wannan shaidanci mai fuskoki daban-daban sannan su yi nasara a kansa da kuma tabbatar da imaninsu.

en: Nonetheless, he mentioned a number of mistakes.
ha: To amma dai ya fadi wasu kura-kuran.

en: As the poet Saeb says, during praying some people think about anything except God, and sometimes they remember what they have misplaced.
ha: Kamar yadda (mawakin nan) Sa'ib ya fadi - wanda yanzu dai ba zan iya tuna wakar tasa ba, to amma a dunkule dai yana fadin cewa ne wasu mutane a lokacin salla suna tuna komai in ban da Allah, a wasu lokuta ma har abin da ya bace musu su kan samo shi.

en: In the area relating to security, they tried to undermine our national security and the details have been explained to the people by our government officials in their interviews and speeches.
ha: A fagen tsaro ma sun yi dukkanin abin da za su iya wajen lalata zaman lafiyar kasar nan, wanda jami'an gwamnati sun yi karfin haske kan wadannan abubuwa a hirarrakin da suka yi da kafafen watsa labarai.

en: This is the miracle of the Quranic call and the awareness that the Holy Quran has given us.
ha: Wadannan wasu mu'ujizozi ne na Alkur'ani da kuma labarai da masaniyar da Alkur'ani ya ke ba mu.

en: Whenever I go to the houses of Armenian and Assyrian martyrs - this year too, I fortunately managed to visit the houses of a number of Armenian martyrs - I see that they are committed to their country. They have really behaved in a committed way.
ha: A mafi yawan lokutan da nake kai ziyara gidajen shahidan Kiristocin (Armaniyawa) - wanda alhamdu lillahi a wannan shekarar ma na sami dacewar ziyartar gidajen wasu shahidan kiristocin - na kan ga irin yadda wadannan mutane suke kaunar kasarsu. Wato a hakikanin gaskiya suna jin cewa akwai wani nauyi a kansu dangane da kasarsu.

en: It is necessary to pay attention to this point. The movement should be dignified and logical. If certain people have differences of opinion, they should express their views in a logical way.
ha: Wajibi ne a lura da hakan. Wajibi ne yunkurin mu ya zamanto yunkuri mai karfi da ke cike da hujjoji. Idan har wani yana da wani sabanin ra'ayi, to ya yi bayanin hakan da dalilai.

en: As long as you can breathe easily, you will not understand the importance of this free and plentiful blessing. But when breathing becomes difficult, you will know what a great blessing you have lost.
ha: Har ya zuwa lokacin da mutum yake numfashi ba zai iya fahimtar muhimmancin wannan ni'ima ta kyauta wacce ake samunta a ko ina ba; daga lokacin da aka samu matsalar numfashi, daga nan ne mutum zai iya fahimtar irin gagarumar ni'imar da ya rasa.

en: Their promises must not affect the decisions and actions of outstanding political personalities and the great movement of the people.
ha: Bai kamata a bari alkawurra da kuma barazanar da suke yi su yi tasiri cikin matsaya da kuma ayyuka na siyasa da kuma gagarumin yunkuri na mutane ba.

en: My body is healthy, but my heart and my soul feel a heavy burden because of the considerable amount of kindness and sympathy that was shown to me during this time.
ha: Jiki na dai lafiya, to amma zuciya da ruhina, cike suke da nauyin irin gagarumar so da kauna da tausayawar da aka nuna min tsawon wannan lokaci.

en: When drafting laws and when assigning individuals to different positions, our standard should be Islam.
ha: A wajen kafa dokoki, wajen zaban mutane, Musulunci shi ne mizaninmu.

en: The Leader of the Islamic Revolution referred to the widespread propaganda of the west against Iran and added: "Because the Islamic Republic of Iran has adopted a righteous position and has announced it explicitly, western powers have focused their propaganda attacks on Iran."
ha: Haka nan kuma yayin da yake ishara da gagarumar farfagandar karya da kasashen yammaci suke yi a kan Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran kuwa, Jagoran juyin juya halin Musuluncin cewa ya yi: Daga lokacin da Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran ta fito fili ta bayyana matsayarta da kuma kare hakkokin da take da shi, tun daga nan kasashen yammaci suka fara yada bakar farfagandarsu a kanta.

en: These are important developments.
ha: Wadannan abubuwa ne masu muhimmanci.

en: This progress will bring about happiness in this world and in the hereafter.
ha: Wannan wani yunkuri ne da ke tare da sa'ada ta duniya da lahira.

en: In the areas relating to water, in the areas relating to the natural environment, in the area of stem cell research, in the area of alternative energy, in the area of medicinal herbs and in the area of nuclear energy, our country managed to accomplish great achievements.
ha: A fagen ruwa, da kuma yanayi, a bangaren kwayoyin halitta, sabbin makamashi, a bangaren magunguna na tsirrai, a bangaren makashin nukiliya, kasar nan ta samu nasarori masu girma.

en: In what areas has the country made progress?
ha: Daya daga cikin su shi ne a fagen ilimi da fasaha, wanda mai girma shugaban kasar ya yi ishara da hakan cikin jawabin da ya yi. Mun sami ci gaba a fagen nukiliya, mun sami ci gaba a fagen fasaha ta abubuwan rayuwa, haka nan a fagen fasahar ilimin Nano, haka nan a fagen fasahar makamashi, haka nan a fagen ilimin sararin samaniya da fagen kera na'urori, haka nan a fage mai muhimmanci na ‘ya'yan halittu, haka nan a fagen tagwaita halitta, haka nan a fagen magunguna da sauransu; dukkanin wadannan suna daga cikin ilmummuka na koli na duniya.

en: Of course, the narration needs explanation and one should not limit oneself to the apparent meaning, but it essentially means: if in a system, a community, a country or a society, the system of government is divine and just, those who follow the government will be forgiven by God even if they make certain mistakes.
ha: A takaice dai abin da ake nufi shi ne cewa idan har a wani tsari, ko cikin wata al'umma, ko wata kasa ko wata kungiya, idan ya zamanto tsarin da ke iko tsari ne na Ubangiji, tsari ne da ake gudanar da adalci a cikinsa, to mutanen da suke biyayya ga wannan tsarin za su sami afuwa ta Ubangiji, ko da kuwa sun aikata wasu 'yan kura-kurai.

en: He admitted to two, three mistakes, but he did not mention tens of others.
ha: Ya fadi abubuwa guda biyu zuwa uku ne, amma bai fadi wasu gomomin (kurakuren) da suka yi ba.

en: Lack of sincerity shows its effects one way or another.
ha: A wani waje dai rashin ikhlasi zai bayyanar da kansa.

en: Leader's Address to Teachers - Khamenei.ir The following is the full text of the speech delivered on May 5, 2010 by Ayatollah Khamenei the Leader of the Islamic Revolution to a large group of teachers from across the country.
ha: Shimfida: A ranar laraba (5, Mayu, 2010) ne Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei ya gana da dubban malaman makarantu na kasar Iran wadanda suka kawo masa ziyarar ban girma don tunawa da Ranar Malamai Ta Kasar Iran (ranar shahadar Ayatullah Shahid Murtaza Mutahhari).

en: What I want to tell you is that eulogy increases knowledge and understanding.
ha: Abin da nake son gaya muku, shi ne cewa: Yabon Ahlulbaiti wani lamari ne da ke kara masaniya.

en: That is to say, none of these statements and opinions will be ignored.
ha: Wato babu ko guda daga cikin wadannan abubuwa da zai tafi haka nan kawai.

en: The Leader of the Islamic Revolution referred to a number of events which took place in the year 1388, saying: "In that year, if those individuals who inflicted a loss on the country and the people and those who imposed unnecessary expenses on the country had observed the law, that situation would not have been brought about.
ha: Jagoran ya yi ishara da wasu ayyuka da aka yi wajen fayyace shakkun da wasu suka gabatar dangane da sakamakon zaben shekara ta 2009 inda ya ce: Mutanen da suka cutar da kasar nan da kuma al'ummar Iran (bayan zaben), sun yi hakan ne saboda rashin yarda da doka da kuma bin hanyar da doka ta tanadar ne, koda ya ke tsarin Musulunci yayi nasara sakamakon irin yadda ya fahimci yanayin al'ummar kasar nan.

en: Naturally, as a consequence, the opposing camp is defeated.
ha: To a fili yake cewa sakamakon hakan shi ne cewa sansanin 'yan adawa zai sha kashi.

en: If there is sincerity, our duties will be carried out successfully.
ha: Matukar dai muka zamanto muna da ikhlasi, to kuwa ayyukanmu za su ci gaba.

en: The greatest asset that a youth has is his pure and enlightened heart.
ha: Mafi girman jarin matashi shi ne wannan zuciya mai tsarki da yake da ita.

en: Dear brothers and sisters, welcome!
ha: Ina muku barka da zuwa ‘yan'uwa maza da mata masu girma!

en: Having realized the importance of this region, the belligerent and hegemonic powers decided to completely dominate this rich part of the Persian Gulf region during a certain historical stage.
ha: A wani lokaci a baya ma'abota girman kai da masu wuce gona da iri da mulkin mallaka sun so su kwace wannan yanki mai matukar muhimmanci a duniya da mamaye wannan waje mai arziki na Tekun Fasha su mai she shi cikin ikonsu.

en: They had other plans as well, but God did not give them time and they were defeated.
ha: Akwai wadansu abubuwan ma da suke son aikatawa, to amma dai Allah Madaukakin Sarki bai ba su dama ba inda suka sha kashi.

en: Allah the Exalted says: "And the end is for the God-fearing." [The Holy Quran, 7: 128] If we practice fear of God as a principle in our actions, there is no doubt that ultimate victory will belong to the Islamic Ummah.
ha: Allah Madaukakin Sarki Yana fadin cewa: "Kuma makoma (mai kyau) ta masu takawa ce" (Suratul A'arafi 7:128). Idan har muka sanya wannan tsoron Allah ya zamanto tafarkin aikin mu, to kuwa makoma da sakamako mai kyau n al'ummar musulmi ne.

en: However, different services are being offered in different parts of the country, including remote towns and villages.
ha: To amma a yau din nan kan ana ci gaba da yin hidima daban-daban a duk fadin kasar nan, a garuruwan da suke nesa da kuma kauyuka daban-daban.

en: As Iranians and a Muslim nation, we have had a fundamental, deep and long-lasting relationship with books.
ha: Mu din nan a matsayin mu na al'ummar Iran, a matsayin mu na wata al'umma ta musulmi, alakar mu da littafi wata alaka ce da ke da tushe sannan kuma mai tsawon tarihi.

en: I had seen them on different occasions and in different places.
ha: Na ga hakan a lokuta da wajaje daban-daban.

en: He added: "Although the history of Islam went off in a different direction, this standard and this auspicious thought remained in history until it was finally fulfilled in another part of the world thanks to the faith and resistance of Imam Khomeini (r.a.) and the Iranian nation. And by Allah's grace, it will be promoted in the entire world of Islam on a daily basis."
ha: Jagoran ya bayyana nada magajin Annabi bisa umurnin Allah a waki'ar Ghadir a matsayin lamari ne da ke nuni da ci gaban wannan tafarki (na annabawa) yana mai cewa: Duk kuwa da cewa tarihin Musulunci ya kama wata hanyar ce ta daban to amma wannan tafarki da wannan tunani da ke cike da sa'ada ya ci gaba da wanzuwa tsawon tarihi har zuwa lokacin da ya tabbata a wannan yanki na duniya albarkacin imani da tsayin dakan Imam Khumaini da al'ummar Iran, sannan kuma cikin yardar Allah a ko da yaushe sai dada karuwa a duk fadin duniyar musulmi.

en: In any case the Ground Forces are important.
ha: Ala kulli hal dakarun sojin kasa, dakaru ne masu muhimmanci.

en: The names of outstanding leaders and personalities - such as Sayyid Jamal ad-Din, Muhammad Abduh, Mirza-e Shirazi, Akhund-e Khorasani, Mahmoud al-Hassan, Muhammad Ali, Sheikh Fazlollah, Hajj Agha Noorullah, Abul A'la Maududi and tens of famous, great, mujahid and and influential clerics from Iran, Egypt, India and Iraq - have been recorded in history books forever.
ha: Ko shakka babu sunayen jagorori da fitattun mutane irin su Sayyid Jamaluddeen da Muhammad Abdu da Mirza Shirazi da Akhund Khorasani da Mahmud Al-Hasan da Muhammad Ali da Sheikh Fadhlullah da Hajj Agha Nurullah da Abul A'ala Maududi da sauran fitattun malamai da mujahidai da yawa da suka fito daga kasashen Iran da Masar da Ingiya da Iraki, sun shiga cikin tarihi.

en: Of course America's population was not more than 4, 5 million at that time.
ha: Ko da yake a wancan lokacin mutanen Amurkan ba su wuce mutane miliyan hudu zuwa biyar ba.

en: Of course, this is alright with us. Their domestic problems force them into blustering. They claim that they have dragged Iran towards the negotiating table, that they have made Iran surrender, that they have obtained such and such concessions from our country and other such claims.
ha: Matsalolinsu na cikin gida ne ya ke tilasta musu suke ta fadin irin wadannan maganganun cewa, eh lalle mun tilasta wa Iran zama teburin tattaunawa, mun tilasta wa Iran mika kai, mun hana Iran mallakar makaman nukiliya, mun karbi kaza a wajen Iran, da dai sauran irin wadannan maganganun.

en: You dear youth can study these realties carefully in the recent history of the country.
ha: Ku din nan kuna iya ganin hakan cikin tarihin kasar ku na ‘yan shekarun baya-bayan nan.

en: For several centuries, our country has suffered great losses and backwardness. Lack of care has caused irreparable damage. And today this situation is what we are left with.
ha: Kasar mu tsawon karnoni ta fuskanci hasara mai girman gaske, ta fuskanci matsalar koma baya mai girma, ta fuskanci gafalar da ba za a iya cike gurbin hakan ba; wannan shi ne abin da a yau muke gani.

en: Here, the appointment of the Commander of the Faithful (a.s.) was not confined to spiritual aspects.
ha: (Yana da kyau a fahimci cewa) Nada Amirul Muminin (a.s) da aka yi a nan, ba wai kawai nadi ne da ya shafi bangare na ruhi da kusaci da Allah ba ne.

en: Before the Revolution, the population of university graduates in Kermanshah province was around three hundred.
ha: Kafin nasarar juyin juya halin Musulunci, a dukkanin wannan lardi na Kermanshah, mai yiyuwa wadanda suka yi karatun jami'a ba su wuce dari uku ba.

en: This is true of everything else in the world, including natural phenomena as well as political, historical, and economic matters.
ha: Haka lamarin ya kasance cikin dukkanin lamurran da suka shafi duniya; kama daga lamurra na dabi'a, har zuwa ga na siyasa, zuwa ga lamurra na tarihi, tattalin arziki da ma wadanda ba na tattalin arizikin ba.

en: The same is true of building systems.
ha: To haka lamarin yake dangane da batun samar da cibiyoyi ma.

en: His Eminence referred to the efforts made by foreign media to magnify certain disagreements among Iran's government officials and stressed that the statements of government officials must not suggest that there is discord among them. He added that if there are any disagreements, government officials must not reveal their dissatisfaction to the people and give foreign media a pretext to broadcast negative propaganda against the Islamic Republic.
ha: Haka nan kuma yayin da yake ishara da kokarin kafafen watsa labaran kasashen waje wajen kambama wasu daga cikin sabanin ra'ayi da ake samu tsakanin jami'ai, Jagoran cewa ya yi: Bai kamata a fahimci sabani da rikici cikin maganganu da rubuce-rubucenmu ba, idan ma har akwai sabanin ra'ayin, to bai kamata a gabatar da shi a gaban mutane ba don kada a ba wa kafafen watsa labaran kasashen waje dama.

en: Adopting an ijtihadi and scholarly outlook on different areas - ranging from humanities to the system of formal education, from economy and banking to technical and technological production, from modern media to art and cinema and to international relations and other areas - are all among the requirements for this civilization-building.
ha: Daga cikin laziman wannan gini na ci gaba har da dubi irin na ilimi da kwarewa cikin fagage daban-daban, kama daga ilmummuka zuwa ga tsarin koyarwa da tarbiyya, haka nan kuma daga tattalin arziki da ayyukan bankuna zuwa ga samar da kayayyakin da ake bukata da kuma fasaha, haka nan kuma daga kafafen watsa labarai na zamani har zuwa ga fasaha da fina-finai da kuma alaka ta kasa da kasa da sauransu.

en: Ayatollah Khamenei, the Supreme Leader of the Islamic Revolution, met Sunday afternoon with navy commanders and officials of the Islamic Republic of Iran Army on the occasion of Navy Day.
ha: Da hantsin yau Lahadi (27-11-2016) ne Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei ya gana da manyan kwamandoji da jami'an sojin ruwa na kasar Iran inda ya bayyana jin dadinsa dangane da irin gagarumin ci gaban da sojin ruwan suka samu a bangarori daban-daban.

en: Another positive point is that there is stability in the country in spite of all these plots and machinations.
ha: Wani lamarin kuma wanda ya ke a fili shi ne lamarin tabbaci da kwanciyar hankali da ake da shi a kasar nan; duk kuwa da irin makirce-makirce da dasisar da ake kullawa.

en: A few years ago in my speech on the first day of Farvardin, I said here at Ali ibn Musa ar-Ridha's (a.s.) shrine that you [Americans] should be careful, that your proclaimed affection and friendship should not mean that you are wearing a velvet glove over an iron fist, pretending that you are our friends while being hostile in your hearts.
ha: A ‘yan shekarun da suka gabata a wannan wajen, a hubbaren Imam Ali bn Musa al-Ridha (a.s) a irin wannan jawabi na farkon shekara na fadi cewa ku yi taka tsantsan kada wannan nuna so da kauna da kuke yi ya zamanto kun boye wani gatari ne cikin tsumma, kuna son ku dinga nuna abokantaka, to amma a badini kuna cutarwa.

en: I hope that He bestows enthusiasm and dynamism on our youth. I hope that He bestows firm determination and willpower on our men and women so that they can take glorious paths. I hope that He bestows happiness and health on our children and I hope that He bestows security, kindness and compassion on our families.
ha: Haka nan kuma ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da ya ba wa matasanmu karfin gwiwa da aiki tukuru, sannan mazaje da matayenmu kuma ya ba su himma da irada da karfafaffiyar azama wacce ta dace don shiga cikin fagage da hanyoyin da suke cike da nasarori da ababen alfahari; ya ba wa yaranmu farin ciki da lafiya; sannan ya ba wa iyalanmu tsaro da soyayya da tausayawa.

en: The large scale of this destructive tragedy has made it extremely difficult to provide aid.
ha: Fadaduwar wannan bala'i mai tada hankali ya sanya hatta kai agaji ya zamanto yana fuskantar matsalolin gaske.

en: There are a lot of things to be done.
ha: Akwai ayyuka masu yawa da wajibi ne a aikata su.

en: If your intentions are divine, your efforts will be jihad in the way of God. When a person makes efforts to promote justice and Islam and to bring about glory for the Islamic Ummah and the faithful people of Iran, his efforts are jihad in the way of God.
ha: Idan har niyya ta zamanto ta Ubangiji, to jihadi (kokarin) ya kan zama jihadi saboda Allah. A lokacin da mutum ya yi kokari saboda daukaka kalmar gaskiya, saboda daukaka kalmar Musulunci, saboda samar da daukaka ga al'ummar musulmi da kuma al'ummar Iran masu imani, to wannan jihadi (kokari) ya kan zama jihadi saboda Allah.

en: It went through a fitna. This does not just mean that everybody has realized the Iranian nation is powerful. Rather, what is more important is that our nation entered a new situation after this movement was carried out with this level of capability, the capability to deal with fitna and hardships.
ha: Ma'anar hakan ba ita ce kawai cewa dukkanin duniya sun fahimci cewa al'ummar Iran al'umma ma'abociyar karfi ba; face ma'anar da ta fi wannan muhimmanci ita ce cewa ta hanyar wannan yunkurin, da irin wannan karfi da ta nuna na iya tsallake wannan fitinar, wannan al'umma ta kai ga wani sabon yanayi ne; ta sami wani sabon karfi ne a tattare da ita.

en: Therefore, the greatness of the Iranian nation is due to its faith.
ha: A saboda haka daukakar da al'ummar Iran ta samu ta samo asali daga hakan.

en: Second: knowing the enemy and confronting his plans and methods.
ha: Na biyu: Fahimtar makiyi da kuma fada da makirce-makircensa.

en: And the conditions of the world are also unprecedented. The big economic crisis which has plagued western arrogant powers is an extraordinary event and we cannot afford to treat it superficially.
ha: Irin matsalar tattalin arzikin da ta yi wa gwamnatocin ma'abota girman kai na kasashen yammaci sannan take ci gaba da makure su wani lamari ne mai girman gaske; sannan kuma wani lamari ne wanda ba cikin sauki haka kawai za a wuce shi ba.

en: According to a narration, daily prayers are like a spring in your home in which you bathe five times a day.
ha: Ana fadin cewa salla tamkar idon ruwa ne da ke gidanku, wanda a kowace rana kuke wanka a cikinsa sau biyar.

en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
ha: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai

en: When people are twenty years old, they think that they have a long time before they reach the age of seventy.
ha: A lokacin da mutum ya ke shekaru ashirin-talatin yana zaton cewa ai akwai lokaci kafin kai wa ga shekaru saba'in.

en: His Eminence stated that the philosophy behind continued divine tests is to help individuals and nations achieve a higher level of growth and transcendence. He reiterated that any individual and people who go through divine tests and hardships will get one step closer to their ultimate destination.
ha: Jagoran ya bayyana cewa falsafar da ke cikin jarrabawa daban-daban na Ubangiji ita ce mutane da kuma al'ummomi su sami nasarar isa ga sabin matsayi na shiriya ta Ubangiji da kuma daukaka yana mai cewa: Duk wani mutum ko kuma al'ummar da ta sami nasarar tsallake ramukan jarrabawa da wahalhalu masu tsanani, to kuwa cikin yardar Allah ta sami nasarar kai wag a wani matsayi na samun daukakarka da kuma kusatan hakan.

en: It is exactly in such conditions that our determination- which is based on faith, reliance on God, foresight and wisdom- can help Muslim nations achieve victory against these challenges and bring about a dignified and honorable fate for Muslims.
ha: A irin wannan yanayin kuwa, azama da iradar da ta ginu bisa imani da dogaro da Allah da basira da tunani, su ne za su iya ‘yantar da al'ummar musulmi daga kalubalen da suke fuskanta da kuma samar musu da daukaka da mutumci.

en: The issue is not why Muslims do not have any freedom in many of these countries. Rather, the issue is why they do not have any security.
ha: Maganar ba ita ce cewa me ya sa musulmi ba su da ‘yancin da ya zama wajibi su kasance suna da shi a mafi yawa daga cikin wadannan kasashen ba; face dai maganar ita ce me ya ba a ba su tsaron da ya kamata.

en: Based on this view our hearts beat for mosques and are filled with enthusiasm and sense of responsibility.
ha: Wannan mahanga ce ta sanya zukatanmu suke kaunar masallaci sannan kuma suke cike da shauki da kuma jin nauyi.

en: Who is the enemy?
ha: Wane ne makiyi?

en: It is necessary to evaluate oneself and then reduce one's sins one by one.
ha: Wajibi ne mutum ya yi hisabi wa kansa, daga nan sai ya dinga rage wadannan zunuban daya bayan daya.

en: What are the difficulties? The answer is, "Allah is sufficient to take account."
ha: Amsar hakan dai shi ne cewa: "Kuma Allah Ya isa Ya zama Mai hisabi"; kada su mance da Allah, Allah yana da hisabi.
(Suratul A'araf 7:128)

en: It is 30 years now that the Iranian nation has been resisting in the face of various storms, and this Revolution has become stronger.
ha: Shekaru talatin kenan da guguwa daban-daban suke zuwa su kuma wuce, amma wannan al'umma tana nan tsaye kyam, wannan juyi kuma ya kara karfi.

en: Allah the Exalted ordained that what happens should be the opposite of what they had planned and implemented against us.
ha: Allah Madaukakin Sarki Ya kaddara akasin abin da suka tsara kan Iran ne, sannan kuma sun gagara cimma abin da suke so.

en: They should both be careful and just.
ha: Su zamanto masu lura sosai sannan kuma su zamanto masu adalci.

en: Commitment to the principles and values that form the foundation of the Revolution are very important.
ha: Riko da koyarwa da tushen da aka gina juyin juya halin Musulunci a kansa, lamari ne mai matukar muhimmanci.

en: I would like to extend my congratulations to the dear graduates and the faithful youth who have finished their dignified studies and will start their services as members of the Islamic Republic of Iran's Armed Forces and the honorable Army of the Islamic Republic.
ha: Ina taya dalibai masu girma da matasa muminai wadanda suka gama karatunsu sannan kuma daga yau za su fara yin hidimarsu cikin dakaru masu makami da sojojin jamhuriyar Musulunci murnar wannan nasara da suka samu.

en: Many pilgrims from different countries take part in hajj ceremonies.
ha: Da farko dai a wancan wajen da dama daga cikin alhazan kasashe daban-daban suna zuwa.

en: Even in the case of the threats which are directly posed by the enemy, if are harmed, it is our own fault.
ha: Kai hatta cikin wadannan barazana da makiya suke yi mana kai tsaye, to idan har mun sha kashi to hakan ya samo asali ne daga gazawar da muka nuna.

en: For the sake of raising the flag of our independence as an Islamic country, everybody must be ready to fight to death and this death is called martyrdom.
ha: Kowa ya yi shirin sadaukar da ransa don tabbatar da 'yancin kasa - wadda kasa ce ta Musulunci - wanda wannan mutuwar sunanta shahada.

en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful

en: Therefore, economic jihad means the Iranian nation's persistent, comprehensive and purposeful movement with the intention of rendering the aggressive and spiteful efforts of the enemy ineffective.
ha: A saboda haka jihadi na tattalin arziki yana nufin yunkuri da ake ci gaba da yinsa wanda kuma ya kame ko ina na al'ummar Iran da manufar kashe wutar kiyayyar makiya.

en: Of course you are living in a foreign country now. Although you should feel at home here, you are away from your relatives, friends and family.
ha: Ko da yake ku din nan kuna rayuwa cikin bakunta ne, duk kuwa da cewa wannan waje gidanku ne, amma dai kun yi nisa da iyalanku da danginku.

en: Therefore, there is no loss on this path.
ha: A saboda haka babu wata cutuwa a nan.

en: They come to suffer from stagnation and deviation, in which case the transformation fails to benefit the people the way it should, but the damage that has been caused by the transformation remains for the people and it is not possible to make up for the damage.
ha: Daya daga cikin wadannan yanayi guda biyu ne dai zai bayyana: ko dai a lokacin da wannan al'umma ta samar da wannan sauyi, ya zamana al'ummomi masu zuwa su ci gaba da bin diddiginsa, su ci gaba da binsa da kammala shi da kuma ci gaba da riko da shi.

en: In every remote town, there are one, two, five and sometimes ten universities.
ha: A kowane gari da ke nesa a kan sami jami'a guda, a wani wajen ma biyu, biyar, kai wani wajen ma goma.

en: Of course the efforts have increased today. The propaganda efforts have increased because the current government officials are shouting the slogans of the Revolution more seriously, because the path of the Imam, the path of the Revolution and the path of rendering services for the people are more prominent today, because our government officials are populist and the people can feel this.
ha: Makiya tsawon wadannan shekaru talatin sun kasance masu wannan kokarin; ko da yake a yau lamarin ya fi kamari. A yau saboda jami'an kasa da gwamnatin da take ci a yanzu suna gabatar da taken juyin juya halin Musulunci da kuma riko da su; da kuma sanya taken Imam da tafarkin juyi a matsayin tafarkin da suka sa a gaba, don haka a yau lamarin ya fi fitowa fili da kara kaimi.

en: In the late 1950s and early 1960s a leftist revolutionary movement was started in North African countries - namely, Egypt, Libya, Sudan and Tunisia.
ha: A karshe-karhsen shekarun 1950 da kuma farko-farkon shekarun 1960 a kasashen arewacin Afrika - wato Masar da Libiya da Sudan da Tunusiya - an samu faruwar wasu juyin juya hali masu akidar gurguzu.

en: We are aware of our weak points. We have our own weak points, but in general, our strengths are far more than our weak points.
ha: Ba wai ba mu da bangarori na rauni ba ne, lalle muna da bangarori na rauni; to amma a yanayi na gaba daya bangaren karfin da muke da shi da kuma irin nasarorin da muka samu sun fi bangarorin raunin yawa.

en: The vanguard and the elite of the uprisings should place their trust in Almighty God and with reliance on His promise of help, adorn the new chapter in the history of the Islamic Ummah with their lasting achievements, thus earning God's approval and fulfilling the prerequisites of His help.
ha: Wajibi ne zababbun cikin al'umma da jagororin wadannan yunkuri su dogara da Allah Madaukakin Sarki da kuma alkawarin taimakonsa, su kuma kawata sabon shafi na tarihin al'ummar musulmi da aka bude da dawwamammun ababen alfaharinsu, wanda zai sa a sami yardar Allah da share fagen taimakonsa.

en: This re-acquaintance with ourselves helps us Muslims to realize the position we deserve in today’s and tomorrow’s world and helps us move towards it.
ha: Irin wannan masaniya za ta taimaka wa musulmi su kai ga matsayin da ya dace da su a wannan duniya ta yau da kuma gobe sannan kuma su yunkura a bisa wannan tafarkin.

en: The government officials in the judiciary and the Majlis, the clergy and those who are in the military or different other organizations should know that what is necessary is to identify our obligations and work hard to fulfill our obligations: we must not let other considerations affect our work.
ha: Lalle haka lamarin yake. A hakikanin gaskiya a lokacin da mutum ya kalli irin yawan aikin da aka aikata daga kurkusa da kuma irin kayan aikin da ake da shi da kuma wahalar da ke cikin aikin, to ko shakka babu zai jinjinawa wadannan mutane daga cikin zuciyarsa.

en: Your goal is a great goal, and your responsibility is extremely heavy.
ha: Aiki ne mai girma, manufa ce mai girman gaske, sannan kuma nauyi ne mai tsananin girma.

en: And nurses have a very prominent role in this regard.
ha: Gudummawar malaman jiyya a wannan fagen kuwa, gudummawa ce mai girman gaske.

en: These deceptive hands undoubtedly take advantage of the ignorance, prejudice and superficiality that exists in our societies and they add fuel to the fire.
ha: Ko shakka babu wadannan hannaye masu zubar da jini, suna amfana ne da irin jahilci da bakar aniya da karancin fahimta da ke a tsakaninmu, sannan kuma suke amfani da hakan wajen ruruta wannan wutar.

en: What is this roadmap?
ha: Mece ce taswirar hanyarmu?

en: Leader’s Speech to Shia and Sunni Clergy in Kermanshah - Khamenei.ir
ha: Jawabin Jagora Yayin Ganawa Da Malaman Shi'a Da Ahlussunna Na Kermanshah

en: The movement of the Iranian nation in all arenas is unstoppable.
ha: Yunkurin al'ummar Iran a dukkanin fagage ba lamari ne da za a iya dakatar da shi ba, da yardar Allah kuma za a ci gaba da tafiya a kan wannan mikakken tafarki na Ubangiji da Musulunci da Alkur'ani.

en: All praise is due to Allah, the Lord of the Worlds, and peace and greetings be upon our Master and Prophet, Ab-al-Qassem al-Mustafa Muhammad, upon his immaculate, pure, chosen, guided and infallible household, especially the one remaining with Allah on earth.
ha: Dukkan godiya ta tabbata ga Allah Ubangijin talikai. Tsira da amincin Allah su tabbata ga shugabanmu kuma Annabinmu Abul Kasim al-Mustafa Muhammad tare da Iyalansa tsarkaka, zababbu shiryayyu kuma masu shiryarwa, musamman ma Wanzajjen Allah a bayan kasa (Imam Mahdi).

en: The statements that students used to make at that time were the same statements that you make today. Of course today the comments are more calculated and well-informed.
ha: Abubuwan da muke fadi a wancan lokacin da kuma wadanda daliban jami'an suke fadi, su ne dai wadannan kalmomin; ko da ya ke a yau sun balaga da kuma kara zama wadanda suka dace da ilimi da kwarewa.

en: I do not think you remember Nimeiry.
ha: Ina tsammanin ba za ku iya tuna (Ja'afar) Numeiri.

en: They are our youth, students and young seminarians.
ha: Su ne dai wadannan matasa, daliban jami'a, daliban makarantu da kuma daliban makarantun addini.

en: Therefore, the event that is happening is an extraordinary event, and it is in its early stages. As government officials of the Islamic Republic, we have responsibilities to fulfill. We should pay attention to these responsibilities and not let this historical stage pass us by.
ha: Har ya zuwa yanzu dai lamarin yana matakinsa na farko-farko ne. To mu din nan a matsayin mu na Jamhuriyar Musulunci, sannan kuma mu 'yan wannan adadi da muka taru a nan a matsayin mu na jami'an Jamhuriyar Musulunci haka nan kuma sauran jami'ai, lalle muna da wani nauyi a wuyanmu. Wajibi ne mu lura da wadannan nauyin sannan kuma kada mu yi watsi da wannan yanayi da ake ciki cikin sauki.

en: Eulogy sows the seeds of knowledge and understanding, acumen, hope and firm beliefs.
ha: Yabon Ahlulbaiti wani lamari ne da ke yada hikima da fata da tsayayyiyar akida.

en: It revealed what lies behind the hand of friendship extended towards the Iranian nation. Their fox-like rhetoric became wolfish. Until now they were saying that they were willing to extend a hand of friendship.
ha: Ya zuwa yanzu dai suna cewa mu dai muna mika hannayen abokantaka, mu dai kaza da kaza; to amma a halin yanzu lamarin ya fito fili dangane da abin da ke boye a bayan wadannan maganganu.

en: You see, this was where they were deceived.
ha: Ku duba ku gani a nan ne suka fada tarkon yaudara; sun fada wannan tarkon ne saboda ba su kalli abin da ke karkashin wannan magana ba.

en: Life in exile Imam Khomeini spent over 14 years in exile, mostly in the holy city of Najaf in Iraq.
ha: Da hantsin wannan rana, jami'an tsaron SABAK, cikin jaridun kasar, sun sanar da koran Imam saboda zargin barazana ga tsaron kasa.

en: If humanity had more knowledge, if humanity enjoyed a deeper understanding, if humanity knew the Prophet (s.w.a.), if humanity was familiar with Islam, if humanity knew the message of Islam, today the scene of history would be a different scene. The ignorance of human beings and their short-sightedness have made them fall behind.
ha: Idan har da dan'adam yana da masaniya sosai, sannan kuma ya fahimci Manzon Allah da kuma Musulunci sosai haka nan kuma ya fahimci sakon da ya zo da shi, to kuwa da rayuwar bil'adama, ta zamanto wata rayuwa ta daban (wato da ta sauya). Irin jahilcin da mu mutane muke da shi da kuma irin rashin hangen nesan mu, su ne suka mai she mu baya.

en: Have you not seen those who have changed Allah's favor for ungratefulness and made their people to alight into the abode of perdition [The Holy Quran, 14: 28].

en: A look at the statements of Imam Khomeini (r.a.) and the main documents of the Revolution would reveal that the goals were rooted in Islamic texts.
ha: A lokacin da mutum ya dubi maganganun Imam (yardar Allah ta tabbata a gare shi) da kuma sauran takardu da bayanai na asalin juyin, zai ga cewa dukkanin wadannan abubuwa sun samo asali ne daga Musulunci.

en: Congregational prayers in the mosque with other believers, is taking part in a divine celebration and this makes the rain of divine mercy heavier and more pleasing.

en: The hajj should be viewed as a blessing and a great divine opportunity.

en: This was the characteristic of that great man.
ha: Wannan ita ce siffar wannan babban mutum.

ha: Ya Allah ka yi dadin tsira a gar eta ga mahaifinta da mijinta da 'ya'yanta.

en: They were replaced by officials who had been elected by the people.
ha: Aka sauya su da jami'ai da jama'a suka zabe su.

en: The motivation of our young and thinking students is very important for the country.

en: Today the country is clearly moving towards obtaining knowledge in many areas, especially in newly-established and highly advanced fields.

en: This and many other Quranic verses reject the wrong and misguided idea that faith minus action and jihad is enough to get close to God.

en: I hope the new year will be auspicious and enjoyable for all of you and the entire Iranian nation.
ha: Ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da ya sanya wannan sabuwar shekara mai cike da albarka da faranta rai a gare ku da kuma dukkanin al'ummar Iran.

en: I extend my greetings and congratulations to all of you.

en: The following is the full text of the speech delivered on October 12, 2011 by Ayatollah Khamenei the Leader of the Islamic Revolution in a meeting with Shia and Sunni clergy in the city of Kermanshah.
ha: Shimfida: A ranar farko ta ziyarar da ya ke yi a lardin Kermanshah, Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya gana da malaman Shi'a da Ahlussunna na lardin Kermanshah a ranar 12, Oktoban 2011. Abin da ke biye fassarar jawabin da Jagoran ya yi musu ne:

en: I ask Allah the Exalted to associate all these dear people and all of us with the Holy Quran in the hereafter.
ha: Ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da Ya tayar da dukkanin wadannan ‘yan'uwa masu girma, dukkanin ku da kuma dukkanin mu da Alkur'ani; a duniya mu zamanto tare da Alkur'ani, mu rayu tare da Alkur'ani, mu numfasa da Alkur'ani haka nan kuma a lahira, a ranar tashin kiyama Alkur'ani ya zamanto mai ceton mu; kada ya zamanto mai kuka a kan mu.

en: First is continuation of resistance and avoidance of weakness in resolve.
ha: Na Farko: Shi ne su ci gaba da tsayin daka da kuma nesantar duk wani abin da zai raunana tsayayyiyar azamarsu.

en: According to the Quranic verses which were recited at the beginning of this meeting, "(As for) those who say: Our Lord is Allah, then continue in the right way, the angels descend upon them, saying: Fear not, nor be grieved." [The Holy Quran, 41: 30] Do not fear and do not be sad because God is with you.
ha: Wannan ayar da aka karanto ta a farkon wannan bikin ta cewa: "Lalle wadannan da suka ce, Ubangijinmu, Shi ne Allah, sa'an nan suka daidaitu, mala'iku na sassauka a kansu (suna ce musu) "kada ku ji tsoro, kuma kada ku yi bakin ciki" (Suratu Fussilat 41:30), kada ku tsorata kada ku damu, Allah yana tare da ku.

en: A country that ranks first in terms of its oil and gas reserves is very interesting. What do the arrogant powers want?

en: This is because capturing the US embassy undermined the power of the US which was very great at that time and brought the US to its knees."

en: The legal persons are as follows: Heads of the three branches of government

en: You should take care not to let this change.

en: Before the Revolution, I used to travel to different places across the country.

en: [The Holy Quran, 48: 22-23] Nowhere in the Holy Quran is it said that if you start a war, you will definitely win it. You might win or lose the war you start, just as the Muslims did not always win the wars they started during the early years after the introduction of Islam: they were defeated in certain cases.
ha: Babu wani waje a cikin Alkur'ani da (Allah Madaukakin Sarki) Ya fadi cewa idan har kuka fara yaki, kuka kai hari, to lalle za ku yi nasara; mai yiyuwa ne ku yi nasara, mai yiyuwa ne ku sha kashi - kamar yadda ya faru a yakukuwan farkon Musulunci, a lokutan da musulmi suka kai hari, a wani wajen sun sha kashi a wani wajen kuma sun yi nasara.

en: Earlier they formed a so-called global coalition against Syria with great fuss and uproar. They gathered 30, 40, 50 countries, but they could not do a damn thing against Syria.

en: The first point is that the Americans constantly send messages - sometimes in writing - that they are not after regime change in Iran. This is what they are telling us.

en: There are many pretexts for discord.

en: Therefore, the heavy responsibility that I spoke about encompasses all these aspects and starts from self-education and developing humility in one's heart.

en: Speaking at the meeting, His Eminence referred to the bitter and painful events in the region and the role of some powers in imposing instability and war on nations and reiterated: “The Islamic Republic has always called on independent countries to play an active role in confronting the issue of imposing pressure on nations and it has always asked them to avoid being silent and mere spectators.”
ha: A yammacin yau Talata (22-11-2016) ce Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei ya gana da shugaban kasar Slovenia Borut Pahor da 'yan tawagarsa da suka kawo masa ziyarar ban kwana, inda yayin da yake ishara da abubuwa masu sosa rai da suke faruwa a yankin Gabas ta tsakiya da irin rawar da wasu manyan kasashen duniya suka taka wajen tabbatar da rashin tsaro da yakukuwa tsakanin al'ummomi ya bayyana cewar: A koda yaushe Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran ta kasance tana kiran 'yantattun kasashe zuwa ga taka gagaruwar rawa wajen rage irin matsin lambar da ake yi wa al'ummomi sannan kuma kada su zamanto 'yan kallo cikin hakan.

en: All these achievements were made in a year in which the enemies were determined to be harsh towards the Iranian nation in order to deprive it from a good life and from all the products of human talent.

en: Dear God, by the blessedness of your saints, bestow Your blessings on our youth.

Wannan babbar wautar Amurkaawa ne da kuma 'yan amshin shatansu da suke wannan yankin wadanda su ma suke fadin hakan da kuma yada shi.

en: One of the issues which was really a source of amusement for me was that the American secretary of state and the girl who stands there and talks, openly said, "We will not invite Iran to the coalition against DAESH".

en: If we adopt this perspective and interpret guardianship in this way, then the dynamism and enthusiasm that is embodied by the Islamic Revolution's Guards Corps will be intensified.

en: Government officials must not turn to a life of luxury, at least as long as they are in a position of responsibility.
