en: For this reason, I named this year the year of "Supporting Iranian Labor and Capital".
ha: A saboda haka ne muka sanya wa wannan shekarar sunan 'Shekarar (karfafa kayayyakin da ake samarwa a cikin gida da kuma) goyon bayan jari da ayyukan 'yan kasa".

en: But I have met many such people in the Armed Forces during the war, both on the front line and in the meetings that used to be held behind the front line in order to make decisions.
ha: A cikin dakaru masu makami, a lokacin yaki; shin a cikin yakin ne ko kuma a tarurrukan daukar matsaya a bayan fage, akwai su da yawa wanda hakan lamari ne mai muhimmancin gaske.

en: As we all know, the sea provides a great opportunity for a country to make progress and to protect its national interests.
ha: Kamar yadda dukkaninmu muka sani, teku dai a wajen wata kasa, wata gagarumar dama ce ta ci gaba da kiyaye manufofi na kasa.

en: Almost one year has now passed since the horrifying events in Mina, as a result of which several thousand people tragically lost their lives- under the hot sun with thirsty lips- and this happened on the day of Eid while they were in the clothes of ihram.
ha: A wannan tafarki kuwa ba sa jin kunya aikata duk wani ha'inci da cin amana. Kusan shekara guda kenan a halin yanzu da faruwar abin da ya faru a Mina mai sosa rai, inda dubban mutane suka rasa rayukansu cikin tsananin rana da kishirwa a ranar Idi sanye da tufafi na harami.

ha: Ni dai na sami damar ganawa da shi a gidansa a Kermanshah a lokuta da dama; mu zauna mu biyu da shi mu tattauna a tsakaninmu.

en: We learned this from our Imam, and this has been the clear path of the Islamic Republic up until now.

en: Copying books was difficult, but people who loved and needed books made a lot of efforts in this regard.

en: This is completely clear to anybody who has read the history of the Renaissance and anybody who has become familiar with the people of that era.

en: Shia and Sunni scholars of Islamic and Arab countries should clarify for everyone the evil intentions which the enemies pursue through establishing and supporting sectarian terrorism.

en: We believe, from the bottom of our hearts, in the capability of nations and in the power, faith, determination and foresight which Allah the Omniscient has offered to the masses of the people.

en: Ayatollah Khamenei added: "The propaganda broadcast by the enemies over the past few days showed once again how they are looking for an excuse to ambush the Islamic Republic like a wolf."
ha: Ayatullah Khamenei ya ci gaba da cewa: Farfagandar makiya cikin ‘yan kwanakin nan ta sake bayyanar da kanta da kuma irin jiran tsammanin da suke yi na samun wata kafa da za su cutar.

en: Of course there have always been other motives as well: liberal, socialist, ethnic and other such motives.

en: They should be careful, and by Allah's favor, the work will be continued in the best possible way.

en: Try to transform your mind with these teachings and try to promote them among the people around you.

ha: Dalilin da ya sanya mu ke magana kan batutuwan da suka faru a shekarar 1390 (da ta gabata) musamman irin nasarorin da al'ummar Iran suka samu a wannan shekarar shi ne saboda irin makirce-makircen da makiya da masu bakar aniya suka ta kulla wa al'ummar Iran ne.

en: Therefore, using or even threatening to use such weapons is a serious violation of the most basic humanitarian rules and is a clear manifestation of war crimes.

en: Reliance on God, remembrance of God, engaging in dhikr, humility before God - these are the signs of the spirituality that members of the Islamic Ummah enjoy.
ha: Wadannan su ne ababen da ake gani a tattare da su; wato wannan tawakkali, wannan komawa ga Allah, irin wannan tuna Allah da kuma irin wannan kankan da kai din a gaban Allah Madaukakin Sarki.

en: If we enter the arena for the sake of God and for carrying out our responsibilities, then winning and losing are meaningless.

en: In addition, the cunning nature of the hypocritical Western powers has become all too apparent for the people of these countries.

en: It is a very good movement. These were the points I wanted to discuss. I have written down a summary of the comments made by the friends so that I do not forget them later on.

en: Therefore, we should ask Allah the Exalted not to turn His blessing - that is to say, the opportunity to be in a position where we can play a role in the fate of the country and the people - into retribution for us.
ha: Wannan ni'ima da Ka ba mu - wato damar kasantuwa a wani waje mai tasiri, cikin makomar kasar nan da al'ummar nan - kada ka mayar da shi abin fushi; wannan lamari wanda zai iya zama hanyar lada, har ila yau kuma zai iya zama abin tuhuma.

en: Thousands of people came together in the financial center of America - in the economic capital of America, New York - and they shouted that they did not want capitalism. They came together on Wall Street, which is the heart of capitalism in the world. They are neither immigrants, nor African-Americans, nor members of lower social classes.
ha: A cibiyar kudi ta Amurka, a helkwatar tattalin arziki na Amurka wato New York, shi din ma a kan titin 'Wall Street' wanda shi ne tushen jari hujja na duniya, a sami dubban mutane su taru suna bayyana cewar ba sa son jari hujja. Su din nan ba baki ba ne, ba kuma dukkaninsu ne bakake fata ba, kungiyoyi daliban jami'a sun shigo cikinsu, suna fadin cewa mu dai ba ma son tsarin jari hujja.

en: (O Prophet, fear Allah and do not obey the disbelievers and the hypocrites.
ha: Ya Kai Annabi! Ka bi Allah da takawa, kuma kada ka yi da'a ga kafirai da munafukai.

en: This is the first sign of the political and revolutionary events in North Africa and the Arab region on a global scale, which itself is a harbinger of greater truths that will come to pass in the future.

en: Ayatollah Khamenei stressed that material powers whose model of power is based solely on military equipment and material calculations are not able to defeat a nation that has an Islamic model of power. "The victory of the Islamic Revolution was a clear example of superiority of spiritual power over material power. By relying on religious faith, the Iranian nation managed to defeat the Shah's satanic regime with empty hands."
ha: Ayatullah Khamenei ya bayyana cewar ko shakka babu ma'abota karfi na duniya wadanda suka dogara da karfi na makami da sauran abubuwa na duniya ba za su iya samun nasara a kan al'ummar da ta dogara da karfi na Musulunci ba. Jagoran ya ci gaba da cewa: babban misalin da ke nuni da irin nasarar da karfi na Ubangiji yake da ita a kan karfi na duniya ita ce nasarar da Juyin Juya Halin Musulunci ya samu (a kasar Iran) yayin da al'ummar Iran hannun rabbana amma tare da dogaro da imani su ka kawar da gwamnatin dagutu ta Shah.

en: Never place your trust in the U.S., NATO, or criminal regimes such as Britain, France, or, Italy, which for long plundered and divided your land among themselves.

en: I pray to Allah the Exalted to increase the power, dignity and progress of the Iranian nation on a daily basis.
ha: Muna rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki Ya kara irin daukaka da karfi da kuma ci gaban da al'ummar Iran take samu insha Allah.

en: They used to work so sincerely and so selflessly that they had filled the atmosphere of this region with the signs of sincerity, self-sacrifice, heroism and selflessness. And this is among the things that your province should feel proud of: it will remain for you.

en: Considering the wishes, ideals and ambitions of our nation, it is necessary to be constantly prepared for defense: defense that is accompanied by innovation.

en: First of all, I would like to thank all the brothers and sisters who are working on different areas - including daily prayers, zakat, exegesis, Mahdaviat and all the other areas that Mr. Qara'ati spoke about.

en: For example, 30 years ago in the early years of the 1360s if we had said that the future will be bright, perhaps some people would have said that we were fixing these ideas in the minds of the people.

en: The power of this nation does not depend on missiles, cannons, tanks, warplanes, and other military weapons. Of course these weapons are also necessary, and we thankfully have them, but the power of this nation is due to its faith.
ha: Karfin wannan al'umma ba yana cikin makamai masu linzami, bindigogi, tankunan yaki, jirage da sauran kayayyakin yaki ba ne; wadannan ma dai abubuwa ne da wajibi ne ya zamana ana da su, kuma alhamdu lillahi muna da su; to sai dai karfin wannan al'umma yana cikin imanin da take da shi ne.

en: Demanding islam, fighting the arrogant powers, demanding independence for the country, bringing about dignity for humanity, defending the oppressed, bringing about scientific, technological and economic progress for the country - these were the goals of the Revolution.
ha: Manufar dai ita ce tabbatar da Musulunci, ita ce adawa da ma'abota girman kai, ita ce kiyaye ‘yancin kasar nan, ita ce mutumta dan'adam, ita ce kare wadanda ake zalunta, ita ce ci gaba na ilimi da fasaha da tattalin arziki; dukkanin wadannan su ne manufofin juyin.

en: In fact, aside from the slogan of "we can" which our magnanimous Imam (r.a.) taught us, the Revolution also gave us the courage to say, "We can". They want to convince us that we are incapable.
ha: A hakikanin gaskiya suna son su fitar da wannan akida ta cewa 'lalle za mu iya' wanda mai girma Imam (Khumaini) ne ya koya mana ita sannan kuma juyin juya halin Musulunci ya ba mu karfin gwuiwan cewa lalle 'za mu iya' din daga zuciyar al'umma da cusa musu cewa lalle ku din nan ba za ku iya wani abu ba.

en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
ha: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai

en: The brave and young should throw out these fears from their heart.
ha: Wajibi ne jaruman masana da matasa su fitar da tsoro daga cikin zukatansu.

en: When someone sets out on a path for the sake of God, He blesses their efforts. That is why a few decades of work by that esteemed martyr continues to be an inexhaustible resource for our society.
ha: A lokacin da wani mutum ya sanya kafarsa a wani waje saboda Allah, Allah Madaukakin Sarki zai sanya albarka cikin wannan aiki na sa; a saboda haka ne wannan kokari na wasu shekaru na wannan babban mutum, wannan shahidi mai girma suka zamanto tamkar wata ajiya ga al'umma wacce ba ta karewa.

en: Regarding domestic issues, whenever our dear people had the opportunity to express their feelings - mainly on the 22nd of Bahman of 1391 - they exhibited whatever enthusiasm and epic presence that was necessary and they were present on the scene in larger numbers and with more enthusiasm than the previous years.
ha: A fagen batutuwa na cikin gida kuwa, al'ummarmu masu girma a duk wajen da aka sami dama sannan da kuma bukatar a bayyanar da irin so da kaunar da ake da ita ta taso - a mafi yawan lokuta a ranar 22 ga watan Bahman na shekarar 1391 - lalle sun bayyanar da kansu da kuma shigowa cikin fage; ta yadda irin fitowar da suka yi ta fi ta shekarun da suka gabata yawa.

en: Today, this is the responsibility of all Muslims.
ha: Wajibi ne mu yi kokari wajen tabbatar da su; wannan kuwa shi ne babban nauyin da ke wuyan dukkanin musulmi.

en: Our complaint against oppression and arrogance and against bullying and transgression is the moral and practical degeneration that has been imposed on our nations by the colonial and arrogant powers.
ha: Korafin da muke yi dangane da zalunci da girman kai da iko da wuce gona da iri, da fasadi da munanan halaye da ayyuka wadanda ‘yan mulkin mallaka da ma'abota girman kai suka haifar wa al'ummomi ne.

en: One of the big plots of the enemies of the Iranian nation is to foment discord inside the country under ethnic, religious, political and partisan pretexts.
ha: Daya daga cikin babban makircin makiyan al'ummar Iran, shi ne haifar da rarrabuwa da sabani na cikin gida; suna masu fakewa da batun kabilanci, mazhaba, akida ta siyasa da kuma kungiyanci da dai sauran batutuwa daban-daban.

en: Various measures should be adopted on different fronts: regarding the issue of improving the skills of the workforce, the issue of correct managerial attitudes, the issue of empowering the workforce, the issue of confronting economic disruption in the right way, the issue of sense of security for both laborers and investors.
ha: Wajibi ne a aiwatar da ayyuka a bangarori daban-daban. Lamarin dai lamari ne na karfafa irin kwarewar da ake da ita a fagen aiki, lamari ne na shugabancin da ya dace, lamarin lamari ne na samar da kwararrun ma'aikata da kuma tabbatar da aminci da tsaro ga ma'aikata haka nan ga masu zuba jari.

en: But it [merely] increased them in faith, and they said, "Sufficient for us is Allah, and [He is] the best Disposer of affairs."
ha: Sai (wannan magana) ta kara musu imani, kuma suka ce: "Mai isar mu Allah ne, kuma madallaci da shi a matsayon wakili.

en: And they know methods of propaganda really well.
ha: Sun san yadda suke yada farfaganda da kyau.

en: I am thankful to Allah the Exalted from the bottom of my heart who gave me another opportunity in the month of Ramadan to be in the company of you dear, motivated and dynamic youth and to listen to your comments for a few hours.
ha: Ina gode wa Allah Madaukakin Sarki da Ya sake ba ni damar zama cikin ku matasa masu girma, ma'abota nishadi da kumajin aiki a wannan rana na watan Ramalana don sauraren abubuwan da za ku fadi.

en: It is necessary to identify the truth.
ha: Wajibi ne a fahimci gaskiya.

en: Basij is one of the pillars of such preparedness.
ha: Daya daga cikin tushen wannan shirin su ne wadannan dakarun na Basiji.

en: A new year has begun for us and God willing, the Iranian nation will manage to achieve many advances through its efforts and vigilance and by relying on Allah the Exalted.
ha: A halin yanzu dai ga wata shekarar nan ta shigo, wanda ta hanyar dogaro da Allah, a wannan karon ma al'ummar Iran za ta sami nasarori masu yawan gaske ta hanyar kokari da nuna sanin ya kamata da take da shi.

en: The youth should utilize their talent and their memory. Encourage your children and youth to memorize the Holy Quran.
ha: Yana da kyau matasa su tafi su yi amfani da irin karfin da suke da shi, su yi amfani da kwakwalwarsu ta hadda, haka nan kananan yara ma wajen haddar Alkur'ani.

en: Dear brothers, dear youth and honorable commanders, the duty that our nation is shouldering today is a great and sensitive duty.
ha: Matasa masu girma! Da kuma kwamandoji abin girmamamawa! Nauyin da ke wuyan al'ummar mu a yau wani nauyi ne mai girma da kuma muhimmanci.

en: In such conditions, it is clear that one cannot expect Muslim nations to remedy their material and spiritual shortcomings and to achieve security, welfare, scientific progress and international dignity which are the results of achieving awakening and finding one's true identity.
ha: Ko shakka babu a irin wannan yanayin, ba za a iya tunanin cewa kasashen musulmi za su iya magance matsalolin da suke da su ba, sannan kuma su tabbatar da tsaro da jin dadi da ci gaba na ilimi da tsayin daka na kasa da kasa da ya kamata su samu karkashin wannan farkawa da suka samu.

en: It is the mechanism in the world according to which countries and nations are categorized into two groups: the domineering and the dominated.
ha: Shi ne wannan tsari da ya raba kasashen duniya da al'ummominsu zuwa gida biyu: wato 'yan mulkin mallaka da wadanda ake musu mulkin mallakan.

en: A prominent scientific movement started in different areas several years ago, and fortunately this movement has gained further momentum on a daily basis.
ha: Tun shekarun da suka gabata aka fara wannan gagarumin yunkuri na ilimi a fagage daban-daban, wanda abin farin cikin shi ne cewa a kowace rana sai dada ci gaba ake yi.

en: We need to intensify our labor so that we can compensate for the past shortcomings.
ha: Hakan lamari ne da ke wajabta mana kara kokarin a cikin wannan shiri na shekaru biyar don mu sami damar cike irin gibin da ake da su a baya.

en: Westerners act in a different way. Of course, we have our own frameworks and they have their own frameworks, but their frameworks are oppressive.
ha: Na'am muna da wasu tsare-tsare da wannan demokradiyyar ta mu ta ginu a kansu, haka nan su ma suna da na su, tushen na su kuwa tushe ne na zalunci.

en: One of the main requirements for developing an appropriate understanding of events is to see what path the enemy is pursuing.
ha: Daga cikin abubuwan da ya suke wajibi ne a samar da su wajen fahimtar lamurra shi ne mu sanya ido mu ga wani tafarki ne makiya suke bi.

en: The meeting had been arranged by the organization in charge of religious endowments. Unlike today's endowments organization, which is thankfully an honorable organization, the organization in charge of endowments was a notorious organization at that time. Although I was very eager to listen to the recitation by that qari, I was reluctant to go to that meeting.
ha: To da ya ke hukumar wakafi ta wancan lokacin ce ta shirya taron sannan kuma hukumar sabanin ta yanzu wacce take da kyakkyawar suna, ta wancan lokacin kan ba a ganinta da mutumci, to saboda irin wannan yanayin ne ya sanya ni na ki tafiya wajen don sauraren karatun duk kuwa da cewa ina son in saurari karatun Alkur'anin.

en: Do not say, "How is this possible?" No, it is perfectly possible. Just take a look at the conditions of those days: our enemies had imposed a war on us and they were present on our soil.
ha: Ku duba ku ga irin yanayin da ake ciki a wancan lokaci: ana cikin yaki ne ga shi kuma makiya sun shigo kasar mu; haka nan kuma kafin ma wannan kallafaffen yakin na shekaru takwas, an samu wasu masu adawa da wannan juyin da suke dauke da makami, ko kuma bayan hakan lokacin da aka fara yaki, shi kansa hakan wani lamari ne mai karfafa gwuiwa da tayar da kumaji hatta ga mutumin da ma babu ruwansa ya kan shigo da shi cikin fage.

en: May God bestow His mercy and blessings on these two martyrs.
ha: Allah ya yi rahama ga wadannan shahidai guda biyu.

en: Leader's Message on Ayatollah Rezvani's Demise - Khamenei.ir The following is the full text of the message issued on April 20, 2013 by Ayatollah Khamenei the Leader of the Islamic Revolution on Ayatollah Rezvani's demise.
ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei ya fitar da wani sako na ta'aziyya biyo bayan rasuwar Ayatullah Hajj Sheik Muslim Malakuti, daya daga cikin manyan daliban marigayi Imam Khumaini (r.a) sannan kuma wakilin Jagora a lardin Azarbaijan kuma limamin Tabriz.

en: [The Holy Quran, Sura ad-Dhuha, Ayah 6-7] And there are many such examples in the Holy Quran.
ha: (Suratud Duha 93:6-7). Akwai irin wadannan misalan cikin Alkur'ani mai girma da yawan gaske.

en: The cry of our magnanimous Imam (r.a.) - both before the victory of the Revolution and after the formation of the Islamic government - about the issue of unity paid off and our people became aware.
ha: Wannan kira zuwa ga hadin kai da marigayi Imam Khumaini yayi- tun kafin nasarar juyin juya halin Musulunci, haka nan kuma bayan kafa gwamnatin Musulunci - ya yi aikinsa, al'ummarmu ta fahimci inda aka sa gaba. Wannan nauyi ne da ke wuyan kowa.

en: His Eminence referred to the spread of public education to the remotest parts of the country and added: "In recent years praiseworthy measures have been adopted in the educational system and the most important measure among them was preparing the document for transforming the educational system, and the main mission is to implement the document."
ha: Har ila yau kuma yayin da ya ke ishara da irin ayyukan da sauye-sauyen da aka samar a bangaren koyarwa da tarbiyya a dukkanin fadin kasar Iran Jagoran ya bayyana cewar hakan yana rubanya irin aikin da ke wuyan ma'aikatar ilimi da tarbiyya din ne.

en: After the Revolution and before my presidential terms, I met him in his home during one of my trips to Kermanshah and I had the opportunity to see his artistic works up close.
ha: Bayan nasarar juyin juya halin Musulunci, kafin lokacin in zama shugaban kasa, a daya daga cikin ziyarar da na kawo garin Kermanshah, na tafi gidansa sannan kuma na ga ayyukansa na zane da yake yi.

en: Shrine - Khamenei.ir The following is the full text of the speech delivered on March 21, 2013 by Ayatollah Khamenei the Leader of Islamic Revolution to a large gathering of pilgrims at Imam Ridha's (a.s.) shrine in the holy city of Mashhad.
ha: Shimfida: Abin da ke biye fassarar jawabin da Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamene'i ya yi ne a ranar 21, Maris 2013 a lokacin ganawarsa da dubun dubatan mutane a haramin Imam Ridha (a.s) da ke birnin Mashhad a ranar farko ta sabuwar shekarar 1392 hijira shamsiyya:

en: Good things have been done regarding the implementation of the policies specified in Article 44 of the Constitution, but what has been done so far is not enough. It is necessary to improve our performance. It is not just a matter of privatizing economic enterprises and leaving the arena.
ha: A fagen gudanar da siyasar doka ta 44 an gudanar da ayyuka masu kyau to amma dai ba su wadatar ba; wajibi ne a kara kaimi. Lamarin ba shi ne kawai mu mika cibiyoyin tattalin arziki shi kenan mu ce mun mika musu ba, shi kenan mu huta; baya ga wannan mikawar akwai kuma wadansu ayyukan da ya wajaba a aikata: wajibi ne a karfafa bangaren ‘yan kasuwan, wajibi ne a samar da jagoranci mai kyau sannan da kuma a sanya ido wajen ganin ba a yi mummunan amfani da hakan ba.

en: The framework and the method of management is democracy.
ha: Yanayin aiki, tsarin aikin da kuma yanayin gudanarwa, dukkaninku tsarin demokradiyya ne; wato mutane ne wadanda suke shigowa cikin fage; alhali suna masu riko da Musulunci da dukkan karfinsu, duk kuwa da cewa mai yiyuwa ne saboda irin shigarsu ta zahiri ba za a yi zaton cewa suna riko da Musulunci da kuma tsarin Musulunci ba; to amma a hakikanin gaskiya suna riko da shi, lalle suna son Musulunci.

en: Our historical background, our cultural heritage, the capabilities of our people, our natural resources - all of these things dictate this fact to us.
ha: Tsawon tarihinmu, irin gado na al'adu da muke da su, irin karfi na mutane da albarkatun kasa dukkanin wadannan abubuwa ne da suke mana ishara da hakan.

en: At the end of his statements, Ayatollah Khamenei said that there are bright prospects for the Iranian nation and added: "By Allah's grace, the future of Islamic Iran will definitely be better than its current conditions."
ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya ci gaba da cewa: Cikin yardar Allah, goben al'ummar Iran zai fi yau dinsu kyau. Tun da farko dai sai da ministan ilimi da tarbiyya na Iran Haji Babayi ya gabatar da jawabinsa inda ya yi karin haske kan irin ayyukan da aka gudanar a ma'aikatar tasa.

en: Certain people established a so-called labor government during an era and kept the world busy for a few decades, but they did not benefit laborers.
ha: A wani lokaci a baya an samu wasu mutane da suka kafa wata hukuma da suka kira ta ta ma'aikata sannan kuma tsawon shekaru suka shagaltar da duniya; to amma babu wani alherin da ma'aikata suka samu.

en: These were not popular and revolutionary in the real sense of the word. What is happening today is that people are present in the arena with their body and soul.
ha: Abin da a halin yanzu yake faruwa, shigowar mutane fage ne da dukkan jiki da kuma rayukansu; to irin wadannan juyi su ne juyi na mutane.

en: This is an important point on the issue of Ghadir and it is a rejoinder to all those people who think and promote the idea that Islam should be kept away from political issues, issues related to the government and the like.
ha: Wannan wani bangare ne mai matukar muhimmanci cikin lamarin Ghadir, wanda kuma ya ke a matsayin amsa cikakkiya ga dukkanin mutane da suke tunani da kuma yada farfaganda cewar babu ruwan Musulunci da lamurran siyasa da hukuma.

en: I believe this is the most important strength of the Islamic Republic.
ha: A ra'ayina wannan shi ne bangaren karfi na farko na wannan tsarin.

en: They should cooperate with one another.
ha: Ku tafi tare da junanku, ku tausayawa junanku.

en: A wise human being, particularly a wise politician, should never have the motivation to turn a neutral country into an enemy.
ha: Mutum mai hankali, musamman dan siyasan da ya san abin da ya kamata, bai kamata ya mayar da mutumin da bai dauke shi a matsayin makiyi ba a matsayin makiyinsa ba.

en: Over the first 10, 11 years, famous political figures from different revolutionary groups were executed.
ha: Tsawon wadannan shekaru sha daya zuwa sha biyu na farko, an kashe sanannun ‘yan siyasa na cikin wannan juyin.

en: 1980- Founding member of the Islamic Republic Party, together with such religious scholars and Mujahids as Shahid Beheshti, Rafsanjani, Shahid Bahonar, and Musavi-Ardebili.
ha: § Assasa ‘Jam’iyyar Jamhuriyar Musulunci’ tare da taimakon abokansa irin su: Shahid Beheshti, Shahid Bahonar, Hashemi Rafsanjani da sauransu a watan Esfand 1357 (1979).

en: In this regard, there are a few things that I should clarify.
ha: To sai dai akwai wasu batutuwa da wajibi ne in fayyace su:

en: We will avoid any accidental or calculated confrontation as much as we can, but those who rely on bulling to bring about progress for themselves should feel that they are faced with a powerful nation." His Eminence said that the Navy is the manifestation of the Iranian nation's power at sea.
ha: To amma mutanen da suke ganin za su iya tabbatar da ci gaban su ne kawai ta hanyar amfani da karfi da tursasawa, to wajibi ne su ji cewa lalle akwai wata tsayayyiyar al'umma a gaban su. Jagoran ya bayyana sojojin ruwa a matsayin alama ta tsayin dakan al'ummar Iran a cikin ruwa, don haka ne ya kirayi dakaru masu makamai da suke yankin kudancin Iran din da cewa: Wajibi ne ku ci gaba da wannan kokari da kuke yi cikin gaskiya, tsarkin zuciya da kuma dukkanin karfin da kuke da shi.

en: They launch attacks, but they call it defense.
ha: Su kan yi zalunci su kira shi goyon bayan al'ummomi.

en: It is obvious that the devils of the world will not leave us alone. They will not give up as long as they can fight.
ha: To a fili yake dai cewa shaidanun duniya ba za su zauna haka kawai suna kallo ba, har zuwa lokacin da suke da karfi, ba za su ci gaba da zuba ido ba.

en: Today, there are millions and, in certain cases, billions of spectators and they will be aware of this fact. Such a fact cannot be reflected in a different way. An athlete promotes the values of a nation with good sportsmanship and piety.
ha: Ku din nan da kuke shigowa fagen gasar wasanni tare da kyawawan halaye da nuna tausayawa, ko shakka babu akwai wani sako cikin hakan ga duniya da a yau masu kallon wasan sun kai miliyoyi.

en: If they want to have a religious discussion, there is no problem.
ha: Idan har suna son su gudanar da bincike, su yi, idan kuwa ba haka ba, shi kenan.

en: I really do not know of another example.
ha: Lalle mu dai ba mu ga wasu tamkar hakan ba.

en: Ayatollah Khamenei referred to the name of the current Iranian year - "The Year of Economic Jihad" - and stressed: "All our people and government officials should join hands to start this movement because the purpose of choosing a name for each year is to start a movement towards the selected goal and slogan."
ha: Haka nan kuma Jagoran ya kirayi dukkanin al'umma da jami'an gwamnati da suka hada hannayensu waje guda wajen ganin an cimma manufar da aka tsara a wannan sabuwar shekarar da aka ba ta sunan "Shekarar Kokarin Bunkasa Tattalin Arziki".

en: Why?
ha: Saboda me?

en: Just like the rest of our people, I have only one vote and until the time I cast my vote into the ballot box, nobody will know what my vote is.
ha: Ni din nan, kamar sauran mutane, kuri'a guda nake da ita, sannan kuma wannan kuri'ar kafin in jefa ta a akwatin zabe babu wani mutum da ya san ga waye zan kada ta.

en: He was not after attracting praise from a particular group or intellectual association.
ha: Ba mutum ne da ya kasance yana neman yabo da jinjinawar wasu mutane ko kuma wata kungiya ta musamman ba.

en: I would tell you that the future of the country is a very bright future.
ha: Ina son in sanar da ku cewa, makomar wannan kasar wata makoma ce mai kyau.

en: This is a crucial aspect and a lesson for us.
ha: Wannan wani bangare ne mai muhimmanci, hakan kuma darasi ne a gare mu.

en: Allah the Exalted will take all these selfless efforts into account and He will reward you for these efforts.
ha: Lalle Allah Madaukakin Sarki zai ba da lada ga wannan kokari - kokarin da mafi yawa daga cikin mutane ba su san shi ba; alal hakika wani kokari ne da yake a boye - lalle (Allah) Ya tanadar muku da wata lada.

en: The torture centers of Guantanamo and Abu Ghraib and other torture centers are another issue.
ha: Baya ga gidajen yari da wajen azabtar da mutane irin su Guantanamo da Abu Ghraib na kasar Iraki da sauran wajajen da suke azabtar da mutane da suke wajaje daban-daban.

en: The following is the full text of this message issued on October 11, 2013.
ha: Abin da ke biye fassarar sakon da Jagoran ya aike wa mahajjatan wannan shekarar ta 1434 ne:

en: During this unparalleled obligation, temporal and spatial security bestows tranquility on the hearts of human beings like a clear sign and a brilliant star and draws hajj pilgrims out of the siege of insecurity by domineering oppressors that constantly threatens humanity and it helps humanity taste the pleasure of security during a particular period of time.
ha: A yayin wannan farali maras tamka, tsaro na lokaci da waje da ake da shi yana haskaka zukatan mutane tamkar wata bayyananniyar alama da kuma tauraruwa mai haske sannan kuma da fitar da Mahajjaci daga killacewar rashin tsaron da azzaluman 'yan mulkin mallaka suka haifar da a koda yaushe ya ke barazana ga dukkanin bil'adama, sannan kuma da taimaka wa dan'adam wajen ya dandani dadin kwanciyar hankali da tsaro na wani kayyadadden lokaci.

en: They use it as a tool to pit this against that, to cause rows and make them give a controversial interview.
ha: Su dora shi kan wannan da wancan, su haifar da rikici, su yi da wannan da wancan.

en: Today, some elements both among Sunnis and Shias are working at separating Muslims from one another.
ha: A yau, akwai wadansu mutane, a cikin Ahlusunna, haka nan a cikin Shi'a, da suke kokarin raba musulmi da junansu.

en: Islam has set its roots even in countries where the manifestation of Islam was limited and where the people have been pressured.
ha: Hatta a wajajen da ake takaita shiga irin ta Musulunci, hakan ta faru ne sakamakon matsin lambar da ake musu, amma dai mutanen wajen muminai ne, musulmi ne sannan kuma suna da tushe na Musulunci.

en: Printing 1000-3000 copies is not good for a country with 75 million people and with so many highly motivated youth. We should be able to print a lot more copies. Fortunately certain books are published many times, but in general the situation is not satisfactory.
ha: Buga kwafi dubu ko dubu biyu ko uku na littafi da makamancin hakan ba lamari ne da ya dace da kasar da take da mutane miliyan saba'in da biyar sannan kuma da irin wannan matasan da muke da su masu irin wannan shauki ba; wajibi ne adadin kwafin ya yi yawa sosai.

en: I hope Allah the Exalted will bestow success on all of you.
ha: Ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da Ya ba wa dukkaninku dacewa da kuma taimaka muku.

en: Leader’s Message on Martyrdom of Mostafa Ahmadi-Roshan - Khamenei.ir
ha: Sakon Jagora Sakamakon Shahadar Shahid Mustafa Ahmadi Roshan

en: This is also an important point, not just because a number of youth and adolescents were martyred - which is of course important - but because the great movement initiated by the Imam (r.a.) in the years 1342 and 1343 had remained so fresh and dynamic that a number of pure-hearted youth had been inspired to take to the streets, feel responsible and stand up against the bayonets of the oppressive and satanic Pahlavi regime.
ha: Wannan ma wani lamari ne mai muhimmancin gaske; ba wai saboda cewa wadansu matasa sun yi shahada ba - tabbas hakan lamari ne mai muhimmanci - face dai saboda kasantuwar cewa wannan yunkuri mai girma na Imam da ya faro shi a shekarar 1342 da 1343 (1964-65) ya zamanto a raye ta yadda hatta wadansu matasa masu tsarkin zuciya za su fito da shi kan titi, su na jin cewa lalle akwai wani nauyi a wuyansu da kuma tsayawa kyam a gaban gwamnatin zalunci ta dagutu.

en: Criticism does not mean denying positive aspects.

ha: To amma bai kamata hakan ya haifar da wani gibi cikin rayuwa ta gaba daya ta musulmi da yanayin mu'amalarsu da juna da ‘yan'uwantakar da ke tsakaninsu ba.

en: This is why we say we must become the top country in the region.
ha: Wannan shi ne dalilin da ya sa muke cewa wajbi ne mu zamanto a matsayi na farko.

en: Meeting you dear youth, my dear children, is one of the most pleasant occasions for me. This is an opportunity for me to discuss the issues that should be discussed between you and I.
ha: Lalle a gare ni ganawa da ku din nan matasa masu girma, ‘ya'yana masu girma, wata gagarumar dama ce ta in gabatar muku da wadansu abubuwan da wajibi ne mu yi magana kansu a tsakaninmu.

en: [The Holy Quran, Sura al-Hajj (22), Ayah 25] Thus, in addition to being the symbol of monotheism, Ka'bah is the symbol of Islamic solidarity, brotherhood, and equality.
ha: Haka lamarin yake cewa Dakin Ka'aba, baya ga kasantuwarsa wakilin kalmar tauhid, haka nan kuma alama ce ta hadin kan kalmomi da ‘yan'uwantaka da kuma daidaito na Musulunci.

en: Gamal Abdel Nasser had travelled to Libya and he delivered a speech on Sawt al-Arab along with Jaafar Nimeiry and Muammar Gaddafi - who was a young man in his late twenties and had just carried out a coup.
ha: Jamal Abdun Nasir ya tafi kasar Libiya, sannan kuma tare da wannan Gaddafin - wanda a wancan lokacin wani matashi ne dan shekaru ashirin da takwas zuwa da tara ya yi juyin mulki - da kuma wannan Ja'afar Numeirin dukkaninsu suna jawabi a wannan gidan radiyon na muryar Larabawa.

en: Not like this. Only the King of Saudi Arabia issues a message for public relations purposes.
ha: A’a, ba da irin wannan yanayin ba; sarkin Saudiyya ne kawai ya ke fitar da wani sako.

en: It was Imam Khomeini (r.a.) who proposed the idea of establishing Basij and "an army of twenty million". This massive movement by Basij was one of the miraculous things that the Revolution achieved under the leadership of Imam Khomeini (r.a.).
ha: Wannan gagarumin yunkuri na Basiji, wannan aiki da Imam yayi na kafa cibiyar Basiji - don kuwa Imam ne ya bukaci a kafa cibiyar Basij, ya gabatar da batun samar da sojoji miliyan ashirin - daya ne daga cikin irin wadannan ayyuka masu kama da mu'ujiza na wannan juyin da Imam ya yi.

en: As I said the French Revolution happened in the year 1789.
ha: To wannan juyin ya faru ne a wancan shekarar da na fadi wato ta 1789 miladiyya.

en: We claim that the hajj messages are conveyed to Muslim nations.
ha: - Muna da’awar cewa ana fitar da sakon hajji ne ga al’ummomin musulmi.

en: This is what our academic environments are like. It is necessary to benefit from this reality. It is necessary to influence these environments and to give them an appropriate orientation.
ha: Haka yanayin jami'ar mu yake; wajibi ne a yi kokarin amfanuwa da hakan, wajibi ne a yi tasiri cikin hakan, wajibi ne a samar da mahanga mai kyau.

en: It is necessary to avoid extremism. Going to extremes is harmful, no matter what the direction is.
ha: Rashin aikata wani aiki lalle yana cutarwa, shi ma wuce gona da iri cikin aiki yana cutarwa, don haka ku kula sosai.

en: Currently, this plot is being seriously pursued by intelligence services of the West and Zionism with the help of petrodollars and bribed politicians from East Asia to North Africa and particularly in the Arab region.
ha: A halin yanzu kungiyoyin leken asirin kasashen yammaci da sahyoniyawa ta hanyar taimakon dalolin (kudaden) man fetur da ‘yan siyasa da suka sayar da kansu, tun daga gabashin Asiya har zuwa arewacin Afirka musamman a kasashen larabawa, suna ci gaba da aiwatar da wannan makirci da kuma ba shi dukkanin muhimmanci.

en: Sayyid Ali Khamenei
ha: Sayyid Ali Khamenei

en: It is necessary to see these things.
ha: Wajibi ne a kalli wadannan abubuwan.

en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
ha: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai

en: The Imam's insightful eyes saw these signs of divine power.
ha: Idanuwan Imam masu cike da basira lalle suna ganin alamun wannan karfi da taimako na Ubangiji.

en: Dear God, increase the honor of those who serve this nation, this movement, Islam and Muslims.
ha: A kowace rana ka ci gaba da daukaka masu yin hidima ga wannan al'umma da kuma wannan yunkuri da kuma Musulunci da musulmi.

en: My dear old friend, the late Hajj Agha Baha ed-Din Mohammadi Eraqi, was among the fortunate people in this province who found this opportunity.
ha: A wannan lardin ma, tsohon abokin mu marigayi Hajj Agha Baha'uddeen Muhammadi Araki, yana daga cikin mutanen da suka sami wannan dacewa ta shahada.

en: The next point is that those who do these impressive things have a lot of self-confidence, and this self-confidence is the main asset.
ha: Batu na gaba shi ne cewa mutanen da suke gudanar da wadannan ayyuka masu girma, mutane ne da suke da ruhi mai karfi, mutane ne da suka dogara da kansu; wanda hakan shi ne babban jari.

en: These are sources of pride - not in the sense of self-importance, but in the sense of recognizing one's identity and innate talents and moving forward on the basis of this identity and these talents.
ha: Wadannan abubuwa ne abin alfahari, ba wai saboda nuna kai ba, face dai da ma'anar bayyanar da irin matsayin da ake da shi da kuma irin karfin da ake da shi a wannan fagen da kuma yunkuri na ci gaba.

en: Thankfully, these are privileges which the followers of the Holy Prophet's (s.w.a.) household benefit from.
ha: Wannan yana daga cikin siffofin da mabiya Ahlulbaiti (a.s) suka kebanta da su.

en: Government officials of the countries that are claiming to be after a solution should admit that the Iranian nation has a right to domestic nuclear enrichment for peaceful purposes.
ha: Kasashen da suke takama da karfi na duniya su amince da cewa al'ummar Iran tana da hakkin tace sinadarin uranium don manufa ta zaman lafiya a cikin kasarta sannan kuma da kanta.

en: People like me will be among you for a short time.
ha: Mu dai baki ne na 'yan wasu kwanaki.

en: By the blessedness of this holy day, this auspicious Eid and the soul of the Last Prophet (s.w.a.), I hope God will bestow His blessings and assistance on the Iranian nation and other Muslim nations.
ha: Muna rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da Ya kara albarkokinsa ga wannan al'umma; sannan kuma (muna rokonSa) da ya shigar da al'ummar Iran da sauran al'ummar musulmi cikin falala da taimakonsa albarkacin wannan rana mai girma da wannan idi mai albarka da kuma samuwar Cikamakin Annabawa.

en: And the thing that you do is, in fact, a movement towards peaks.
ha: A hakikanin gaskiya kuna yunkuri ne zuwa ga isa ga kololuwa da kuma sanya wasu ma zuwa ga kololuwar.

en: If he really believed in the Holy Quran, he should have put his hands up and said, "I am not fighting this war." He should have dropped his sword.
ha: Idan har da gaske ya yi imani da Alkur'ani to wajibi ne ya daga hannayensa sama ya ce lalle ni kan ba zan yi yaki ba, ya ajiye takobin na sa.

en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
ha: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai

en: Is thirty years of trial and error not enough to awaken the arrogant and bullying powers and prove to them the futility of their efforts to dominate Islamic Iran?
ha: Ashe shekaru talatin da daya na gwaji da kura-kuran wasu gwamnatocin ma'abota girman kai da son amfani da karfi bai isa ya sanya su farkarwa daga barcin gafalar da suke ciki ba da kuma fahimtar da su dangane da aikin baban giwan da suke yi na neman mallake kasar Musulunci ta Iran ba?

en: Therefore, it should not let this happen.
ha: Bai kamata su bari hakan ta faru ba.

en: I would like to welcome the dear brothers and sisters - the hardworking and compassionate officials of the country. I hope Allah the Exalted will make this holy month auspicious for you and the Iranian nation.
ha: Ina wa ‘yan'uwa maza da mata masu girma, jami'an gwamnati masu kokari da kuma kishi na kasar nan barka da zuwa; ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da Ya sanya wannan wata mai alfarma ya zamanto mai albarka a gare ku gaba daya.

en: Leader’s Speech in Asalouyeh - Khamenei.ir The following is the full text of the speech delivered on March 28, 2011 by Ayatollah Khamenei to the employees of the National Oil Company in Asalouyeh, Bushehr province.
ha: Shimfida: Abin da ke biye fassarar jawabin da Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei ya yi ne a yayin ganawa da ma'aikatan kamfanin man fetur na kasar Iran da ke Asaluyeh na lardin Bushehr a ranar litinin 28, Maris, 2011.

en: Certain books are harmful.
ha: Wasu daga cikin littafan masu cutarwa ne.

en: Therefore, we need to select a new name for our favorite system: "Islamic democracy" or "Islamic Republic".
ha: A saboda haka ne muka sanya wa tsarin da muke so wani suna na daban; muke kiran sa da tsarin demokradiyya na Musulunci ko kuma Jamhuriyar Musulunci. Wato muna zaban wani sabon suna.

en: If they do this, they will be faced with the same problems that they were faced with in Iraq for the last 10 years.
ha: To amma ya kamata su san cewa idan har suka aikata hakan, to kuwa za su fuskanci irin matsalolin da suka fuskanta shekaru goman da suka gabata kan lamarin kasar Iraki.

en: The secretary of states' deputy too - the woman whom you know - had requested Mr. Araghchi that Iran cooperate with them.
ha: Mataimakiyarsa ma - wacce wata mace ce, kun san ta - ta bukaci malam Arakchi (mataimakin ministan harkokin wajen Iran) a tattaunawar da suke yi, ta ce masa ku zo mu yi aiki tare.

en: They planned - or at least, strengthened - the fitna of the year 1388 in order to overthrow the Islamic Republic, but what happened was that the systems and governments which were dependent on them started to fall one after the other.
ha: Sun karfafa fitinar da ta faru a shekara ta 2009 (bayan zaben shugaban kasa) don cutar da Jamhuriyar Musulunci - ko dai su suka tsara ta ko kuma alal akalla sun goya mata baya da kuma karfafa ta - to amma sai ga shi gwamnatocin da suke a matsayin ‘yan amshin shatansu ne daya bayan daya suke faduwa ko kuma suke ta girgiza.

en: The event that happened in Norway should not be viewed as an isolated event.
ha: Wannan lamarin da ya faru a kasar Norway, bai kamata kawai mu dauke shi a matsayin wani lamari mai sauki haka kawai ba.

en: What is important is to see whether we are moving towards resolution of these problems or not.
ha: Akwai abubuwa marasa kyau, to amma wajibi ne mu duba mu ga shin wadannan abubuwa marasa kyau din sun kama hanyar gyaruwa ne ko kuma a'a; idan har muka ga sun kama hanyar magantuwa ne, an kama hanyar kyautata su ne, da kuma hanyar fahimta, to mu fahimci cewa lalle ayyukan da aka yi sun yi nasara.

en: Imam Khamenei issued message of condolences on passing of Afghanistan’s Marja’ - Khamenei.ir
ha: Jagora Imam Khamenei Ya Aike Da Sakon Ta'aziyyar Rasuwar Ayatullah Zanjani

en: The station of Abraham is his station of dedication and self-sacrifice, his fortitude and resistance to personal desires and fatherly feelings as well as against the domination of kufr [lack of Islamic faith], polytheism and Nimrod, the tyrant of the time.
ha: Makam Ibrahim, waje ne da ya ke nuni da tsarkin niyya da kuma sadaukar da kansa; waje ne da ya ke nuni da turjjiyar da ya yi wajen fada da son zuciya da kuma nuna kauna irin ta uba haka nan kuma wuri ne da ya ke nuni da tsayin dakarsa wajen fuskantar danniya da kafirci da shirka da kuma ikon Namarudun zamaninsa.

en: He said that his duty was what he was doing. He said that he had to express his opposition, no matter what the consequences were.
ha: A yayin da mutum ya kalli maganganun Imam, zai ga cewa ya riga da ya dau azamar kai wa ga karshen wannan aiki.

en: In this brotherly dialogue with you I want to place greater emphasis on three areas:
ha: A cikin wannan jawabi na ‘yan'uwataka ina son in yi karin haske kan lamurra guda uku na asasi:

en: When a person is sure that there is such a future, he must expect it and be prepared for it.
ha: A lokacin da mutum ya ke da yakinin cewa akwai irin wannan makomar; kamar yadda ya zo cikin ayoyin Alkur'ani mai girma: "Kuma lalle, hakika, Mun rubuta a cikin Littafi baicin Ambato cewa bayina salihai su ne masu gadon kasa.

en: In those days, panegyrists played a very good role.
ha: A wannan lokacin mawaka sun taka gagarumar rawa.

en: Of course, what lies ahead for us in the year 1392 will be in the two important areas of politics and economics.
ha: Tabbas abin da ke gabanmu a shekara ta 1392, lalle a mafi yawan bangarori zai zamanto ne a fagen tattalin arziki da siyasa.

en: The Revolution managed to preserve its essence by relying on its principles and it has also moved ahead on the path of perfection.
ha: Lamurra daban-daban da suka kunno kai, juyin ya yi nasara a kan dukkaninsu sannan kuma da irin wannan karfi da ya ke da shi ya sami damar kare kansa don ya samu damar isa ga kamala.

en: This is the main factor. The poetry and tone that you choose and the way you speak with the people should be orientated towards increasing people's knowledge and deepening their understanding of religion and life.
ha: To wannan shi ne batu na asali. Wakokin da za ku zaba, irin zuben waken da za ku zaba da irin hanyar da za ku bayyanar da su ga mutane wajibi ne su zamanto sun yi daidai da wannan tafarkin.

en: A select Messenger of the Righteous One, Prophet Ibrahim (a.s.), made a sacrifice on Eid al-Adha. In some cases, sacrificing your loved ones is beyond sacrificing your life. Prophet Ibrahim was about to sacrifice a loved one in the way of God - a young child whom Allah the Exalted had bestowed on him at an old age after a lifetime of waiting.
ha: Sama da sadaukar da rai, a wani wajen ma sadaukarwa ce ta abin kauna. Shi din ya yi shirin sadaukar da wani abin kaunarsa ne saboda Allah; wanda shi ne wani dansa matashi wanda Allah Madaukakin Sarki Ya arzurta shi da shi bayan shekara da shekaru na jiran dako, a lokacin da ya tsufa; inda ya ke cewa: "Godiya ta tabbata ga Allah Wanda Yake Ya ba ni, ina a cikin tsufa, Isma'ila da Ishaka" (Suratu Ibrahim 14:39).

en: Conversely, the US government - the bulling enemy which has been openly opposed to us - is the most hated government in Islamic countries.
ha: A daya bangaren kuma, gwamnatin Amurka - wacce makiya ce da a fili take nuna kiyayyarta a gare mu - tana fadin cewa mutumci da matsayin Amurka a kasashen musulmi, a wannan yankin, a kowace rana sai dada faduwa suke yi.

en: This is a divine law. The Iranian people are determined and dynamic and they are not thinking of attacking other countries, but they are firmly attached to their identity, to their wealth, to their religion, to their Islamic Republic.
ha: Al'ummar Iran ta yi azama da dukkan nishadi sannan kuma ba ta da nufin kai hari da wuce gona da iri a kan wani; to amma tana da alaka da kuma kaunar mutumcinta, dukiyarta da matsayinta, da Musuluncinta, da Jamhuriyar Musuluncinta da dukkanin karfinta.

en: The punishment of a warring enemy is different from the punishment of an unaware person.
ha: Hukumcin makiya ya banbanta da na wanda ya gafala.

en: I believe in population growth.
ha: Lalle ni na yi amanna da yawan al'umma.

en: We will preserve this logic and this insight.
ha: Lalle za mu kiyaye wannan mahangar da kuma wannan mizanin.

en: Enemies, arrogant powers, occupiers and interferers exploited Muslim nations for many years. They also humiliated Muslim nations.
ha: Tsawon shekaru masu yawa, makiya da ma'abota girman kai da ‘yan mulkin mallaka sun amfana da al'ummar mu; sun wulakanta su da kaskantar da su.

en: This issue is one of the important issues whose result was not clarified for the people and they still have some questions about it in their minds.”
ha: Wannan lamari yana daga cikin batutuwan da har yanzu ba a yi wa mutane bayanin da ya dace kansu ba, alamun tambaya suna nan cikin kwakwalan mutane.

en: This is in the hands of nurses.
ha: Wannan yana hannunku ne.

en: Sometimes just because one has made a certain comment, one may want to repeat the same thing persistently and may feel ashamed of taking back one's comment. "May Allah curse obstinate people." There are some people who know the truth, yet they contribute to the enemies' positions.
ha: Sun fadi wata magana, su na so su ci gaba da tsayawa kyam a kan wannan magana, saboda suna jin kunya wajen janye wannan magana ta su; an ce: "Allah ya la'anci mai taurin kai". Akwai wadansu mutane wadanda sun san me ke gudana, sun san hakikanin abin da ke gudana, amma duk da haka suna taimakawa mahangar da ta saba wa hakan, wato mahangar makiya.

en: Imam (r.a.) gave this roadmap to us.
ha: Taswirar hanyar tana tare da Imam, sannan shi kuma ya gabatar mana da ita.

en: What does this suggest?
ha: Me wannan yake nunawa?

en: When a new idea - such as the idea of Islamic rule or Islamic Awakening - is proposed, it introduces new concepts into society.
ha: A lokacin da wani sabon tunani - a matsayin misali tunani na hukumar Musulunci da tsarin Musulunci da kuma farkawa ta Musulunci - ya kunno kai, to zai samar da wasu sabbin ma'anoni cikin al'umma.

en: Experience has shown that all of these things are possible and within the capacities of Muslim communities.
ha: Kwarewar da muke da ita ta tabbatar da cewa dukkanin wadannan abubuwan, abubuwa ne masu yiyuwa kuma ba za su fi karfin al'ummarmu ba.

en: An insightful person is one who listens and then thinks, one who looks and then perceives.
ha: Hakika mai basira shi ne wanda ya ji sannan ya yi tunani ya kalla sannan kuma ya gani.

en: They have a heavy responsibility.
ha: Gagarumin nauyin yake wuyansu shi ne wannan.

en: All our honorable people are familiar with the objectives, but it is necessary to reflect on them. The work that has been done is great.
ha: Dukkanin al'ummarmu sun ji su, to amma wajibi ne a yi tunani sosai a kansu. Wannan aikin, aiki ne mai girma; aiki ne mai muhimmanci.

en: After they lost their agents in these countries, they took two courses of action. One was opportunism, and the other was simulation. Through opportunism they tried to hijack these revolutions.
ha: Bayan da suka rasa mutanen su a wadannan kasashe, sai suka sanya wasu abubuwa guda biyu da suke son cimmawa a gabansu: na farko shi ne jiran tsammani, na biyu kuma shi ne kokarin haifar da makamancin wannan lamarin a wasu wajajen.

en: The arrogant powers are trying to promote Iranophobia and Islamophobia in the world through different policies.
ha: Ma'abota girman kai na duniya suna ta kokari ta hanyar amfani da siyasar su daban-daban wajen yada tsoron Iran da kuma tsoron Musulunci a duniya.

en: In general, one can see that these events ended in favor of the Iranian nation and they furthered the goals of our nation.
ha: A yanayi na gaba daya dai ana iya cewa dukkanin abubuwan da suka farun sun kasance masu amfani ne ga al'ummar Iran, sun taimaka musu wajen isa ga manufofin da suka sa a gaba.

en: When I look at the conditions of our country and our nation, I see a vast arena that is full of challenges, and the Iranian nation has been proud and victorious in this arena despite the will of the enemies.
ha: A lokacin da nake kallon yanayin kasar nan da yanayin al'ummarmu, ina kallon wani shararren fage ne da ke cike da kalubale, to sai kuma al'ummar Iran su ne suka sami nasara a wannan fagen duk kuwa da kiyayyar da makiya suke nunawa.

en: Compared with people of my age, it is easier for you dear youth to develop fear of God in your hearts. When you reach my age, things will become difficult for you unless you take care of them during your youth.
ha: A saboda wajibi ne a samo wannan siffar. Ku din nan matasa cikin sauki sama da ni za ku iya yin wannan aikin. A lokacin da kuka kai ga shekarun mu, idan har wani mutum ya yi wani abu a lokacin samartakansa, to hakan zai amfane shi; idan kuwa ba haka to lamarin zai zamanto masa da wahala.

en: These are the pillars and principles of the kind of piety that is expected of us.
ha: Tsoron Allah da ake fatan gani daga wajen mu suna daga cikin tushe da asasi na wannan tsoron Allah.

en: There are a few points that I should mention before answering this question.
ha: Don amsa wannan tambaya, da farko dai wajibi ne a yi karin bayani kan wasu batutuwa.

en: The concept of guardianship was embodied by Imam Hussein (a.s.) with all its dimensions and with all the necessary and possible means. This is not to say that others did not do such a thing or did not want to do such a thing, rather it means that this movement was fully realized in the behavior of the Lord of the Martyrs (a.s.) during his ten-year imamate.
ha: Hakika ana iya ganin wannan ma'ana - ta ba da kariya - da dukkanin bangarorinta, da dukkanin kayayyakin aikin da suka sawwaka cikin rayuwar Shugaban shahidai (amincin Allah ya tabbata a gare shi); ko da ya ke ba wai saura ba su aikata wani abu ba ne ko kuma ba sa son su aikata ba ne, face dai da wannan ma'ana ce ta cewa tushen wannan yunkuri ya tabbata ne cikin ayyukan shekaru goma na imamancin Shugaban shahidai (amincin Allah ya tabbata a gare shi).

en: And the Iranian nation managed to foil all these machinations through patience.
ha: Su ma al'ummar Iran ta hanyar wannan hakuri ne suka yi nasara a kan dukkanin makirce-makircen da ake kulla musu.

en: Of course, some people are trying very hard to create obstacles in the way of this unity, to arouse suspicions and to temp the people, but our people have thankfully understood this today.
ha: Koda yake akwai wasu mutane da suke kokari ba dare ba rana wajen haifar da matsala, su sanya yanayin rashin yarda da sanya waswasi, to amma alhamdu lillahi al'ummarmu a yau sun fahimci hakan.

en: But they supported and defended the dictator until the last moment. What happened was truly intolerable to America and the west.
ha: Abin da ya faru ga kasashen yammaci da kuma ita kanta Amurka, lalle abu ne da ba za su taba amincewa da shi ba.

en: Of course the central importance of economic matters does not mean that we should ignore other areas.
ha: Ko da yake ba da muhimmanci ga batun tattalin arziki da na fadi ba wai yana nufin a yi watsi da sauran bangarorin ba ne.

en: In different garrisons of the country, when a low-ranking member of the American military faced a senior Iranian officer, he used to address the Iranian officer like a master.
ha: A cikin wadannan barikokin soji daban-daban na kasar nan a kan sami wani karamin jami'i na can kasa-kasa na Amurka ya tsaya gaban wani janar na soji yana magana da shi cikin girman kai!

en: The holy life of the Prophet (s.w.a.) was put in danger and he was harmed.
ha: Sakamakon hakan rayuwar Manzon Allah (s.a.w.a.) ta kasance cikin hatsari, inda aka cutar da Ma'aiki.

en: These messages have tried to deepen and spread Islamic Awakening.
ha: A cikin wannan sakon ana kokari wajen fadada farkawa ta Musulunci da kuma yada ta.

en: For this reason, they do their best to stop us and if things get out of hand, they at least try to present a different story in their propaganda campaigns.
ha: A saboda haka idan har za su iya, to bai kamata su bari ba. Idan kuwa har ba za su iya yin hakan ba, to alal akalla su yi kokarin cimma hakan ta hanyar kafafen watsa labarai da farfagandarsu.

en: Leader’s Speech to Army Cadets - Khamenei.ir The following is the full text of the speech delivered by Ayatollah Khamenei on November 10, 2010 at the graduation ceremony held at Shahid Sattari University.
ha: Shimfida: A ranar laraba (10-11-2010) ce Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei ya halarci bikin yaye daliban jami'oin soji na Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran da aka gudanar da shi a jami'ar sojin sama ta Shahid Sattari.

en: Rather, the purpose of this fight is to help humanity achieve goodness, perfection, welfare and growth.
ha: Gwagwarmaya ce saboda dan'adamtaka - ba wai shi kansa mutum din ba - gwagwarmaya ce ta isa ga alheri da kamala da jin dadi da kai wa ga kololuwa ta ci gaba.

en: In a sense, the movement of humanity will start from that point.
ha: Idan har aka rasa akidar Mahdi, ma'anar hakan ita ce dukkanin kokarin annabawa, dukkanin wadannan kiraye-kiraye (na annabawa), dukkanin wadannan aiko manzanni da aka yi, dukkanin wannan kokari ba kama hannun yaro, dukkanin su za su zamanto ba su da fa'ida kenan, ba su da amfani. A saboda haka, batun akidar Mahdi wani lamari ne na asali; yana daga cikin tushen masaniya ta Ubangiji.

en: The same is true of regional countries.
