ha: Shekara da shekaru kenan da kare wannan kallafaffen yaki, to amma ba a rufe kofar shahada ba; har ya zuwa yanzu muna iya ganin yadda iyalai suke daukar wahalhalun mutanen da aka bude musu kofofin shahadar, suna tafiya da shigarta.

en: He added that the police cannot be made invulnerable except through adhering to religious principles. Ayatollah Khamenei said that the situation of the police has improved a lot since last year and added: "Our police officials and commanders should not be satisfied with the current level of success, rather they should make efforts to reach the peak."
ha: Ayatullah Khamenei ya kara da cewa yanayin ‘yan sanda a halin yanzu nesa ba kusa ba ya fi na shekarun da suka gabata don haka ne ya kirayi ‘yan sandan da cewa: Bai kamata kwamandoji da sauran jami'an ‘yan sanda su takaita da wannan ci gaban da aka samu din ba, wajibi ne su ci gaba da himma don samun damar isa ga kololuwar da ake son isa gare ta.

en: Leader’s Address to People Active in Economic Sector - Khamenei.ir The following is the full text of the speech delivered on August 18, 2011 by Ayatollah Khamenei the Leader of the Islamic Revolution in a meeting with a number of people from economic sectors of the country.
ha: Jawabin Jagora Yayin Ganawa Da Masu Gudanar Da Ayyuka A Bangaren Tattalin Arziki Shimfida: A ranar laraba 17, Augustan 2011 wacce ta yi daidai da ranar 16 ga watan Ramalana mai alfarma ne, Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei ya gana da wasu daga cikin masu gudanar da ayyukansu a bangaren tattalin arziki, jami'an gwamnati da sauran ‘yan kasuwa inda suka tattauna kan yanayin tattalin arzikin kasar Iran.

en: Islam is still the essence and content of the movement of our system and democracy is the form and the framework.
ha: A ko da yaushe Musulunci ya kasance tushe sannan kuma mabubbuga ta asali ta yunkuri wannan tsari na mu; yanayinsa kuma yanayi ne na demokradiyya, ba kuma za a iya taba raba su ba.

en: The primary goal of the law is to distribute subsidies in a fair way. The government distributes subsidies among the people.
ha: Manufa mai muhimmanci na wannan aikin, a matakin farko, ita ce raba irin rangwamin da gwamnati take bayarwa tsakanin mutane cikin adalci.

en: This is true of all areas. We have made progress in all areas.
ha: Haka lamarin ya ke a dukkanin fagage; lalle mun ci gaba.

en: This led to the opposite of what our enemies wanted and showed that not only is the Islamic Republic not isolated but that people of the world hold the Islamic Republic, Islamic Iran and the honorable Iranian nation in high regard.
ha: Wato ba wai kawai ba a kaurace wa Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran ba ne, face dai duniya tana ganin Jamhuriyar Musulunci da kuma kasar Musulunci ta Iran da idon girmamawa ne.

en: This is a very important thing.
ha: Don haka, wannan lamari ne mai muhimmancin gaske.

en: By Allah's favor, if there is time, I will say a few sentences in this regard at the end of my speech.
ha: Idan har daga karshen magana ta akwai lokaci zan yi karin haske kan wannan lamarin, insha Allah.

en: In areas relating to health and medicine, Iranian patients who had the money had to travel to Europe for slightly complicated operations, and those who did not have the money had to die.
ha: A fagen kiwon lafiya da magunguna, saboda dan wani karamin ciwo ko aikin tiyata, wajibi ne marasa lafiyanmu su tafi asibitocin kasashen Turai, idan suna da kudi kenan, idan kuwa ba su da shi, to sai dai su mutu.

en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
ha: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai

en: The Leader of the Islamic Revolution reiterated that the Bahraini government and the countries which have deployed their forces in Bahrain have made a mistake. Ayatollah Khamenei said that events in Libya are another example of the oppression of the arrogant powers against the people of other countries. "Westerners do not want a populist and Islamic government in Libya, a country which is close to Europe and is full of oil resources.
ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya ci gaba da cewa: Baya ga hukumar Bahrain din, su ma wadanda suka zo kasar daga waje sun yi kuskure. Har ila yau kuma Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya bayyana abin da ke faruwa a kasar Libiya a matsayin wani bangare na zaluncin da manyan kasashen duniyan ma'abota girman kai suke yi wa al'umma inda ya ce: Kasashen yammaci dai ba sa son ganin an kafa wata hukuma ta musulmi a kasar Libya wacce take kusa da kasashen Turai, a saboda haka ne suka dau siyasar wasa da hankalin al'ummar Libiya.

en: In this year as always, there are both opportunities and threats.
ha: A wannan shekarar ma kamar yadda aka saba, akwai dama da kuma barazana da kalubale.

en: It is the protest of a nation against the oppression that is being imposed on it, just like what happened in Tunisia and Egypt and just like what is happening in Libya and Yemen: there is no difference.
ha: Nuna rashin amincewar wata al'umma ce da zaluncin da ake yi mata; kamar abin da ya faru a kasar Tunusiya, kamar yadda ya faru a Masar, kamar abubuwan da suke faruwa a kasar Libiya, haka nan tamkar abin da ke faruwa ne a Yemen; babu wani bambanci.

en: You should be prepared.
ha: Don haka wajibi ne ku zamanto cikin shiri.

en: Find you own way by resorting to the blessed fountainhead of Islam and give back foreigners' prescriptions to themselves.
ha: Ku sama wa kanku mafita ta hanyar dogaro da koyarwar Musulunci sannan ku mayar wa bakin haure abin da suka zo muku da shi.

en: This oppression was the result of the weakness of incompetent, corrupt and materialistic monarchies and the dynamism that their enemies enjoyed.
ha: Raunin hukumar sarakuna maras dacewa mai son duniya da kuma irin makircin da makiya suke aikatawa shi ne dalilin faruwar wannan zaluncin.

en: All these areas are important and necessary. By Allah's favor, working on these areas is indeed a genuine charitable act that will be accepted by Allah the Exalted.
ha: Dukkanin wadannan ayyuka ne masu muhimmanci, ayyuka ne na wajibi sannan kuma alal hakika aiki a wadannan bangarori wata ciyarwa ce ta hakika sannan kuma sadaka ce abar karbuwa a wajen Allah Madaukakin Sarki, insha Allahu.

en: Of course, I am not claiming that this is definitely the case everywhere because I do not have all the necessary information. The situation might be different in a particular corner of the world.
ha: Ko da yake ni dai ba zan iya ikirarin cewa a hakikanin gaskiya haka lamarin ya ke a duk fadin duniyar ba, don kuwa ba ni da cikakkiyar masaniya; mai yiyuwa ne lamarin ya zamanto ba haka yake a nan da can ba - to amma abin da muka gani da kuma ji, a mafi yawan lokuta haka lamarin yake a duniya.

en: Of course they try to keep the world of Islam busy.
ha: Koda yake suna iyakacin kokarinsu wajen ganin sun shagaltar da duniyar musulmi.

en: These different mountains of problems that oppressed people across the world are faced with will not be eliminated unless through the willpower and firm determination of believers.
ha: Idan ba tare da azama da karfafffiyar irada ta imani ba, ba za a iya kawar da wannan matsaloli daban-daban da suke kawo cikas ga hanyar raunanan duniya ba.

en: The western world, which is enslaved by the hegemony of material power, is frustrated today.
ha: Kasashen yammaci ma wadanda suka fada tarkon ikon abin duniya, su ma dai sun fara damuwa.

en: You are young.
ha: Ku din nan matasa ne.

en: Your youthful view, your sincere worship, your repentance, your divine remembrance, your appeal for divine assistance and your solemn praying are very effective.
ha: Irin wannan mahanga ta samartaka da kuke da ita, duk wata magana ta zuci da za ku yi da Allah, duk wani istigfari da hailala da takbiri da neman taimako da kankan da kai a gaban Allah Madaukakin Sarki, wani lamari ne mai tasirin gaske a wajenku.

en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
ha: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai

en: It is 35 years now that we in the Islamic Republic are letting out this cry. We do not only speak, rather we act.
ha: Shekaru 35 kenan a nan Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran mu ke rera wannan take (na hadin kai); ba wai kawai a baki ba, a aikace ma mun aikata hakan.

en: That is to say, the assassinations should be seen as a link in the chain of the enemy's plots. There are several integrated levels of action, including economic sanctions, promotion of corruption, promotion of addiction, security measures and undermining the faith of the people - both their faith in Islam and their faith in the Revolution.
ha: Akwai wata alaka tsakaninsu, wato a matsayin misali tsakanin silsilar takunkumin tattalin arziki, yada lalata, yada muggan kwayoyi, hare-hare, haifar da rauni da girgiza cikin tushe da lamurra na akida; shin akida ta Musulunci ne ko kuma akida ta juyin juya halin Musulunci.

en: They should not provoke each other's feelings, they should not insult each other's holy beliefs and they should not fuel the fire of discord between Muslim tribes and groups - particularly between Shia and Sunni - because this is what the enemies of Islam want.
ha: Kada su motsa da sosa ran junansu, kada su ci zarafin ababe masu tsarki na junansu, kada su hura wutar fitina da rikici tsakanin mazhabobi da kungiyoyi na musulmi musamman tsakanin Shi'a da Sunna - wanda hakan shi ne abin da makiya Musulunci suke so.

en: Allah the Exalted will definitely help the people whose efforts, work and determination have this orientation, just the way He has assisted us during the past 32 years. Without God's assistance it was not possible for a nation to stand up against global arrogance. There are rich sources of natural gas in this region, which we share with the neighboring countries.
ha: Idan ba tare da irada ta Ubangiji ba, babu yadda za a yi wata al'umma ta iya irin wannan tsayin dakan a gaban ma'abota girman kan duniya. A wannan yanki da ke da arzikin iskar gas, lalle muna da abokan tarayya; ni dai ba na son in yi amfani da kalmar abokan hamayya (ga kasashen da suke makwabtaka da mu).

en: On my trips to different cities, as far as I am concerned one of the greatest and most important meetings is the meetings that are arranged with the honorable families of our martyrs and war veterans.
ha: A wajena daya daga cikin mafiya muhimmancin ganawa a dukkanin ziyarar da na ke kai wa garuruwa daban-daban, ita ce ganawa da iyalan shahidai, masu sadaukarwa da kuma wadanda suka sami raunuka.

en: Before the elections and the fitna that followed, some people - who had successfully passed the test of fitna - used to come to me and say that the year 1388 would be a difficult time in terms of economic matters. They used to present the situation as gloomy, disappointing and overwhelming.
ha: Kafin fara zabe da wannan lamari na fitinar da ta kunno kai, wasu daga cikin wadanda suka taka rawa cikin wannan fitina, suna zuwa wajenmu suna gaya mana cewa lalle shekara mai zuwa za ta zamanto shekara mai wahala - wato wannan shekarar ta 2009 - a fagen tattalin arziki kaza ne zai faru, yanayin da ake ciki yanayi ne da ke cike da matsaloli wadanda ba za a iya maganinsu ba.

en: In his official addresses, the American president speaks about Iran's economic problems as if he is speaking about his victories.
ha: (A kwanakin baya) shugaban kasar Amurka, a cikin jawabin da ya yi, ya yi magana kan matsalolin tattalin arzikin da Iran take fuskanta; tamkar yana magana ne kan irin nasararorin da ya samu.

en: The Revolution is moving in this direction.
ha: A wannan fagen kan juyin nan yana ci gaba da tafiya ne.

en: The late Chamran employed them.
ha: Marigayi Chamran ne ya dauke su aiki.

en: The spiritual spring of Hajj has arrived with its freshness, purity and God-given grandeur and majesty, gathering again the faithful and eager hearts like butterflies encircling the Ka'bah of divine unity and Islamic solidarity. Camped at Makkah and Mina, Arafat and Mash'ar are the fortunate human beings who, having responded to the call of â€œproclaim the Hajj to all the peopleâ€, are being honored with the hospitality of the clement and munificent Lord.
ha: A halin yanzu dai lokacin aikin hajji da dukkanin sabuntaka da tsarki da girma da daukaka da yake da shi ya yi, sannan kuma zukatan muminai masu tsananin shauki suna nan tamkar malam buda littafi suna ta zagaya Dakin Ka'aba, wannan daki na tauhidi da hadin kai. Garin Makka da Mina da Mash'ar da Arafa wajaje ne na mutanen da suka sami nasara amsa kiran-kur'ani da ke cewa: "Kuma ka yi yekuwa ga mutane da wajabcin Hajji..." sannan kuma suka sami shiga cikin bakuntaka ta Ubangiji Ma'abocin gafara da baiwa.

en: The Leader of the Islamic Revolution described insulting the tomb of Hujr ibn Adi, the Holy Prophet's (s.w.a.) companion, as a tragic event, stressing: "Muslims - particularly scientific, political and religious personalities of the world of Islam - should carry out their responsibility in the face of this malevolent move and they should prevent the fire of fitna from spreading." Ayatollah Khamenei described elections as the great manifestation of national and Islamic trust, adding: "The Guardian Council, organizations in charge of holding and supervising elections and organizations in charge of creating a safe and healthy environment for elections are responsible for safeguarding this great trust. They have important and valuable responsibilities which will exert a permanent influence on the country."
ha: Har ila yau kuma yayin da ya ke magana kan lamari mai bakanta rai da ya faru a kasar Siriya na keta hurumin kabarin babban sahabin nan Hijr bn Adi, Jagoran cewa ya yi: Wajibi ne al'ummar musulmi musamman manyan cikinsu da suka hada malamai da sauran ‘yan siyasa sun sauke nauyin da ke wuyansu na fada da wannan bakar aniya ta masu kafirta musulmi, sannan kuma su yi abin da za su iya wajen hana yaduwa wutar wannan fitinar. Jagoran juyin juya halin Musuluncin ya bayyana zaben a matsayin wata amana mai girma ta kasa da kuma Musulunci yana mai cewa: majalisar kiyaye kundin tsarin mulki da sauran cibiyoyi masu sanya ido da kuma tabbatar da tsaro suna dauke da wannan amana ce mai girma, kamar yadda wannan aiki mai girma da muhimmanci kuma yake wuyansu ne. Har ila yau yayin da yake ishara da rawar da zabe ya ke takawa wajen sayar rayar da kasa da kuma tsarin Jamhuriyar Musulunci, Ayatullah Khamenei cewa ya yi: Fitowar al'umma a lokacin zabubbukan da aka gudanar tsawon shekaru 34 da suka gabata (a Iran), a koda yaushe sun kasance masu kore wasu bala'oi daga kasar Iran da kuma kara karfin gwuiwa ga kasa, al'umma da kuma wannan juyi na Musulunci ne.

en: The Commander of the Faithful (a.s.) said, "Daily prayers are a means for every pious man to get closer to God."
ha: Amirul Muminin (a.s) yana fadin cewa: (salla tana) "kusata dukkanin wani mai tsoron Allah zuwa ga Ubangiji" shi kansa hakan lamari ne da ke kusata mutum.

en: Ayatollah Khamenei said that certain developments in the past few months have revealed the power of the Iraqi people and government in the Arab and Muslim world.
ha: Jagoran ya bayyana cewar wasu batutuwa da suka faru a kasar Irakin cikin 'yan watannin baya-bayan nan lamurra ne da suke nuni da irin karfin da al'umma da kuma gwamnatin Irakin suke da shi a kasashen larabawa da na musulmi.

en: By Allah's favor, everybody will work hard.
ha: Muna fatan kowa zai kara himma.

en: It is necessary to help promote justice.
ha: Haka nan kuma wajibi ne a taimaka wa ci gaban adalci.

en: Today his ideas are still alive and novel even after the passage of 30 years since his martyrdom.
ha: A yau din nan bayan shekaru talatin da shahadar wannan babban mutum, amma maganganunsa suna nan kamar na yau; kamar yau aka rubuta su.

en: In the year 1358, when our magnanimous Imam (r.a.) had been hospitalized, a temporary platform was built in front of the hospital and a few units of the Army paraded past the platform and Imam Khomeini (r.a.) announced the day as Army Day.
ha: A wancan lokacin a shekarar 1358 (1979) Imam ya kasance yana asibiti a kwance, a nan gaban asibitin aka shirya wani waje sannan sojoji suka zo suka yi fareti sannan kuma Imam ya sanar da wannan ranar a matsayin ranar sojoji. Lalle ina da masaniya dangane da yanayin sojoji.

en: This was a perfect instance of self-sacrifice and it safeguarded Islam.
ha: Wannan shi ne sadaukarwa ta gaba daya sannan da kuma kiyaye Musulunci.

en: The first occasion that the 13th of Aban represents is the day when our magnanimous Imam (r.a.) was forced into exile in the year 1343.
ha: Batu na farko da ya faru a wannan ranar shi ne cewa a shekarar 1343 (1964) a irin wannan ranar ce (tsohuwar gwamnatin Shah), ta tilasta wa Imaminmu mai girma gudun hijira.

en: Imam Khamenei's message of condolences to the President - Khamenei.ir
ha: A yammacin yau Asabar (9-3-2013) ne Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei ya fitar da sakon ta'aziyyar rasuwar babban malami, marubuci sannan kuma wakilin Jagoran a garin Lorestan, Hujjatul Islam wal Muslimin Hajj Sayyid Mujtaba Musawi Lari:

en: This cannot be achieved except with the cooperation, understanding and solidarity of Islamic countries.
ha: Ba kuma za sa sami kaiwa ga hakan ba sai ta hanyar hadin kai da aiki kafada da kafada tsakanin kasashen musulmi.

en: The nature of the issue in Syria is different from the nature of the issue in these countries.
ha: Akwai bambanci tsakanin abin da ke faruwa a kasar Siriya da abin da ke faruwa a sauran kasashen.

en: Independence, freedom, justice, refusal to bow to despotism and colonialism, rejection of ethnic, racial, and religious discrimination, and the outright rejection of Zionism, which, today, comprise the pivots of the movements in Islamic countries, are all inspired by Islam and the Quran.
ha: ‘Yanci, ‘yanci kai, neman tabbatar da adalci, rashin mika kai ga mulkin kama-karya da mulkin mallaka, kore nuna bambanci na kabilanci da launin fata da mazhana da kuma rashin amincewa da sahyoniyanci, dukkanin wadannan tushe ne na asali na yunkuri da juyin juya halin kasashen musulmi na yau, sannan kuma dukkanin su sun samo asali ne daga Musulunci da kuma Alkur'ani.

en: They considered it to be the greatest rally in the world. Who had such an opinion?
ha: Ta yadda suka bayyana shi a matsayin taro mafi girma a duniya. Waye suka fadi hakan?

en: I hope Allah the Exalted makes us successful in following this path and protecting ourselves against deviations.
ha: Ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da Ya ba mu dacewar ci gaba da tafiya a kan wannan tafarki da kyau, ya kare mu daga kauce wa hanya, don mu sami damar isa ga wannan babbar manufa sannan kuma mu zamanto cikin addu'oin mai girma Bakiyatullah (rayukanmu su zamanto fansa a gare shi).

en: What the responsibility of Muslims - whether Shia or Sunni Muslims - is, is that they should not help the enemy by provoking the feelings of one another.
ha: Nauyin da ke wuyan musulmi - shin musulmi ‘yan Shi'ane, ko kuma musulmi ‘yan Sunna - shi ne su fahimci cewa sosa zukatan junansu wani lamari ne da zai taimaka wa makiya cimma burinsu.

en: In fact, all the tests that we go through involve one essential element - all tests involve a sacrifice.
ha: Dukkanin jarabawan da muke ji, wannan shi ne yanayinsa na asali; ya kan sanya mana wani tafarki na sadaukarwa da kuma runtse idanuwa.

en: No, time passes like a flash and soon it will be time to leave this world. If you want to do something with this short life, you should prepare the way while you are young.
ha: Ina, cikin gaggawa za su wuce; daga nan kuma sai maganar tafiya. Idan har cikin dan wannan karamin lokaci an tsara mutum zai sami damar aikata wani abu, ya sami damar rike wani guzuri, to wajibi ne tun lokacin samartakansa ya samar da hakan.

en: They used to say something else. They had a different analysis.
ha: Wani abu na daban su ke fadi, ko kuma suna da wata fassara ta daban.

en: Of course there were also certain pseudo-revolutions in the Middle East region and mostly in North Africa and Latin America, which were not genuine revolutions.
ha: Mun shaidi wasu yunkuri makamantan juyin juya hali da suka faru a yankin gabas ta tsakiya da kuma arewacin Afirka da Latin Amurka wadanda alal hakika ba wai juyin juya hali ba ne; a mafi yawan lokuta juyin mulki ne.

en: [The Holy Quran, 74: 1-7]
ha: (Suratul Muddathir 74:1-7).

en: And if you do not do anything about this laziness, it will increase.
ha: Gwargwadon yadda mutum ya share wa wannan ragwantakar fage, gwargwadon yadda za ta ci gaba da karuwa.

en: If a nation enjoys such insight and such patience, it will definitely reach the peaks.
ha: Idan har aka sami irin wannan basirar da kuma irin wannan hakurin cikin al'umma, to ko shakka babu wannan al'umma za ta kai ga kololuwar da take son kai wa gare ta.

en: This is the way in which production of knowledge contributes to national wealth and addresses the needs of the people.
ha: Hakan mayar tafarkin samar da ilimi zuwa ga dukiya ta kasa ne da kuma biyan bukatun mutane.

en: Therefore, they are making efforts to portray Shia Muslims as a group that does not belong to the Muslim world."
ha: A saboda haka ne suke iyakacin kokarinsu wajen fitar da miliyoyin ‘yan Shi'a daga cikin duniyar musulmi.

en: As the dear youth said, I just want to tell you that Allah the Exalted will reward you and He will help you, your families and your relatives benefit from divine blessings and the prayers of the Imam of the Age (may our souls be sacrificed for his sake). Greetings be upon you and Allah's mercy and blessings
ha: Ina gode wa Allah, sannan kuma kamar yadda wannan matashi mai girma wanda a cikin abin da ya karanta ya bayyana cewar manufar zuwa ta ita ce yi muku ban gajiya da neman kara muku karfin gwuiwa, ina son in gaya muku cewa ya kamata ku san cewa ladar wannan kokari na ku yana nan a kiyaye a wajen Allah Madaukakin Sarki, sannan ku din nan da kuma iyalanku ko shakka babu kuna cikin tausayawa da kuma falala ta Ubangiji, sannan kuma insha Allahu za ku zamanto cikin addu'oin mai girma Bakiyatullah (rayukanmu su zamanto fansa a gare shi).

en: However, individual orientations and organizational orientations have different meanings. When the orientation of a society or organization is wrong, individual efforts will not be effective in that society, no matter how strenuous they are.
ha: A lokacin da mahanga ta gaba daya ta wata hukuma da wata al'umma ta zamanto bisa kuskure, to kuwa mahanga ta daidaiku komai yawansu a cikin wannan gungun ko hukumar, ba za ta zamanto mai wata sakamako mai kyau ba.

en: Therefore, if we follow the path of God, He will undoubtedly help us."
ha: Kuma matukar muka kasance tare da Allah Madaukakin Sarki, ko shakka babu Allah Madaukakin Sarki zai kasance tare da mu.

en: Jaafar Nimeiry gradually changed from an anti-west element who had carried out a coup against his pro-western government to a western puppet and mercenary.
ha: Ja'afar Numeiri ya kasance wani mutum mai kyamar yammaci wanda ya yi juyin mulki ga wata hukuma ta yammaci, amma daga baya ya zamanto wani yaron kasashen yammaci kuma dan amshin shatansu.

en: They said this in their meetings with us and in the interviews they gave. They also said the same thing when they returned to their home countries.
ha: Sun gaya mana hakan, sannan kuma cikin hirar da suka yi da kafafen watsa labarai duk sun fadi hakan, haka nan kuma al'ummominsu duk sun gaskata hakan bayan da suka koma gida.

en: Some people used to pretend that if we sit at the negotiating table with the Americans, many of our problems will be solved.
ha: Jagoran ya ci gaba da cewa: Wasu mutane suna ganin idan har muka zauna teburin tattaunawa da Amurkawa, lalle za a iya magance da dama daga cikin matsaloli.

en: Were the interests of America served by the mercenary soldiers who shot the people, dismembered their bodies and took pictures with the body parts?
ha: Shin akwai kare manufofin Amurka cikin yadda sojojin (kasar) suke zuwa su bude wuta kan al'umma, su keta hurumin gawawwakinsu sannan kuma su dinga daukan hotona tare da su?

en: We have made good advances in sectors related to production, services, agriculture, industry, knowledge-based industries and different other areas which were discussed in this meeting.
ha: Mun sami ci gaba da kyau a bangaren samar da kayayyakin da ake bukata, a bangaren hidima, a bangaren aikin gona, a bangaren masana'antu da sauran bangarori na ilimi da sauransu da aka ambace su a nan.

en: Now, I am going home with complete health.
ha: A zahiri dai ga shi zan koma gida cikin koshin lafiya.

en: And the facilities that we currently have at our disposal are not comparable to the facilities we used to have at the beginning of the Revolution - or before the Revolution for that matter. Nor are our facilities comparable to many of the countries that did not have to deal with the difficulties we have faced - the countries that have pinned their hopes on the assistance of foreigners and their enemies.

ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya bayyana farin ciki da jin dadinsa dangane da irin yadda ake samun ci gaban take da kuma bukatu na Musulunci a tsakanin al'ummomin musulmi.

en: And I hope you dear teachers will further this goal optimistically by relying on Allah the Exalted and expecting divine reward, grace, and guidance.
ha: Sannan ku kuma malamai masu girma a duk inda kuke a duk fadin kasar nan, ta hanyar fata da kuma dogaro da Allah Madaukakin Sarki da kuma rahama da shiriyarsa da lada ta Ubangiji za ku ci gaba da riko da wannan aiki.

en: Therefore, elections are the manifestation of faith in God, faith in the people and faith in oneself.
ha: A saboda haka zabe alama ce ta yarda da Allah, haka nan alama ce ta yarda da mutane, kamar yadda kuma alama ce ta yarda da kai.

en: Also, the principles of Imam (r.a.) require that we resist melting into the global economy and that we preserve independence of our national economy.
ha: Haka nan kuma koyarwar Imam ta bukace mu da mu ki amincewa da narkewa cikin tattalin arzikin duniya; da kuma cewa wajibi ne mu kiyaye ‘yancin kai cikin tattalin arziki na kasa.

en: Current and previous leaders of the Zionist regime openly take pride in their history of terror and - in certain cases - their participation in terrorist activities.
ha: Shugabannin haramtacciyar kasar Isra'ila na da da na yanzu suna alfahari da ayyukan ta'addancin da suka aikata da hannayensu kai hatta a wasu lokuta ma suna alfahari da yin tarayyarsu cikin aiwatar da wasu ayyukan ta'addancin.

en: Before instilling a sense of confidence into the people of Iran, Imam (r.a.) first revived this sense of self-confidence in himself. He exhibited his faith in his capabilities in the true sense of the word. On the anniversary of Ashura in the year 1342, while he was alone, Imam (r.a.) threatened the Shah that he would ask the people of Iran to force him out of the country if he continued acting like that.
ha: Ya bayyanar wa duniya irin karfin da yake da shi. A ranar Ashurar 1342, duk da matsin lamba, haka Imam ya bayyana a gaban dalibai da mutanen Kum a makarantar Faiziyya, ya yi wa sarki Muhammad Ridha Shah, wanda ya dogara da Amurka da masu takama da karfi na waje, wanda kuma yake gudanar da mulki ba tare da wani kaidi ko sharadi ba, ya yi masa barazana cewa matukar ka ci gaba da abin da kake yi, to kuwa zan gaya wa mutane da su kore ka daga Iran.

en: We should feel the transient nature of the day and nights of our life.
ha: Wajibi ne mu dinga jin yadda sa'oi na rayuwarmu da kuma ranaku da darare suke tafiya.

en: That man of steel was not shaken by the flood of harms and events that were enough to shake a nation. The power and awe of global powers were hollow to that man. But before the greatness of God, he used to shed tears like that when praying and asking God for help.
ha: Ku duba ku ga wannan mutumin wanda abubuwan da suke faruwa cikin rayuwa wadanda suke girgiza wata al'umma amma ko da wasa ba sa girgiza shi. Wannan mutumin da irin girma da iko masu karfi na duniya ba su da wani tasiri a gare shi, amma shi ne wannan mutumin da a gaban girma ta Ubangiji a lokaci da yake addu'a da neman gafara ya ke zubar da irin wannan hawayen.

en: The Leader of the Islamic Revolution said that the effect of teachers on the individual and social characteristics of children and adolescents is far beyond the effect of parents, media, social factors, genetic inheritance, morality, and spirituality. "Having such a prominent role, teachers can educate faithful, motivated, patient, hopeful, innovative, thoughtful, and scholarly individuals who are committed to pursuing public interests and reaching the peaks of individual and social perfection."
ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya bayyana cewa gudummawa da tasirin malami wajen gina shaksiyyar yara da matasa ta daidaiku da ta al'umma ta ketare irin wadda iyaye da kafafen watsa labarai da sauran hanyoyi na zamantakewa da gado yana mai cewa: Malami da irin wannan gudummawar da yake bayarwa zai iya tarbiyantar da wani mutum mumini mai kumaji, ma'abocin hakuri, mai kyakkyawan fata ga gobe, mai kokarin tabbatar da ababen amfanin al'umma, mai kaunar isa ga kolin kamala ta daidaiku da ta al'ummance, mai kirkiran sabbin abubuwa, mai tunani sannan kuma ma'abocin bincike.

en: Pay attention to this point. This is one side of the issue. Another side of the issue is that it is wrong to resort to certain restrictive regulations in order to derail and isolate innovative movements that originate from the basiji spirit.
ha: Wannan a wannan bangaren kenan, a daya bangaren kuma akwai wadansu mutane don su mai da wannan yunkuri na sabuntawa da yunkurin da ya samo asali daga ruhi na Basiji gefe da saniyar ware, sai suke yin karen tsare wa wasu daga cikin dokoki; wannan ma a daya bangaren kenan.

en: However, the 15th of Khordad of 1342 was a very important juncture.
ha: To amma duk da hakan, ranar 15 ga watan Khordad wani lokaci ne mai matukar muhimmanci.

en: Ayatollah Khamenei said that combining Iranian art and capabilities will prepare the ground for improving the quality of domestic products and added: "Certain domestic products can rival similar foreign products, and certain other domestic products are far better than similar foreign products. It is necessary to achieve this quality in all domestic products."
ha: Ayatullah Khamenei ya kara da cewa: Wasu daga cikin kayayyakin da ake yi na cikin gida suna da karfin yin gasa da na kasashen waje a wasu lokutan ma sun fi na wajen kyau, wanda wajibi ne a samar da wannan siffa ga sauran kayayyakin da ake da su a cikin gidan.

en: The Ali ibn Abi Talib Army was one of the successful armies during the Sacred Defense Era, and it was a pioneer.
ha: Wannan bataliya ta Aliyu bn Abi Talib (ta garin Kum) wacce tana daga cikin bataliyoyin da suka sami nasarori da lokacin kallafaffen yaki ta kasance a sahun gaba.

en: Had it not been for the military intervention of NATO and America, victory of people might have been delayed, but all these infrastructures would not have been damaged, and innocent women and children killed and then enemies that were accomplices of Qaddafi would not have been able to intervene in this innocent war-torn nation.
ha: Idan ba don amfani da karfin soji da Amurka da kungiyar NATO suka yi a kasar Libiya ba, mai yiyuwa ne nasarar da al'umma suka samu ya dan yi jinjiri, to amma a bangare guda kuma da ba za a lalata kasar irin yadda aka lalata ta a halin yanzu ba, da ba a kashe irin wadannan rayuka da ba su ci ba su sha ba na daga mata da kananan yara, sannan kuma da wadannan makiya wadanda shekara da shekaru suka kasance tare da Gaddafi da ba su yi da'awar cewa suna da hakkin tsoma baki cikin harkokin cikin gidan wannan kasa da aka zalunta sannan kuma aka lalata ba.

en: Several years ago, when I wrote letters to the heads of the three branches of government and warned of economic corruption, certain people were alarmed that my warnings would scare off the potential investors.
ha: Yan shekarun da suka gabata a lokacin da na rubuta wa shugabannin bangarori uku na gwamnati wasika dangane da batun almundahana da cin hanci da rashawa da jaddada wajibcin fada da hakan, wasu sun tsorata suna cewa mai yiyuwa ne hakan ya kashe gwuiwan masu zuba jari.

en: The friends and enemies of the Iranian nation should know that this nation has found its path and will remove all obstacles on its way to reach the peaks of success and prosperity by relying on God and their God-given power.
ha: Ya kamata masoya da makiya al'ummar Iran su san cewa wannan al'umma (ta Iran) ta fahimci tafarkin da take kai sannan kuma ta kuduri aniyarta sannan kuma ta hanyar dogaro da Allah da kuma karfin da Allah Ya ba ta za ta ci gaba da bin wannan tafarkin na isa ga kololuwan ci gaba da sa'ada, sannan kuma za ta kawar da duk wata cikas da ke kan wannan tafarki.

en: Our martyrs and disabled war veterans as well as their families passed the most difficult test on this path.
ha: Lalle shahidai, sojojin da suka sami raunuka, fursunonin yakin da aka sako su da kuma iyalansu sun ba da gagarumar jarrabawa a wannan tafarkin.

en: I hope that Allah the Exalted gives you and us the blessing to carry out our responsibilities.
ha: Ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da Ya ba ku da kuma mu dacewar sauke nauyin da ke wuyanmu.

en: If somebody manages to identify the needs and tries to fill the gaps, his efforts are highly valuable. This is how Mr. Qara'ati has acted.
ha: Amma a lokacin da wani mutum ya sami damar gano bukatun da ake da su da kuma gibin da ake da shi sannan kuma ya yi gagarumar himma wajen ganin an cike wannan gibin, to kimar da ke cikin wannan aikin ya kan karu.

en: The only thing that restricts the president in our country is the law.
ha: Iyakan da kawai yake da ita, ita ce iyaka ta doka.

en: And America, its regional puppets and its guard dog â€“ the Zionist regime â€“ should know that the response of the Iranian nation to any kind of aggression, attacks or even threats will be a response that will make them collapse from within.
ha: Kuma wajibi ne su san cewa; Amurka ta sani, haka nan 'yan amshin shatanta haka nan kuma wannan kurar dajin ta su a wannan yanki wato haramtacciyar kasar Isra'ila su kwana da sanin cewa; martanin da al'ummar Iran za su mayar ga duk wani hari, duk wani wuce gona da iri, kai duk wata barazana ma, martani ne da zai ruguza su daga ciki da kuma kawo karshensu.

en: Today - which is the birthday anniversary of the Holy Prophet (s.w.a.) - we should learn his lessons.
ha: Yau dai, wacce ran ace ta haihuwar Annabi (s.a.w.a), yana da kyau mu dau darasi daga rayuwarsa.

en: The most obvious sign of it is the enthusiasm of public opinion, especially among young people, to revive the glory and greatness of Islam, to become aware of the nature of the international order of domination and to remove the mask from the shameless, oppressive and arrogant face of the governments and centers that have been pressuring the Islamic and non-Islamic East in their clutches for more than two hundred years and have been exposing nations to their brutal and aggressive thirst for power disguised with the mask of civilization and culture.
ha: Mafi girman alamar hakan ita ce irin kumajin da al'umma musamman matasa suke nunawa wajen rayar da irin daukakar da Musulunci yake da ita, da kuma masaniyar da suka samu dangane da yanayin tsarin mulkin mallaka na duniya da kuma bayyanar bakar fuskar azzaluman gwamnatoci ma'abota girman kai da cibiyoyin da sama da shekaru dari biyu suka lankwame kasashen Musulunci da ma wadanda ba na musulmin ba da kuma ci gaba da zaluntar wadannan al'ummomi. Bangarorin wannan farkawa mai albarka suna da girma sannan sun fadada.

en: It is wrong to think that it was our resistance and steadfastness that made them determined in their enmity.
ha: Lamarin ba shi ne cewa a halin yanzu da muka yi tsayin daka, hakan ya sanya su tada jijiyoyin wuya.

en: This was how Imam Hussein (a.s.) acted as a guardian.
ha: Wannan shi ne tsayin daka da kuma kariya ta Imam Husaini (a.s).

en: Faithful men and women throughout the Islamic world, particularly in Egypt, Tunisia and Libya should make the most of this opportunity in order to create an international Islamic power bloc.
ha: Yana da kyau maza da mata muminai a duk fadin kasashen musulmi musamman a kasashen Masar da Tunusiya da Libiya su yi amfani da wannan dama wajen kafa wani karfi na Musulunci na kasa da kasa.

en: I prayed many times to Allah the Exalted to give more strength to all those who are in charge the elections: members of Assembly of Experts, the government, the Ministry of Interior, the officials in charge of security matters who managed to ensure the security of the elections, the officials in charge of public relations, the IRIB and others.
ha: A lokuta da dama na kan yi addu'ar cewa Allah ya ba su karfi da iyawa wajen gudanar da wannan aiki, su kansu haka nan kuma ga gwamnati da ma'aikatar cikin gida, haka nan jami'an tsaro wadanda suka sami damar tabbatar da tsaro a lokacin zaben, haka nan jami'an bangaren isar da sako, wato hukumar gidan radiyo da talabijin da sauransu.

en: Those who produce books should also pay attention to this point. When producing books - in the sense of producing copies of books, translating them or making them available to people - it is necessary to pay attention to the needs and shortcomings in society.
ha: Wajibi ne su ma masu buga littafa su lura da wannan lamari. A wajen samar da littafi - shin buga littafi da ma'anar samar da shi ko kuma da ma'anar yin tarjamar littafi ko kuma da ma'anar yada littafi da isar da shi zuwa ga hannun wane da wane - lalle su dinga la'akari da bukatar da ake da ita a kasa. Wato su gano bukata da kuma gibi na tunani da ake da su, don haka sai su nemo hanyar da za a cike wannan gibin da ake da shi.

en: I explained in a speech that state subsidies have always been distributed among the people in an unfair way: this is the nature of general subsidies.
ha: A baya a wani jawabi na yi bayani kan hakan cewa a baya ana raba irin wannan tallafi tsakanin bangarori daban-daban na al'umma ne ta hanyar da babu adalci a cikinta; a dabi'ance dai haka aikin raba tallafi yake.

en: In spite of the fact that everybody agreed on the necessity of taking action, nobody had done anything due to the complexities and hardships involved. In the year 1390, the executive and legislative branches of government made efforts and carried out important stages of this work while we were under sanctions and while the hardships and complexities were more than ever before.
ha: Duk kuwa da cewa wannan wani lamari ne da aka yi tarayya a kansa, to amma lamarin ya ci gaba da zama ba tare da an aiwatar da shi saboda irin matsaloli da wahalhalun da ke cikinsa. Amma gwamnati da majalisa a shekarar da ta gabatan, a irin wannan yanayi na takunkumi da ake ciki wanda matsala da wahalar da ke cikin lamari ya fi na koyaushe wahala, sun yi himma da fara aiwatar da wannan aiki, kuma ya zuwa yanzu an aiwatar da wani bangare mai muhimmanci na shirin.

en: Today our youth have to shoulder a heavy duty in this regard.
ha: A yau nauyin da ke wuyan matasanmu a wannan fagen yana da girman gaske.

en: The Holy Quran teaches us, "And do not quarrel for then you will be weak in hearts and your power will depart." [The Holy Quran, 8: 46] If we quarrel about different issues - political issues, economic issues, personal issues - if we fight with each other, our enemy will be encouraged.
ha: Alkur'ani mai girma ya karantar da mu cewa: "kuma kada ku yi jayayya har ku raunana kuma iskarku ta tafi" (Suratul Anfal 8:46), idan har muka yi jayayya cikin lamurra daban-daban - batutuwa na siyasa, na tattalin arziki da batutuwa na kashin kai - muka kama kwalar rigunan junanmu, to kuwa makiyanmu za su sami karfin gwuiwa.

en: Allah the Exalted is helping you: He has made the hearts of the people kind towards you.
ha: Allah Madaukakin Sarki yana taimaka muku; ya sanya zukatan mutane suka zamanto masu rahama da kaunar ku.

en: A pious, intellectual, expert and sympathetic cleric in a mosque is the spirit of the mosque - just as doctors and nurses are the spirit of a hospital.
ha: Samun malami mai tsoron Allah, da hikima, masani da kishi a masallaci, tamkar likita da malamin jiyya ne a asibiti, ruhi ne mai sanya rayuwa ga masallaci.

en: There is no doubt that the revolutions in the region that rely on and demand these principles are not to the liking of America, Europe and the Zionists, and they are going to use all means to deny them, but the truth will not change with their denial.
ha: Ko shakka babu wannan hakika ta cewa juyin juya halin wannan yankin sun riki wadannan koyarwa da kuma ganin an tabbatar da su wani lamari ne da ba zai yi dadi wa Amurka da kasashen yammaci da yahudawan sahyoniya ba, sannan kuma za su yi amfani da dukkanin karfinsu wajen ganin sun yi fada da hakan, to sai dai kuma ba za a taba sauya hakika da irin wannan inkarin ba.

en: Therefore, I hope that God willing, the year 1395 will be an auspicious year for the people of Iran by the blessedness of Hazrat Zahra (s.a.) and that we will learn lessons and benefit from the spirituality, instructions and life of that great personality.
ha: A saboda haka muna fatan insha Allahu wannan shekara ta 1395, albarkacin Nata Fatima, za ta zamanto shekara mai cike da albarkoki ga al'ummar Iran sannan kuma za mu dau darussa daga irin kusaci da Allah da take da shi da kuma irin maganganu da kuma rayuwarta da kuma amfanuwa da hakan.

en: I would like to congratulate all my dear countrymen across the nation, all Iranians who are living in different parts of the world and all other nations who celebrate Norouz [Iranian New Year], on the occasion of Norouz and the arrival of the new year. In particular, I would like to congratulate the honorable families of our martyrs, our disabled war veterans and their families, all our war veterans and all those who are active in different arenas in the country.
ha: Ina taya, al'ummarmu masu girma a duk fadin kasar nan da kuma dukkanin iraniyawa da suke rayuwa a sauran bangarori daban-daban na duniya da kuma dukkanin al'ummomin da suke gudanar da bukukuwan sabuwar shekara ta idin Norouz, murnar wannan idin da kuma shigowar sabuwar shekara; musamman iyalan shahidai masu girma, dakarun da suka sami raunuka a wajen yaaki da iyalansu da kuma dukkanin masu sadaukarwa da kuma dukkanin masu gudanar da ayyukansu a bangarori daban-daban.

en: It was only Americans who could have taken action against him, and it is clear what the action would have been.
ha: To hukumcin da za su yanke masa dai a fili yake.

en: The following is an excerpt of the message:
ha: Abin da ke biye fassarar sakon da Jagoran ya fitar ne:

en: We should become used to consuming every product that is produced inside the country. In all areas including the areas related to daily consumption as well as larger and more important areas, we should create a cultural norm among ourselves and consider it our obligation to seriously avoid consuming foreign products the equivalents of which are also produced inside the country.
ha: Wajibi ne mu saba da kuma sanya hakan ya tzamanto wata al'ada a gare mu. Haka nan kuma mu dinga jin cewa lalle wajibi ne a kanmu mu yi amfani da dukkanin kayayyakin da ake samar da irin su a cikin gida da kuma nesantar kayayyaki (irin su) da ake shigowa da su daga kasashen waje. A dukkanin fagage: shin a fagen amfani na yau da kullum ne ko kuma a fagen abubuwan da muke saye mu ajiye.

en: Humanity needs this waiting and the Islamic Ummah needs it even more.
ha: Mutane dai suna bukatar wannan jiran dako, al'ummar musulmi ma su ne suka fi bukatar hakan.

en: In the area of science and technology, certain things were done which were remarkable and a genuine source of joy for those who have faith in the future prospects of the country.
ha: A fagen ilimi da fasaha, a shekarar da ta gabatan an gudanar da ayyuka masu yawan gaske da za su faranta ran mutanen da suka yi imani da makoma mai kyau ga al'ummar nan.

en: Currently you complain why the manager is old and his consultant is young.
ha: Kuna cewa ne shugaba ya zama matashi, mai ba da shawara kuma ya zama tsoho.

en: The points which were raised in this meeting by my dear brothers, sisters and children were exactly the same things that I expected to hear from you dear youth.
ha: Abubuwan da ‘yan'uwa maza da mata ‘ya'yana masu girma suka fadi a wajen nan shi ne dai abubuwan da na ke fatan ji daga bakunanku matasa masu girma.

en: Of course the people of Isfahan have been vigilant.
ha: Ko da yake mutanen Isfahan sun lura.

en: I hope that Allah the Exalted will help both the people and the honorable officials to carry out their responsibilities in this area.
ha: Ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da ya taimaki al'umma da jami'an (kasar nan) masu girma don su sami damar aiwatar da aikin da ke wuyansu a wannan fagen; haka nan kuma ya sanya zuciya mai tsarki ta Waliyul Asr (rayukanmu su zamanto fansa a gare shi) ta yi farin ciki da mu; sannan kuma ya sanya ruhin Imaminmu mai girma (Imam Khumaini) da shahidanmu masu girma su yarda da kuma yin farin ciki da mu.

en: If an athlete does not have firm determination, he will not be a champion.
ha: Dan wasan da ba shi da karfafaffiyar irada da kuma tsayayyiyar azama, ko shakka babu, ba zai kai ga zama zakara a wata gasa ba.

en: These are the requirements of waiting. One of the things that the essence of waiting requires is that we should not be satisfied with the status quo and with the level of progress we have made so far.
ha: Daya daga cikin siffofin da aka tabbatar da su cikin hakikanin jiran dako, shi ne cewa bai kamata mutum ya ji ya wadatu da yanayin da ake ciki na irin ci gaban da aka samu a halin yanzu ba; mutum ya ji cewa a ko da yaushe ya ji cewa yana son ganin an sami irin wannan ci gaban a cikin al'umma.

en: Of course some people are just careless sometimes, and their lack of insight is not rooted in spite or malevolence.
ha: Amma wadansu kan a'a saboda adawa, saboda mummunan fata, a wasu lokuta kuma wadansu su kan gafala.

en: Dear brothers and sisters, dear people of Iran, you should know that today the situation of America is precarious in spite of all its muscle-flexing, in spite of all the uproar it causes.
ha: Ina son in sanar da ku, Ya ku 'yan'uwa maza da mata masu girma, Ya ku al'ummar Iran! cewa Amurka da dukkanin irin nuna karfin da take yi, da dukkanin irin wadannan ihu bayan hari da rikice-rikicen da take haifarwa, a yau dai suna cikin yanayi na rauni da gazawa ne.

en: The Americans would be happy to use their propaganda machines in the region and pass off the issue of Bahrain as a Shia-Sunni conflict.
ha: Amurkawa sun yi farin cikin cewa sun sami nasarar kiran wannan lamari a matsayin sabani tsakanin Shi'a da Sunna ta hanyar kafafen watsa labarai da hanyoyin farfagandarsu.

en: The messages explain the crimes that are being committed as well as the most important issues and developments in Islamic territories, ranging from the distortion of Islamic truths to enmities, ethnocentric fitnas, spread of corruption, numerous killings and the propaganda against the Islamic Ummah.
ha: Danyen aikin da suke aikatawa da kuma batutuwa masu muhimmanci da suke faruwa a kasashen musulmi; da suka hada da batutuwan da (makiyan) suka gurbata su da kuma kokarin da suke yi na haifar da fitina ta kabilanci da yada fasadi da kisan gilla da kuma bakar farfagandar da suke yi a kan al'ummar musulmi.

en: In which part of the world do such things exist?
ha: A ina ne ake samun irin wannan yanayin a duk fadin duniya?

en: And this is something that must be done.
ha: Wajibi ne a samar da hakan.

en: You should be careful about your morality and your purity of tongue, heart and hands.
ha: Taka tsantsan na kyawawan halaye, taka tsantsan cikin maganganunmu da kuma tsarkake zuciyarmu.

en: It is a fact that at the beginning of the Revolution our youth were highly excited, which was due to the strong sentiments created by the Revolution.
ha: To a farkon nasarar juyin juya halin Musulunci kumaji irin na samartaka yana da yawa - wanda ya samo asali ne sakamakon wannan kumaji na juyin - to amma ba a ko ina ba ne ake samun irin wannan zurfin tunanin ba.

en: I would like to take this opportunity to point out that officials of the French government have been openly hostile towards the Iranian nation over the past few years and this is not a clever move by French government officials.
ha: A nan ina ga ya dace in sanar da cewa cikin shekarun baya-bayan nan jami'an gwamnatin Faransa suna bayyanar da kiyayyarsu ga al'ummar Iran. Hakan wauta ce da jami'an Faransar suke yi.

en: I would also like to thank everybody who has attended this meeting, especially Mr. Qara'ati.
ha: Ina mika godiya ta ga kowa da kowa, musamman ma ga mai girma Sheikh Kara'ati wanda wajibi ne in gode masa.

en: When the White Revolution proclaimed by the Shah's government in Iran called for land reform, nationalization of the forests, the sale of state-owned enterprises to private interests, electoral changes to enfranchise women, profit sharing in industry, and an anti-illiteracy campaign in the nation's schools.
ha: Kamar yadda muka nuna a baya, taimako da goyon bayan haramtacciyar kasar Isra'ila da fadada alakar Iran da ita na daga cikin sharuddan da Amurka ta kafa wa gwamnatin Shah matukar tana son goyon bayanta.

en: This year I will analyze the issues related to economic jihad.
ha: To a wannan shekarar zan rarraba batutuwan da suka shafi tattalin arziki ne kashi-kashi.

en: After Napoleon's exile and death, monarchy remained the system of government in France for around 50 years - that is to say, until around the year 1815. Of course there were very difficult and bitter upheavals. If you read 19th century French novels, including the books of Victor Hugo, Balzac and others, you will clearly see the signs of the upheavals and the hardships and bitterness that the people of France went through.
ha: Bayan korar Napoleon da mutuwarsa - wato a kimanin shekarar 1815 - hukumar sarakuna ta yi kimanin shekaru hamsin tana iko a kasar Faransa cikin yanayi mai tsanani, ta yadda idan har kuka karanta littafan labarun karni na sha tara na kasar Faransa, a fili za ku ga alamun irin wadannan juyi da irin wadannan wahalhalu da bala'oi da suka faru a kan mutanen Faransa; daga cikin su kuwa akwai littafan Bictor Hugo da Balzac da sauransu.

en: Another issue is that professional sports - now that international competitions are well-established and popular - are a manifestation of the capacities, dignity and identity of a nation.
ha: Wani lamari na daban kuma shi ne cewa gasar wasanni, wanda a yau gasa ta kasa da kasa ta yadu ko ina, tana a matsayin wata alama ce ta abubuwan bukata da kwarewa da kuma matsayi da wata al'umma take da shi.

en: In the present time too, you are busy making mistakes in different places in the region and particularly towards the Islamic Republic and the people of Iran.
ha: A halin yanzu ma, a bangarori daban a yankin nan, musamman dangane da Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran da al'ummar Iran, kuna ci gaba da kuskure.

en: The great opportunity which these precious days provide for Muslims throughout the world is like a miraculous elixir. If the value of such days is appreciated and if we benefit from such days in an appropriate way, many of the maladies of the world of Islam will be cured.
ha: Irin damar da wadannan ranaku masu tsananin muhimmanci suke samar wa al'ummar musulmin duniya a kowace shekara, tamkar wata mu'ujiza ce maras tamka, wacce matukar aka fahimci matsayinta sannan kuma aka yi amfani da ita kamar yadda ya kamata, to kuwa za a iya magance da dama daga cikin matsaloli da barazanar da duniyar musulmi take fuskanta.

en: Leader’s Speech to Members of Assembly of Experts - Khamenei.ir
ha: Jawabin Jagora Yayin Ganawa Da 'Yan Majalisar Kwararru

en: They will receive great rewards for their work, but the duty they have to shoulder is very difficult.
ha: Malamin jiyya dai yana dauke da wani aiki mai wahalar gaske a wuyansa, to amma yana da lada mai girma; to sai dai yana tare da aiki mai wahalar gaske.

en: I hope Allah the Exalted will soon bestow deliverance on the people of these countries - the people of Bahrain, the people of Yemen and the people of Libya. I hope Allah the Exalted will punish the enemies of these nations.
ha: Ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da ya gaggauta samar da mafita ga wadannan al'ummomi - wato al'ummar Bahrain, al'ummar Yemen da al'ummar Libya - sannan kuma ya azabtar da makiyan al'ummomi da azabar da ta dace da su.

en: The role that the government should play in this regard is to support our domestic industrial and agricultural products and the role of our investors and laborers is to strengthen the cycle of production and bolster production work.
ha: Rawar da gwamnati za ta taka a wannan fagen shi ne ba da goyon baya ga kayayyakin da ake samar da su a cikin gida, masana'antu da ayyukan gona. Sannan rawar da masu zuba da jari da leburori (ma'aikata) za su bayar ita ce karfafa abubuwan da ake samarwar da kuma tabbatar da nasara cikin hakan.

en: This path has been created for human beings, not only for men or for women.
ha: Wannan wata hanya ce da aka tsara wa dan'adam, ba wai namiji ko mace ba.

en: If we consider the hajj as an opportunity, then we will have a better view of our obligations and will pay more attention to them.
ha: Idan muka kalli hakan da kallo na wata dama, to a irin wannan yanayin ne idanuwanmu za su budu, sannan kuma za mu ba wa nauyin da ke kanmu muhimmancin (da ya dace).

en: Our enthusiastic people and enthusiastic Muslim people throughout the world would like to hear about your condition and the last moments that you are in hospital.
ha: Al'ummarmu da sauran al'ummomin kasashen musulmi da masoyanka a duk fadin duniya, za su so jin yanayin jikinka da kuma ranakun karshe-karshen na zamanka a asibiti.

en: Leader's Speech to Exemplary Nurses - Khamenei.ir
ha: Jawabin Jagora Yayin Ganawa Da Dubban Malaman Jiyya Na Iran

en: Why should the revision of collective conscience apply to the distant past and not to the current problems?
ha: Me ya sa ake damfara lamirin mutane ga abubuwan da suka faru cikin tarihin shekaru aru aru ba batutuwan da suke faruwa a halin yanzu ba?

en: God says the Muslims harmed the enemy just as the enemy harmed the Muslims: "And you had certainly afflicted (the unbelievers) with twice as much." God tells them not to be surprised. After all, in a battlefield you hurt the enemy and you also get hurt.
ha: Da farko dai idan har makiya sun cutar da ku, to ku ma dai ai kun cutar da makiyan "alhali kuwa kun samar da biyunta" - kada ku yi mamaki; ai a fagen yaki dai akwai cutarwa da kuma cutuwa, akwai dukkaninsu biyun.

en: Allah the Exalted says, â€œAgainst them make ready your strength to the utmost of your power, including steeds of war, to strike terror into (the hearts of) the enemies of Allah.â€ [The Holy Quran, 8: 60] Your preparedness makes the enemy fearful: not fearful of your invasion because you are not aggressive, but fearful of your resistance and of attacking you.
ha: Allah Madaukakin Sarki yana fadin cewa: "Kuma ku yi musu tanadi iyakar iyawarku na karfi (makami) da kuma tanadaddun dawakai, ku rika tsorata makiya Allah da kuma makiyanku da shi.." (Suratul Anfali 8:60). Irin shirin da kuke da shi yana tsoratar da makiya; ba wai suna tsoron wuce gona da irin ku ba ne - don kuwa ku din nan ba masu wuce gona da iri a kan kowa ba ne - suna tsoron irin tsayin dakan da kuke da shi ne, suna tsoron yin tunanin kawo muku hari ne.

en: Jihad is not just limited to holding a rifle in your hand. Jihad means that one should see oneself in the arena of action and fight against the obstacles and those who create them.
ha: Jihadi ba shi ne kawai daukan bindiga ba; jihadi shi ne cewa mutum a koda yaushe ya dinga ganin kansa a matsayin yana fagen yunkuri da gwagwarmaya da abubuwan da suke kawo cikas ne, ya dinga jin cewa yana da wani nauyi a wuyansu; to wannan shi ne jihadi; wannan shi ne jihadi na Musulunci.

en: All economists who care about our country reject this policy, but we have been used to this state of affairs. It is wrong to export oil and use the money to manage the country.
ha: Hakan kuwa abu ne wanda dukkanin masana tattalin arziki masu kishi suke yin watsi da shi; an saba da wannan hanya a wannan kasa ta mu. A tono man fetur, a sayar sannan kuma a ci gaba da gudanar da kasa da kudin da aka samu; wannan hanya ce da take cike da kuskure.

en: I used to go to the library at Imam Ridha's (a.s.) shrine and I used to see what important role the librarians played there.
ha: Mu kan tafi dakin karatun haramin Imam Ridha (a.s.) mu kan ga irin ayyukan da masu kula da littafa suke yi, irin wahalar da suke sha da kuma irin kishin da suke nunawa.

en: It was mentioned in the meeting that a lady - a faithful and brave woman - had captured an enemy soldier during the war.
ha: An yi ishara da cewa makiya sun kama wata mace a garin Gilan ta yamma a matsayin fursunan yaki; wata mace mai imani kuma jaruma.

en: He is right: each year on the 22nd of Bahman, the people of Iran gather at Azadi Square and shout "death to America".
ha: To e gaskiya yake fadi; don kuwa a kowace ranar 22 ga watan Bahman na kowace shekara, mutanen da suke taruwa a wannan dandalin na 'yanci, taken da suke rerawa shi ne "Allah Ya la'anci Amurka".

en: His Eminence said that he is satisfied with the existing harmony between the Ministry of Interior and the police force, and he urged them to increase this harmony.
ha: Har ila yau kuma Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya bayyana jin dadinsa dangane da irin fahimtar juna da aiki tare da ake samu tsakanin ma'aikatar cikin gida da hukumar ‘yan sanda yana mai bukatar da a kara irin wannan fahimtar junan.

en: These are the policies. These are what the hearts, minds and tongues of our people and government officials say.
ha: Siyasar mu ita ce wannan, zukatanmu su ne wadannan, hikima da kuma abubuwan da muke fadi su ne wadannan, shin ta bakin mutane ne ko kuma ta bakin jami'an gwamnati.

en: They want to say that the Islamic Republic is not trustworthy.
ha: Wadannan mutane suna so ne su ce Jamhuriyar Musulunci ba abar yarda ba ce.

en: If you can establish a trend or do something that prepares the ground for the prosperity of a nation and brings about religious and material benefits for the nation, your work will be incomparable to all kinds of worshiping, praying, or ordinary services to God's servants. Your work will be superior.
ha: Ku din nan kuna iya zama wani tafarki (wata hanya), ku aikata wani aiki wanda sakamakon wannan aiki wata al'umma za ta samu sa'ada ta shekara da shekaru, ta samu duniya da lahira, hakan kuwa ba lamari ne da ba za a taba kwatanta shi da wata ibada ba, ko wata sallar dare ba ko kuma wata hidima da aka saba da ita ba ga bayin Allah; lamari ne mai girman gaske.

en: He conquered several European countries and annexed them to France.
ha: Ya sami nasara kan wasu daga cikin kasashen Turai da mai she su karkashin ikon Faransa; ko da ya ke bayan gushewar Napoleon daya baya daya sun rabu da Faransan, wato wadannan nasarori da ya samu ba su tabbata ba.

en: Leader Meets with Lebanese Prime Minister - Khamenei.ir His Eminence stressed that Iran will spare no effort to aid the progress and development of Lebanon.
ha: Ganawar Jagora Da Sa'ad Hariri Da ‘Yan Tawagarsa A safiyar yau litinin (29-11-2010) ne Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Khamenei ya gana da firayi ministan kasar Labanon Sa'ad Hariri tare da ‘yan tawagarsa wadanda suka kai masa ziyarar ban girma.

en: This is the Commander of the Faithful (a.s.).
ha: Ku duba ku gani wannan shi ne Amirul Muminin.

en: These are some signs that point to an underlying Islamic ideology.
ha: Wadannan wasu alamu ne da ke nuni da hikimar Musulunci.

en: Both health and security are among the blessings that cannot be properly appreciated before they are taken away - just like the air we breathe.
ha: Lafiya da kuma tsaro suna daga cikin manyan ni'imomin da mutum ba zai san irin muhimmancin da suke da shi ba har sai lokacin da ya rasa su; tamkar iskar da jan numfashi ne.

en: The earth indeed belongs to God, and He gives its inheritance to whomever He wishes of His servants, and the outcome will be in favor of the God-fearing.'
ha: Hakika kasa ta Allah ce, Yana gadar da ita ga wanda Ya so daga bayinsa. Kyakkyawan karshe kuwa yana ga masu tsoron Allah".

en: Today the views are far deeper and far more profound than those days and they are based on careful reflection on the principles. There was excitement at that time and there was also a valuable and successful movement in the country.
ha: A wancan lokacin akwai kumaji, akwai yunkuri, yunkurin kuma wani yunkuri ne da ke cike da nasara da kuma kima, an kuma yi sadaukarwa da yawa; to amma matasan mu na yau sun fi kallon lamurra daga can cikinsa.

en: Our nation, our youth and our government officials should be extremely careful about these things.
ha: Wajibi ne al'ummar mu, matasanmu da kuma jami'anmu su yi taka tsantsan sosai.

en: You should fight this arrogant policy.
ha: Ku yi fada da wannan siyasa ta ma'abota girman kai.

en: The work is not finished yet, but what has been done so far by our government officials both in the executive branch and in the Majlis - which have been mostly successful due to the support and cooperation of the people - are very important and remarkable.
ha: Aikin dai ba mai karewa ba ne, to amma abin da ya zuwa yanzu jami'an gwamnati - shin a cikin gwamnatin ne ko kuma a majalisa - suka yi sannan kuma jama'a suka goyi bayansu lalle an samu nasarori kuma an aiwatar da aiki mai muhimmanci abin jinjinawa.

en: Allah the Exalted supports pure intentions.
ha: Lalle Allah Madaukakin Sarki yana tare da tsarkakkiyar niyya; tsarkin niyya yana da tasiri mai ban mamaki wanda irin wannan tsarkin niyyar ce take ciyar da ayyuka gaba.

en: This is a fact.
ha: Wannan dai wata hakika ce.

en: The Islamic Revolution in Iran that was hailed by Imam Khomeini as â€œvictory of blood over swordâ€, and establishment of the lasting, robust, courageous and progressive Islamic republic, and its impact on present Islamic awakening is itself a long story that deserves to be debated and researched. There is no doubt that Islamic Revolution of Iran will be accorded a thorough and comprehensive chapter in the analysis and writings of history of the present situation of the Islamic world.
ha: Abin da ya faru na gagarumin juyin juya halin Musulunci a kasar Iran wanda kamar yadda mai girma Imam Khumaini ya bayyana jini ne ya yi nasara a kan takobi da kuma kafa dawwamammen tsarin Jamhuriyar Musulunci kuma mai karfi da jaruntaka ya yi tasiri wajen farkawa ta Musulunci da ake samu a yau, wanda shi kansa wani lamari ne da ke bukatar bahasi da bincike wanda ko shakka babu zai fitar da wani sabon shafi cikin sharhi da tarihin yanayin duniyar musulmi.

en: In Iran, the evidence and documents from the U.S. Den of Espionage that fell into the hands of the revolution showed that all these plots were designed by the regime in the United States for the people of Iran for them bringing back the reactionary and dependant rulers in revolutionary countries is a principle that prescribes all these dirty tricks.
ha: A kasar Musulunci ta Iran, bayanan da aka samu a Shekar Leken Asiri (ofishin jakadancin Amurka a Tehran) bayan da dakarun juyi suka kama wajen suna nuni da cewa dukkanin wadannan makirci gwamnatin AMurka ta kulla su a kan al'ummar Iran. A wajen su sake dawo da gwamnatocin ‘yan mulkin kama-karya karagar mulki a kasashen da aka yi juyi na hakika wani tushe ne na aikinsu don haka suke tsara wadannan munanan hanyoyi don cimma hakan.

en: He added: "God has promised that the ultimate victory belongs to those who believe in Him and engage in jihad on His path."
ha: Jagoran ya ci gaba da cewa: Wannan dai wani alkawari ne na Ubangiji da ba zai saba shi ba na cewa nasara da taimakon Ubangiji suna tare ne da mutanen da suka yi imani da Allah sannan kuma suka ci gaba da yin jihadi a tafarkinsa.

en: Another figure that I would like to mention is the late Sardar-e Kaboli, an outstanding scholar in different areas.
ha: Wani malamin kuma shi ne marigayi Sardar Kabuli, sanannen masanin bangarori daban-daban.

en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
ha: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai

en: Today the world is frustrated at the heavy impositions of materialistic civilization, and it is looking for a way out.
ha: A yau dai duniya ta tsaya kyam wajen tinkarar abubuwan da al'adu da wayewa na kasashen yammaci suka tilasta mata, sannan kuma tana ci gaba da neman mafita.

en: Without a doubt, this is the base of Shia philosophy and there is no room for any discussion on this issue.
ha: Babu kokwanto ko wani shakku cikin hakan.

en: I would like to offer a friendly word of advice to these excellencies: today - after the passage of many years from the 28th of Mordad, the eight-year war and the defense that the Islamic Republic put up there - you acknowledge that you have made certain mistakes.
ha: Ni dai ina son in gaya wa wadannan masu girman wasu ‘yan wasu jumloli a matsayin nasiha: a yau din nan bayan gushewar shekaru aru-aru daga ranar 28 ga watan Mordad ko kuma kallafaffen yaki na shekaru takwas, sai ga shi kun amince da cewa kun yi kuskure.

en: The goal of the sanctions that have been imposed on us is to cripple our economy.
ha: Manufar takunkumin ita ce gurguntar da tattalin arzikin (kasar Iran).

en: I hope Allah the Exalted will increase this insight on a daily basis because of the pure prayers of the Imam of the Age (may our souls be sacrificed for his sake).
ha: Muna fatan Allah Madaukakin Sarki sakamakon albarkacin addu'oin mai girma Bakiyatullah (rayukanmu su zamanto fansa a gare shi) za su ci gaba da karfafuwa a kowace rana sannan kuma al'ummar mu a kowace rana insha Allah za ta samu nasara da daukaka.

en: In Kermanshah, the population of educated youth is very large.
ha: A wannan gari na ku na Kermanshah, wadanda suka yi karatu suna da yawan gaske.

en: They imposed harsh sanctions from the beginning of the year 1391 - sanctions on oil and sanctions on banking and monetary transactions between the Islamic Republic and other countries. They did many other things in this regard.
ha: Tun daga farkon wannan shekarar ta 1391 suka fara sanya takunkumi mai tsanani kan al'ummar Iran; takunkumin man fetur, takunkumi kan bankuna da musayen kudade tsakanin bankuna tsakanin Jamhuriyar Musulunci da sauran kasashe - kai sun yi abubuwa da yawa a wannan fagen.

en: Notice how beautifully the concept has been expressed. Emergence, permanence and progress of knowledge depend on labor. This is the logic of Islam.
ha: Wato samuwar ilimi, dawwamarsa da kuma ci gabansa ya ta'allaka ne da aiki. Wannan hikima ce, wannan wani tushe ne na tunani.

en: Now, they are faced with a fait accompli that the Iranian nation presented them with. Such complex and great work is being carried out.
ha: A halin yanzu ana gudanar da irin wadannan ayyuka masu rikitarwa da kuma girman gaske, shin wata matsala take cikin a gudanar da irin wadannan ayyuka na ilimi a fagen wasanni?

en: Allah is sufficient to take account.
ha: Kuma Allah Ya isa Ya zama Mai hisabi.

en: Fortunately, this is already the case with the Armed Forces.
ha: Abin farin cikin shi ne cewa dakaru masu makaminmu suna da wannan.

en: Besides spiritual and intellectual progress and what the Revolution has brought for us - which I will explain briefly later on - our young generation should acquire physical capabilities as well.
ha: Yana da kyau matasanmu, baya ga irin ci gaba na ruhi da na tunani da kuma abubuwan da wannan juyin ya ba mu kyautar su - wadanda a nan gaba zan yi bayanin su - yana da kyau su kiyaye irin karfi na jiki da suke da shi.

en: Another point regarding the event which happened on the 15th of Khordad - a point to which our youth and dear people should pay attention - is that no international community and none of the so-called human rights organizations protested against the brutal killings in Tehran and other parts of the country.
ha: Wani batun kuma da ke cikin wannan lamari na 15 ga watan Khordad - wanda yana da kyau matasanmu da mutanenmu masu girma su lura da shi - shi ne cewa a yayin wannan kisan kiyashin da aka yi wa mutane a Tehran da sauran garuruwa, babu wata cibiya ta kasa da kasa, wadanda suke kiran kansu cibiyoyin kare hakkokin bil'adama, da ya ce wani abu; babu wani da ya nuna rashin amincewarsa.

en: For example, the people might vote against what I want, but I must accept their vote.
ha: Mai yiyuwa ne ra'ayin mutane ya saba wa abin da nake so; to amma wajibi ne in girmama hakan.

en: What is the system of hegemony?
ha: Mene ne ma'anar tsarin mulkin mallaka?

en: They told me, "We wanted to build a machine, and we went abroad to buy the required parts, but they told us that they would not sell them to us because of the sanctions, so we realized that we had to manufacture the required parts as well.
ha: Sun gaya min cewa muna son mu kera wannan na'urar, mun tafi waje don samo shi, sai suka ce mana ai ku kuna karkashin takunkumi ne, ba za su ba mu ba; sai muka fahimci cewa lalle wajibi ne mu samar da hakan da kanmu.

en: At that juncture, Islam was faced with a wave of attacks, which continued later on. The second wave started when Marxism collapsed.
ha: A wancan lokacin (makiya) sun fara kokarin cutar da Musulunci, kuma hakan ya ci gaba. Kumaji na biyu shi ne a lokacin da tsarin markisanci ya sha kashi.

en: They invested in doing this in order to separate the world of Islam from the Islamic Republic.
ha: Sun kara kaimi sosai don dai su raba duniyar musulmi da Jamhuriyar Musulunci.

en: At the beginning of the Revolution, Basij, the Islamic Revolution's Guards Corps and all government officials had focused their attention on safeguarding the existence of the Revolution. They had focused all their attention on protecting the sampling that had just germinated in this country.
ha: A farkon nasarar juyi, dukkanin himmar gwamnati da Basij da dakarun kare juyi da dukkain jami'an kasar nan shi ne yadda za a kiyaye wannan sabon abu da aka samar; wato wannan sabuwar bishiryar da ba ta jima da tsirowa a wannan kasar ba, kada a bari a kawar da ita.

en: If we pay attention to the philosophy inherent in Eid al-Adha, many paths will be opened up for us.
ha: Idan har aka kalli irin hikimar da ke cikin ranar idin babbar salla, to kuwa da dama daga cikin kofofi za su budu mana.

en: There are many things that have to be done in this province. Kermanshah province has a lot of potential.
ha: Ina fatan insha Allahu jami'ai za su gudanar da ayyukan da ya wajaba a aiwatar da su a wannan yankin, wanda lalle wajibi ne a gudanar da ayyuka masu yawa a wannan lardin.

en: These are not just empty claims. These realities are based on objective findings.
ha: Wadannan ba wai ikirari ba ne; wadannan abubuwa ne na hakika wadanda suka fito mana fili ta hanyar bincike.

en: Westerners took this opportunity to interfere in the affairs of the regional countries by bringing up a new issue: the Shia-Sunni issue.
ha: To, a nan sai 'yan kasashen yammaci su ka yi amfani da wannan dama, don su sami damar tsoma baki cikin lamurran wannan yanki ta hanyar gabatar da wani sabon abu; wanda shi ne lamarin Shi'a da Sunna.

en: After the Imam (r.a.) passed away, the same event happened in another form in Qom.
ha: Bayan rasuwar Imam ma hakan ta sake faruwa ta wani yanayi na daban.

en: The law provides guidance: it does not restrict.
ha: Doka mai shiryarwa ce, ba mai takaitawa ba.

en: I am grateful to you for your efforts.
ha: Ina mika godiya ta ga irin kokarin da kuke yi.

en: We would have to import it.
ha: Kenan wajibi ne mu shigo da mai daga waje; wato wajibi ne al'ummar Iran su zamanto masu mika kokon bara zuwa hannun makiya da masu bakar aniya.

en: There are certain problems in society.
ha: Akwai wadansu matsaloli a cikin al'ummar mu.

en: The historical memory of the nations of our region will never forget how colonial governments organized ruthless terrorist organizations such as the World Zionist Organization and more than ten similar other organizations and how they gave rise to the Deir Yassin tragedy and similar events in order to occupy Palestine and to force its oppressed people out of their homes.
ha: Har abada kwakwalan al'ummomin wannan yankin ba za su taba mancewa da yadda gwamnatocin 'yan mulkin mallaka suka shirya kungiyoyi daban-daban na ta'addanci masu shan jinin al'umma irin su kungiyar yahudawan sahyoniya ta duniya da sauran kungiyoyi irin wannan kimanin guda goma wajen aikata wannan mummunan aiki da suka aikata a lokacin da suka yi fashin kasar Palastinu da korar al'ummomin wannan kasa da ake zalunta daga gidaje da bukkokinsu.

en: Before the 15th of Khordad, important events had taken place in the year 1341 as well as at the beginning of the year 1342.
ha: Kafin ranar 15 ga watan Khordad, akwai wasu batutuwa masu muhimmanci da suka faru a shekarar 1341 da kuma farko-farkon shekarar 1342.

en: Our responsibility is to look to the past in order to learn a lesson and to look to the future for making plans and taking decisions.
ha: Aikin da ke wuyanmu shi ne dubi da kuma waiwaye zuwa ga shekarun da suka gabata don daukar darasi da daukar matakan da suka dace saboda makomarmu.

en: The Holy Quran says that it was the Muslims themselves. It was because of their mistake. We have made mistakes in certain cases and we have failed to fulfill our responsibilities in certain cases, otherwise "Allah has power over all things".
ha: Mun yi kuskure a wasu wajajen "Lalle ne, Allah, a kan dukan kome, Mai ikon yi ne(7)" - a wani wajen kuma ba mu yi abin da ya dace mu yi ba ne; a wani wajen kuma irin sanya idon da ya kamata mu yi ba mu yi ba; hakan ne suke haifar da matsaloli, wajibi ne mu lura da wadannan abubuwan.

en: If life continues with monotonous regularity and new stages never start, one would not think of innovation and new beginnings.
ha: Matukar dai rayuwa ta ci gaba da tafiya irin na bai daya kamar yadda take sannan kuma babu wani sabon yanayi da mutum zai samu cikin rayuwarsa, to a bisa ka'ida ba zai fara tunanin sabuntawa ba.

en: You should think, study and do research.
ha: Wajibi ne ku yi tunani, ku gudanar da bincike sosai.
