ha: Jagoran ya ci gaba da cewa: Wajibi ne kasar Iran da kuma al'ummar kasar su kai ga matsayin da ya dace da su sannan kuma a mai da su su zamanto cikakken abin koyi ga duniyar musulmi.

en: Rather, the most important meaning of the powerful weathering of last year's test and hardship was that the Iranian nation reached a new stage of its life by relying on its faith and insight, understanding the requirements of time and taking the necessary measures. And it gained new strength to achieve its ultimate goal.
ha: Ayatullah Khamenei ya ci gaba da cewa: Ba za a iya takaita ma'anar nasarar da al'ummar Iran ta samu wajen tsallake ramin wannan fitina cikin irin karfin da take da shi ba ne kawai, face dai ma'ana ta asali ta tsallake tarkon wannan fitina da ta faru a shekarar da ta gabata ita ce cewa al'ummar Iran sakamakon dogaro da imani, basira, sanin ya kamata da fahimtar yanayin da ake ciki da kuma yin abin da ya dace ta samu nasarar isa ga wani sabon matsayi ne cikin wannan rayuwa tata da ke cike da haske.

en: I have extracted the themes of the messages issued by the Leader of the Islamic Revolution over the past few years and I can share the result with you if you like. Please go ahead.
ha: Dangane da hakan ni dai na yi darasin wadannan sakonni na Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci da yake fitarwa cikin shekarun nan, idan har kana so sai in gabatar maka da shi.

en: It was this self-confidence that was transferred to the people of Iran through his words and actions.
ha: Irin wannan yarda da Allah din kuwa da Imam yake da shi, shi ne ya mika shi zuwa ga mutane.

en: Today all propaganda, political and economic organizations of America and some of its mercenaries in the region are trying to derail these popular revolutions and these great uprisings. They are trying to hide and deny the Islamic aspect of these movements. They are trying to deceive the people and install individuals who would help them change all the equations in favor of the west again.
ha: A yau dukkanin cibiyoyin farfaganda da siyasa da tattalin arziki na Amurka da wasu daga cikin ‘yan amshin shatansu na wannan yankin suna ci gaba da gudanar da ayyukansu wajen karkatar da wannan yunkuri na mutane, wannan gagarumin juyin juya hali daga asalin hanyarsa; su boye bangarensa na Musulunci, su boye hakan, su yi inkarin hakan; su samar da wasu da za su yaudari mutane da mai da dukkanin wadannan abubuwan da suka faru ta yadda za su zamanto masu amfani ga kasashen yammacin.

en: Each achievement that the Iranian nation makes will disappoint certain people in the world.
ha: A duk inda al'ummar Iran suka sami nasara, wasu 'yan tsiraru a duniya su kan ji cewa lalle sun gaza.

en: In any case I would like to thank the officials in charge of the affairs related to books.
ha: Ala kulli hal ni dai ina gode wa masu kula da lamuran littafi, sannan haka nan kuma ina bukatar su da su ba wa lamarin littafi muhimmancin gaske.

en: The book that has been written about him is a very good book. I read the book several years ago.
ha: Wannan littafi da aka rubuta dangane da shi, littafi ne mai cike da abubuwa kuma mai kyau; shekaru da yawa da suka gabata na ga wannan littafin.

en: I am addressing you, [the youth], not because I overlook your parents, rather it is because the future of your nations and countries will be in your hands; and also I find that the sense of quest for truth is more vigorous and attentive in your hearts.
ha: Ina magana da ku ne, Ya ku matasa; ba wai saboda na raina iyayenku ba, face dai sai saboda ku ne manyan gobe, wadanda makomar al'umma da kuma kasarku take hannunsu; sannan kuma saboda ina ganin zukatanku cike suke da neman sanin gaskiya.

en: Such things are harmful.
ha: Wadannan su ne abubuwa masu cutarwa.

en: Religious luminaries have always attached a lot of importance to daily prayers.
ha: Manyan bayin Allah da suka gabata su kan ba wa salla gagarumin muhimmanci.

en: As I said, we have certain enemies.
ha: To mun fadi dai cewa akwai makiya.

en: And the religious faith and beliefs of the people of Isfahan is the supporting foundation of all these things. This has been manifested in the behavior of the people of Isfahan since before the Revolution, but after the Revolution everything acquired new dimensions.
ha: Imani da riko da addinin mutanen Isfahan ma shi ne ya ke gaba da sauran abubuwa; wanda irin wadannan halaye na mutane ya kasance tun ma kafin nasarar juyin juya halin Musulunci, to sai dai bayan nasarar juyin juya halin Musuluncin komai ya dau sabon yanayi da kuma fadaduwa.

en: By Allah's favor, Muslim nations will become more vigilant on a daily basis. I hope Allah the Exalted will hasten the re-appearance of the Imam of the Age (may our souls be sacrificed for his sake).
ha: Muna rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da Ya gaggauta bayyanar Waliyul Asr (rayukanmu su zamanto fansa a gare shi); Ya sanya mu daga cikin mabiyansa na hakika a lokacin bayyanarsa da kuma buyarsa sannan kuma ya sanya zuciyar wannan mai girman ta yarda da mu.

en: Another possibility was that the attack had been arranged to weaken our front at a particular place so that the enemy could carry out a large-scale operation. When you look at the issue from this perspective, it becomes clear that the enemy is after thwarting the scientific movement in the country.
ha: A lokacin da kuke kallon lamarin da wannan mahangar, za a iya fahimtar cewa makiya suna kokarin kawar da yunkurin ciyar da ilimi na kasar nan gaba ne; wato wannan daya ne daga cikin makirce-makircen makiya.

en: The foundations that were established by the Holy Prophet (s.w.a.) - faith, rationality, struggle and dignity - are the main foundations of an Islamic community.
ha: Wadannan tushe da Manzon Allah (s.a.w.a) ya gina, wato tushe na imani, tushe na amfani da hankali, tushe na gwagwarmaya, tushe na daukaka, su ne asalin tushen al'ummar musulmi.

en: Physical strength is not enough. Having high intelligence is necessary.
ha: A'a, karfi kawai bai wadatar ba, akwai bukatar hazaka.

en: There is no doubt that colossal social upheavals have always relied on solid foundation of history and civilization and are products of accumulation of wisdom and experiences.
ha: Ko shakka babu a ko da yaushe sauyi mai girma na zamantakewa yana dogaro ne da tarihi da ci gaba sannan kuma sakamako ne na tattaruwar masaniya da kwarewar da aka samu na tsawon lokaci.

en: The same is true of the Basij itself. At a certain stage, the enemy focused its global propaganda efforts on the Basij, and these efforts are partially continued even today.
ha: Makiya a wani lokaci - a yau ma suna ci gaba da yin hakan, a wani lokaci da karfi, a wani lokaci kuma da rauni - sun sanya dukkanin farfagandarsu ne a kan Basiji.

en: In such conditions, a woman who wears hijab stands on the medal platform in such countries and makes everyone respect her. Is this a minor achievement?
ha: To amma a irin wannan yanayin sannan kuma a cikin irin wadannan kasashen, a sami wata mace mai hijabi ta hau kan dandamalin karbar kyautar zakaran zakaru sannan kuma wajibi ne kowa da kowa ya girmama ta.

en: Were they happy about killing the people of Afghanistan?
ha: Shin suna cikin farin ciki da kuma amincewa da irin kisan gillan da ake yi wa al'ummar Afghanistan?

en: Definitely what has been done in this regard is more than what the people know.
ha: Ku san cewa abubuwan da aka yi ya dara abubuwan da mutane suka san an yi su.

en: Ayatollah Khamenei said that election is a manifestation of being present on the scene and reiterated: "With the conflict going on among the materialistic powers, the Iranian nation should always be present on the scene and maintain its vigilance in order to be able to defend its rights and the rights of its future generations."
ha: Ayatullah Khamenei ya bayyana cewar zabe dai daya ne daga cikin alamun da ke tabbatar da kasantuwar mutane a fagen don haka sai ya ce: A yayin da ake ci gaba da rikici da ja-in-ja tsakanin masu takama da karfi na abin duniya, wajibi ne al'ummar Iran su kiyaye kasantuwarsu a fage da kuma nuna sanin ya kamata don ta hakan ne za su sami damar tabbatar da hakkokinsu da kuma kiyaye su ga zuriya masu zuwa.

en: The interesting idea to have a day for members of the Islamic Revolution's Guards Corps and to relate this day to the auspicious birthday anniversary of Imam Hussein (a.s.) is a significant innovation which shows us the path.
ha: Samar da wata rana mai sunar ranar dakarun kare juyi da kuma jingina ta da ranar haihuwar Shugaban shahidai (Imam Husaini, amincin Allah ya tabbata a gare shi) wani lamari ne da ya dace wanda kuma yake da wata manufa da ake son cimma ta.

en: How can one do business, negotiate and reach an agreement with such a policy?
ha: To ta yaya za a iya mu'amala da irin wannan siyasar, ta yaya za a iya tattaunawa kan hakan, ta ya ya za a iya cimma wata yarjejeniya da irin wannan siyasar?

en: The prayer "O Transformer of power and circumstances" transforms the year. This transformation is not just limited to transforming winter to spring. After all, all seasons of the year are transformed.
ha: Ana fadin cewa: "Ya Mai sauya shekara"; Shi ne ya ke sauya shekara. Sauya shekara ba wai kawai ta takaita ne ga sauya lokacin zafi zuwa lokacin damina ba; alal hakika dukkanin lokuta ne suke sauyawa.

en: The people of Qom were successful in all great trials, and their youth were in the vanguard.
ha: A dukkanin manyan jarrabawar da aka fuskanta, mutanen Kum sun ci nasarar wannan jarrabawar; sannan kuma matasa su ne suka kasance a sahun gaba-gaba.

en: You are making grave mistakes in the region.
ha: Kuna ci gaba da tafka babban kuskure a yankin nan.

en: I would also like to commemorate our kind, humble, lovely and friendly scholar, the late Hajj Agha Mojtaba Hajj Akhund, who was one of my old friends in Hojjatiyyeh School in Qom. He was pious, sincere, virtuous and honest.
ha: Haka nan kuma wajibi ne in ambaci babban malamin nan na kyawawan halaye, mai tawali'u kuma abin kauna marigayi Hajj Agha Mujtaba Hajj Akhund, wanda shi ma ya kasance daga cikin tsoffin abokanmu a makarantar Hujjatiya ta Kum; mutum ne mumini, mai tsarkin zuciya, salihi sannan kuma mai gaskiya.

en: And we are truly grateful to our people and we hope that Allah the Exalted will fully reward them.
ha: A saboda haka muna gode wa Allah Madaukakin Sarki, haka nan kuma muna gode wa al'ummarmu masu girma sannan kuma ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da ya ba su cikakkiyar ladar wannan aiki da suka yi.

en: Leader’s Speech on 24th Demise Anniversary of Imam Khomeini (r.a.) - Khamenei.ir
ha: Jawabin Jagora A Taron Tunawa Da Shekaru 24 Da Rasuwar Imam Khumaini (r.a)

en: This is not at all accepted by Islam.
ha: To wannan ba abu ne wanda Musulunci ya amince da shi ba.

en: I do not want to say that this is very difficult or impossible.
ha: A'a ba wai ina cewa ne wannan lamari ne mai tsananin wahala da ba za a iya cimma shi ba ne, a'a.

en: I listened to his recitation from a distance.
ha: Daga nesa na ke kallo da kuma sauraren sautin.

en: Now, I would like you to ask yourself why the old policy of spreading â€œphobiaâ€ and hatred has targeted Islam and Muslims with an unprecedented intensity.
ha: A halin yanzu ina son tambayarku, shin me ya sa yanzu aka dawo da tsohuwar siyasar sanya tsoro da kyamar Musulunci da musulmi?

en: This self-confidence is very valuable for a nation, for the scientists of a nation, for the youth of a nation.
ha: Irin wannan yarda da kai a tsakanin wata al'umma da wasu masana da matasa na wata al'umma lamari ne mai kimar gaske.

en: If you trace these elements, you will see that all of them are connected to espionage and intelligence services of the enemies of Islam - not the enemies of Iran and Shia Muslims, rather the enemies of Islam.
ha: Idan kuka binciki dukkanin wadannan mutanen, za ku samu cewa suna da alaka da cibiyoyin leken asirin makiyan Musulunci; ba wai makiyan Iran ba, ba wai makiyan Shi'a kawai ba, face dai makiyan Musulunci.

en: Today the officials in charge of this center discussed some of these things during this long visit, and I offered some recommendations.
ha: Wasu daga cikin awdannan maganganu a yau jami'ai sun yi bayaninsu tsawon wannan rangadi da muka yi, mu ma dai mun ba da wasu shawarwari.

en: They had ruled France for several hundred years and there were very powerful rulers among them.
ha: Shekaru daruruwa suka yi suna mulki a kasar Faransa, daga cikin su akwai sarakuna masu karfin gaske.

en: Labor is a value.
ha: Aiki dai wani lamari ne mai kima.

en: We should focus on guiding our people and helping our government make progress. I hope Allah the Exalted will awaken us so that we can identify and fulfill our responsibilities appropriately.
ha: Muna rokon Allah da Ya farkar da mu daga barci na gafala, don mu sami damar ayyana nauyin da ke wuyanmu da kyau, mu fahimci hakan sannan kuma da yardar Allah mu yi aiki daidai da hakan.

en: They said that it was a feudalist movement. The nationalists - who were claiming to support anti-government activities - also condemned the movement.
ha: Su ma masu da'awar kishin kasa - da suke da'awar goyon bayan gwagwarmayar fada da gwamnati - su ma sun yi Allah wadai da wannan yunkurin; suna cewa wannan wani makahon yunkuri ne maras manufa, wani yunkuri ne na wuce gona da iri.

en: They started this work with full intensity from the beginning of the year 1391, particularly from Mordad.
ha: Sun fara wannan aikin ne tun daga farkon shekara ta 1391, musamman daga watan Mordad, inda suka tsananta abin sosai.

en: Such has been the law of Allah that has indeed run before, and you shall not find a change in Allah's law."
ha: Hanyar Allah wadda ta shude daga gabanin wannan, kuma ba za ka sami musanya ba ga hanyar Allah (ta taimakon muminai a kan mai zaluntarsu) (Suratul Fat'h 48:22-23).

en: Ordibehesht 22, 1395
ha: 22, ga watan Urdebehesht, 1395

en: The recent events in France and similar ones in some other Western countries have convinced me to directly talk to you about them.
ha: Lamurrann baya-bayan nan da suka faru a kasar Faransa da makamantansu a wasu kasashen Yammaci, su ne suka sanya ni ganin ya dace in yi magana da ku kai tsaye.

en: Dear God, we are eagerly waiting for this opportunity.
ha: Mu ma dai masu kaunar samun wannan dacewar ce - to kuwa mutum ya sayar wa Allah da wannan rayuwa ta sa ne, ya kuma sami gagarumar riba.

en: Another point that is related to this election is that the Majlis that has emerged out of this election has a heavy responsibility to shoulder.
ha: Wani lamari kuma da ke tattare da wannan zaben, shi ne cewa majalisar da za a kafa sakamakon wannan zaben tana da gagarumin nauyi a wuyanta.

en: We should interpret it as a dynamic and progressive concept. One of the things that we need to pay attention to in the arena of action is that we should take care not to let revolutionary organizations become involved with fruitless and possibly harmful activities during this progressive movement.
ha: Da wannan ma'ana ta sauyi da ci gaba. Daya daga cikin lamurran da ake bukatar su a fagen sannan kuma wajibi ne a kula da su su ne cewa: mu lura kada cibiyoyi na juyi su da mu kansu da ayyukan da ba su da amfani wadanda a wasu lokuta ma masu cutar da wannan yunkuri na ci gaba ne.

en: That is the problem.
ha: Wannan shi ne kawai lamarin.

en: We know where we are going. We know our friends, and we know our enemies as well.
ha: Mun san ina muke tafiya; mun fahimci masoyanmu haka nan kuma mun fahimci makiyanmu.

en: The first effect of this awakening is the expression of hatred toward the presence of the arrogant powers in the region.
ha: Tasirin wannan farkawa na farko shi ne irin kyamar kasantuwar ma'abota girman kai a wannan yankin da al'umma suke nunawa.

en: Everybody is so busy with side issues and trivial matters that they do not realize what is happening in the world of Islam.
ha: Sun shagaltar da kowa da kowa, (musulmi) sun shagaltu da wasu ‘yan kananan abubuwa kuma na gefe, ba su san me ke faruwa ba a duniyar musulmi.

en: Our helpless foreign enemies are thinking of a way to turn this election into a threat against the Islamic Republic. This is while an election is a great opportunity for the Islamic Republic.
ha: Makiyanmu a waje, wadannan marasa mafita, suna ta tunanin yadda za su sanya wannan zaben ya zamanto barazana ga wannan tsarin na Musulunci; alhali kuwa zabe wata gagarumar dama ce ga tsarin Musulunci.

en: As this year's events have revealed to all, God Almighty has placed such a force in the resolve and determination of nations that no power whatsoever can withstand it.
ha: Wani abu na daban shi ne cewa abubuwan da suka faru a wannan shekara gudar sun tabbatar wa kowa cewa Allah Ma'abocin karfi da daukaka Ya sanya wani irin karfi cikin azama da nufi na al'ummomi da babu wani karfi da ya isa ya yi fada da shi.

en: They continue trying old methods and they will continue experiencing the bitter taste of defeat.
ha: Za su sake gwada wadannan siyasar, kuma har ila yau za su sake shan kashi.

en: Later on, it was announced that those who have done their military service for a few months should join the army again.
ha: Daga nan sai ya ce, daga baya an sanar da cewa mutanen da suka kare bautar kasarsu, za su yi iya sake dawowa fagen daga su ci gaba da yin hidima na wasu watanni.

en: This is the requirement for waiting.
ha: Wannan shi ne abin da ake bukata a yayin jiran dako.

en: We have been witness to many such things.
ha: Abin farin cikin shi ne cewa muna da dukkanin wadannan abubuwa.

en: The advances made by humanity, the scientific advances, the different areas of knowledge and the great discoveries that have been made in the world are all because of the emergence of the light of Islam in that amazing historical era.
ha: Dukkanin irin ci gaban da dan'adam ya samu, irin su ci gaba na ilimi, masaniya daban-daban da manyan abubuwan da ya gano a wannan duniyar, to kuwa hakan yana da alaka da bayyanar hasken Musulunci a wancan zamani na tarihi mai ban mamaki.

en: However, this does not mean that we should deny everything that has been done in order to present a solution to the existing problems.
ha: To amma bai kamata idan har muna da wata mafita daga wadannan matsalolin, shi kenan sai mu yi inkarin dukkanin abubuwan da a yau din nan aka aikata su ba.

en: These were the events that took place in the year 1390, a year in which the enemies made so many investments in order to harm the people of Iran and the Islamic Republic.
ha: To wadannan dai su ne abubuwan da suka faru a shekara ta 1390 din; shekarar da makiya suka sanya dukkanin karfinsu don su cutar da al'ummar Iran a cikinta.

en: Of course, there is also the spirit of relationship with God.
ha: Ko da yake a nan akwai wani lamari wanda shi ne alaka da Ubangiji.

en: Today when I take a look at you, I see that you paid attention to fundamental things in the poems that you recited in this meeting.
ha: A yau ma a lokacin da na duba, ina iya ganin a tsakanin wakokin da aka rera, lalle an yi la'akari da bukatar da ake da ita.

en: The oppressed Bahraini nation is like the Egyptian nation, the Tunisian nation and the Yemeni nation. They are all in the same situation. It is meaningless to distinguish between the movements of these nations.
ha: Al'ummar kasar Bahrain da ake zalunta tamkar mutanen Masar da Tunusiya suke; abin da (mutanen Masar da Tunusiya) suke so shi ne abin da (mutanen Bahrain) suke nema; babu wata ma'ana cikin bambanta tsakaninsu.

en: On the issue of the economy, what is important and fundamental is the issue of domestic production, the issue of employment and eliminating unemployment, the issue of economic dynamism and the issue of combating recession. These are the issues that people are faced with.
ha: Dangane da batun tattalin arziki, abin da ke da muhimmanci kuma na asali shi ne batun samar da kayayyakin da ake bukata a cikin gida; batun samar da aikin yi da kawar da rashin aikin yi; batun yunkuri da karfafa tattalin arziki da fada da koma bayan tattalin arziki; wadannan matsaloli ne da al'ummarmu suke fuskanta.

en: Similarly, the rest of our dear martyrs - from the Ground Force, the Navy, the Air Force and different other parts of the Armed Forces - rendered great services. You should appreciate this university.
ha: Haka nan sauran shahidanmu masu girma, na sojojin kasa, sojojin ruwa da sojojin sama, haka nan kuma na bangarori daban-daban na soji, sun gudanar da hidima mai girman gaske. Wajibi ne ku girmama wadannan jami'oi.

en: Interviewer: Thank you very much.
ha: Dan Jarida: Ina godiya.

en: It would be very appropriate if prayer leaders commended prominent students of every area in mosques and in front of the people.
ha: Abu ne mai kyau idan ya zamana a masallaci ne sannan kuma a idanuwan mutane ne limamin wani masallaci zai girmama daliban da suka yi fice a fagen ilimi.

en: Moral values have been trampled upon. People of the world are suffering from the consequences of this moral degeneration, and intellectuals living in different countries are aware of this great tragedy.
ha: A halin yanzu al'ummomi suna cikin tsaka mai wuyan irin wannan mummunan yanayi na rashin kyawawan halaye, sannan kuma masu tunani da masanan al'ummomi suna ci gaba da sanya ido kan wannan gagarumar hasara, suna wahala, suna bayyana hakan; ana iya ganin hakan cikin maganganunsu.

en: It became clear to us and to all those who follow up the issues of Iran that what is important for a nation is relying on its own capacities, trusting Allah the Exalted, having faith in itself and not relying on its enemies.
ha: Ta bayyana mana da kuma dukkanin wadanda suka sanya ido kan abubuwan da suka shafi Iran, cewa abin da ke da muhimmanci ga wata al'umma, shi ne dogaro da irin karfin da take da shi, dogaro da Allah Madaukakin Sarki, dogara da kanta da kuma rashin dogaro da makiya.

en: Yes, he was a truly sincere man. He was the embodiment of sincerity.
ha: Alal hakika haka lamarin yake; Lalle shi ya kasance mutum ne mai ikhlasi, samuwarsa cike take da ikhlasi.

en: If an investor who wants to engage in a lawful and honorable business knows that the government will prosecute those who violate the law, he will be encouraged more.
ha: Duk wani dan kasuwan da yake son samun abinci na halal sannan kuma yake son gudanar da ayyuka na halal wadanda shari'a ta amince da su, idan ya fahimci cewa gwamnati ba za ta yi sassauci ga masu karya doka ba, hakan lamari ne da zai karfafa masa gwuiwa.

en: Ayatollah Khamenei stated that the recent events in the region are a manifestation of this truth, reiterating: "Certain powers tried to safeguard their interests with bullying and weapons, but they failed.
ha: Ayatullah Khamenei ya bayyana abubuwan da ke ci gaba da faruwa a yankin Gabas ta tsakiya cikin ‘yan shekarun baya-bayan nan a matsayin abubuwan da ke tabbatar da abubuwan da ya fadi a bayan inda ya ce: Manyan kasashen duniya suna ta kokari ta hanyar amfani da tilasci da kuma makamai wajen tabbatar da manufofinsu wanda sun gaza cimma hakan.

en: This was the unforgettable testament of the great Imam Khomeini.
ha: Wannan kuwa ita ce wasiyyar da ba za a taba mancewa da ita ta marigayi mai girma Imam Khumaini.

en: One of the gentlemen presented a report about our produce.
ha: Daya daga cikin malamai ya gabatar da wani rahoto kan amfanin gona na lambu (‘ya'yan itatuwa) da ake samarwa.

en: The Leader of the Islamic Revolution added: "This movement will finally benefit the people of the region, but they must be fully vigilant because the enemy is looking for an opportunity to derail this movement."
ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya kara da cewa: Karshe da makomar wannan yunkuri lamari ne da zai amfani al'ummar yankin nan, to sai dai wajibi ne su yi taka tsantsan da fahimtar cewa makiya suna nan sun dana tarkonsu don kautar da wannan yunkuri daga tafarkinsa na asali.

en: Today the sense of Islamic identity among Muslim countries is not comparable to 30 years ago. Today the sense of Islamic dignity and the demand for this Islamic dignity is not comparable to the past.
ha: Wannan zama abin koyin ya haifar da wani tafarki wanda hakan shi ne akida ta Musulunci da kuma daukaka ta Musulunci. A yau al'ummomin duniya suna jin mutumci da daukaka ta Musulunci a tattare da su, ba za a iya kwatanta hakan da shekaru talatin din da suka gabata ba; lalle ba za iya kwatantawa ba.

en: This is a case of failure to identify the appropriate audience.
ha: To wannan shi ne fahimtar wanda ake magana da shi.

en: His descriptions have been applied to a particular person and after a century or so the same descriptions have been applied to another person. These things are wrong and misleading. When there is deviation, the truth will be sidelined and it will be a tool to mislead people.

ha: Tun bayan rasuwar marigayi Imam akwai wadansu tsare-tsare da suke da su; sakamakon wadannan tsare-tsare ya fito a shekarar 1378 (1999), mafi yawa daga cikinku za ku iya tuna lamarin nan na rikici da ya barke a jami'ar Tehran da sauran batutuwan da suka faru.

en: That is to say, there were other people who were not working for the factory.
ha: Amma mutanen da suka taru a wajen dakin taron sun kai mutane dari bakwai zuwa dari takwas; wato wasu ma wadanda ba ma'aikatan ba sun zo.

en: Because we have been an oil-rich country, we have been in the habit of using gas, natural gas, diesel and kerosene in a wasteful way.
ha: Da yake mu din nan kasa ce da Allah ya albarkace ta da man fetur, don haka mun saba da yin almubazzaranci wajen amfani da man fetur, gas, kananzir ba tare da lura ba.

en: The same is true of other places. The same crimes are unfortunately being committed in America and other places and countries.
ha: Haka lamarin yake a wasu wajajen ma na daban; a Amurka da sauran wajaje da sauran kasashe na daban, abin bakin cikin haka lamarin yake.

en: Their enmity towards the Islamic Republic is because of the flag of Islam that has been raised in this country and the Islamic Republic's constant call to unity and Islamic power and glory.
ha: Kiyayyar da su ke nunawa jamhuriyar Musulunci saboda daga tutar Musulunci ne a cikin wannan kasa da kuma kiran da ta ke yi na hadin kai a tsakanin musulmi da karfafa Musulunci da kuma daukaka shi.

en: Ayatollah Khamenei referred to the Holy Prophet's (s.w.a.) establishment of an Islamic community as a proof of the fact that Islam is not limited to verbal admonishment and that it is after implementing divine rules in society. His Eminence said that appointing a successor for the Holy Prophet (s.w.a.) in Ghadir Khumm was an effort to continue this path.
ha: Ayatullah Khamenei ya bayyana kafa hukuma da Manzon Allah (s.a.w.a) ya yi da kuma kokarin samar da wata al'umma wacce ta yi daidai da koyarwar Musulunci a matsayin abin da ke tabbatar da cewa Musulunci ba wai magana ta fatar baki ne kawai face dai wani kokari ne na tabbatar da hukumce-hukumcen Ubangiji a cikin al'umma wanda kuma ba za a iya samunsa ba in ba ta hanyar kafa hukuma ma'abociyar adalci ba.

en: When it comes to revealing things about other people, we should only reveal their good characteristics.
ha: Da sasanta tsakanin mutane, idan har akwai wani sabani tsakanin mutane, to mu yi kokarin sasanta su.

en: These were the threats in which foreigners were directly involved.
ha: Wadannan abubuwa ne da suke da alaka da ‘yan kasashen waje, wanda suke da hannu cikinsu kai tsaye.

en: Of course, if we take a careful and analytical look today, we see that the unreal effort which America and its allies are making in the region today under the name of confronting DAESH is, in fact, an effort for channeling enmities among Muslims more than it is an effort for nipping this evil movement in the bud.
ha: Ko shakka babu a yau idan mutum ya kalli lamarin da idon basira, zai ga cewa kokarin da Amurka da kawayenta suke yi cikin abin da suke kira ‘fada da Da'esh' - wanda a hakikanin gaskiya ba haka lamarin yake ba - kafin ya zamanto wani kokari ne na ganin bayan wadannan lalatattun kungiyoyi, wani kokari ne wajen rarraba kan musulmin.

en: However, looking back on the path that we have followed will also be beneficial for us so that we see what we have done, how we have moved forward and what results our work has produced, and we should learn lessons from it and gain experience.
ha: Duk da cewa duba baya da kuma abin da muka yi a baya zai kasance mai amfani a gare mu, don mu ga me muka yi, ya ya yunkurinmu ya kasance, mene ne sakamakon abubuwan da muka yi, sannan kuma mu dau darasi daga cikinsu.

en: In certain narrations he has been likened to Prophet Joseph whose brothers used to see him.
ha: A wasu daga cikin riwayoyin ma an kamanta shi (Imam Mahdi) da Annabi Yusuf wanda 'yan'uwansa suna ganinsa, yana tare da su, suna tafiya wajensa, to amma ba su san shi ba.

en: Seyyed Ali Khamenei
ha: Sayyid Ali Khamenei

en: This fall is not preventable. They are condemned to destruction.
ha: Wannan lalacewar dai ba abu ne da za a iya hana faruwarsa ba. Lalle za su fadi kasa warwas.

en: At the beginning of each new year, people should tell themselves, "Last year and the previous years are gone, and there is nothing I can do about them, but now a new stage has started." We should define a new relationship with Allah the Exalted, proactively and retroactively. The proactive aspect is related to committing sins.
ha: Daga lokacin da sabuwar shekara ta shigo, to sai mutum ya yi tunanin cewa to a shekarar da ta gabata dai ga yadda zuciyarsa ta kasance; yanzu kuma wani sabon lokaci ne, sai mu yi kokarin kulla wata sabuwar alaka da Allah Madaukakin Sarki; shin a bangare mai kyau ne da kuma mara kayu. Bangare mara kyau shi ne sabon Allah.

en: This is the goal of the hegemony of the arrogant powers.
ha: Wannan ita ce manufar ma'abota girman kan.

en: This behavior is not Islamic. It is not revolutionary.
ha: To wannan dai ba dabi'a ce ta Musulunci ba, ba ta juyin juya halin Musulunci ba ce.

en: Dear God, bestow a Quranic, divine and Islamic life on us.
ha: Ka arzurta mu da rayuwa ta Alkur'ani, rayuwa irin ta Ubangiji da kuma Musulunci.

en: The Leader of the Islamic Revolution stated that the Islamic Republic of Iran is not an aggressive country.

en: Responding to a faulty statement should be done in a particular way.
ha: Mayar da martani da magana ta kuskure tana da nata hanyar, tana da aikin da ya kebanta da ita.

en: The third point is that in the movements of Islamic Awakening it is necessary to pay constant attention to the bitter and horrifying experience of following the West in politics, behavior and lifestyle.
ha: Batu na uku shi ne cewa cikin yunkuri na farkawa ta Musulunci, wajibi ne a koda yaushe a dinga lura da irin cutarwar da aka fuskanta sakamakon koyi da kuma biyayya ga kasashen yammaci cikin siyasa da halaye da kuma salon rayuwa.

en: This language was a combination of reason and feelings.
ha: Maganganu ne da suka kumshi tunani da hankali da kuma tausayawa.

en: As the people who are familiar with the Holy Quran, who recite the Holy Quran and who are interested in listening to recitations by qura with pleasant voices, you dear youth should appreciate your value. By Allah's favor, you will be rewarded by God.
ha: Ku din nan matasa wadanda kuke masu kaunar Alkur'ani, ma'abota Alkur'ani, ma'abota tilawar Alkur'ani, haka nan kuma abin farin ciki ku din nan masu kaunar Alkur'ani ne, wadanda ku din nan wani bangare ne na wannan abin farin ciki, lalle ku fahimci irin karfin da kuke da shi. Da yardar Allah, Allah zai ba ku lada.

en: Ayatollah Khamenei said that the law enforcement officials of the country will fulfill their duties when necessary and added: "Of course students have to identify the sources of corruption and introduce them to others. But everything has to be done in a peaceful atmosphere."
ha: Yayin da yake jaddada cewar idan har ya zamanto wajibi jami'ai da masu kiyaye doka za su gudanar da aikinsu Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya ce: Tabbas daliban jami'a suna da nauyi a wuyansu, su gano mutanen da su ne tushen fasadi sannan kuma su sanar da su ga mutane, to sai dai wajibi ne a gudanar da dukkanin komai cikin nitsuwa da kwanciyar hankali.

en: Why?
ha: Saboda me?

en: That is to say, the dimensions of his action are far more than what we estimate.
ha: Wato bangarorinsa ya ketare irin abubuwan da muke tunani nesa ba kusa ba.

en: They claim that they sincerely want to have rational negotiations with Iran - that is to say, they claim that they do not want imposition.
ha: Wato da gaske muna son tattaunawa da ku sannan kuma tattaunawar da ta yi daidai da hankali; wato ba tattaunawa ta tilasci ba.

en: Make as many efforts as you can on this sacred path in a sincere and selfless way and know that this country is indebted to you dear youth who show its power.
ha: Ku yi dukkanin abin da za ku iya wajen ganin an ci gaba da wannan kokari mai tsarki, wanda aka yi shi cikin dukkanin tsarkin zuciya da dukkan karfi, ku san cewa wannan kasa da wannan tsari da kuma wannan al'umma suna da bashin matasa a wuyansu, wadanda su ne suke tabbatar da irin tsayin dakan wannan al'umma da kuma bayyanar da shi a fili.

en: Today if one takes a look at the enemy's efforts in the vast arena of methods of propaganda - from Internet tools to audio visual means and to mouthpieces they have in different places inside and outside the country - one would see that one of the main techniques is to distort the events that happen in the country and to present the situation of the country as disappointing and in decline.
ha: A yau idan mutum ya kalli ayyukan da makiya suke yi a fagen farfagandarsu; kama daga kafafen internet har zuwa da hanyoyi na gidajen radiyo da talabijin da sauran masu magana da yawunsu da suke bangarori daban-daban - a cikin gida ma suna da wadanann mutane - za mu ga cewa mafi girman abin da suke kokarin yi shi ne sauya hakikanin abin da ke faruwa a cikin gida; su nuna yanayin da kasa take ciki a matsayin wani yanayi mai sanya yanke kauna, lamari ne da ya kama hanyar rushewa da kuma kama hanyar kai wa tsaka mai wuya.

en: Be careful.

en: 1989- Elected as the Leader of the Islamic Republic of Iran by the Assembly of Experts after the demise of Imam Khomeini.

en: The issue of Ghadir is a clear historical and Islamic issue. The doubts and questions - about the meaning of this sentence - that have come to the minds of some intellectual and philosophical newcomers of today are the same doubts and questions that have been raised since a thousand years ago.
ha: Amma asalin lamarin kan, wani abu ne da aka yarda da faruwarsa a tarihin Musulunci. Irin shubuhohi da wasu ma'anoni da a halin yanzu wasu suke gabatarwa kan wannan lamarin, maganganun ne da shekaru dubun da suka gabata aka gabatar da su, sannan kuma manyan malamai sun amsa da kuma magance wadannan shubuhohi.

en: If, over these 30-something years, the enemies have not managed to undermine the Islamic Republic, the reason is this.
ha: Matukar aka rasa wannan gagarumar garkuwa, to kuwa lalatattun ‘yan mulkin mallaka na duniya za su sami hanyar cutar da wannan tsari na Jamhuriyar Musulunci.

en: The revolution took place in the year 1789.
ha: To a wannan shekarar ne dai wannan juyi ya faru.

en: Those evil, dependent and greedy politicians who were submissive against the enemies and treated the people in an angry way, were replaced by representatives of the people. Our scientifically backward country transformed into a country that was advanced in terms of science.
ha: Wadannan lalatattun ‘yan siyasa masu mika kai a gaban makiya da kuma nuna fushinsu a kan mutane, sun mayar da kansu wakilan jama'a. Wannan kasa ta mu da ta ci baya a fagen ilimi, an mayar da ita ta zamanto kasa ma'abociyar ci gaba a fagen ilimi.

en: The same is still true today.
ha: A yau ma haka lamarin ya ke.

en: The message of Islam includes this obedience and learning - that is to say, the knowledge, wisdom, acumen, mercy, unity, morality and other human characteristics that the Holy Prophet's (s.w.a.) message promoted and that Hazrat Abi Abdullah Ja'far ibn Muhammad al-Sadiq (peace and greetings be upon him) made the most efforts to promote and establish.
ha: Wato wannan ilimi da amfani da hankali da hikima da rahama da hadin kai da kyawawan halaye da dukkanin siffofin da Manzon Allah (s.a.w.a) ya ke da su, wadanda Imam Abi Abdillah Ja'afar bn Muhammad al-Sadik (amincin Allah ya tabbata a gare shi) ya yi gagarumin kokari wajen yada wadannan ma'anoni da kuma tabbatar da su.

en: Superpowers will naturally deploy their forces against the movements that are not in line with their interests. These things are not surprising and should be expected by any nation that enters great arenas of life.

en: He referred to the key role of teachers and reiterated: "If teachers constantly take the greatness of their role into consideration, their faith, motivation, and efforts will be doubled."
ha: Sannan kuma yayin da yake ishara da irin rawar da malamai suke takawa cikin rayuwar al'umma ya bayyana cewar: Idan har malamai suka ci gaba da ganin irin girma da daukakar da aikinsu yake da ita, to kuwa imani da kokarinsu zai rubanya.

en: I named the 1387 as "The Year of Reforming the Norms of Consumption" meaning being economical and avoiding waste.
ha: Shekaru biyun da suka gabata, mun sanya wa shekarar sunan "Shekarar Gyara Yadda Ake Amfani Da Albarkatun Kasa"; tsumi da tattali da kuma nesantar almubazzaranci.

en: Relying on Islamic teachings - according to which human dignity is a top priority and according to which killing a single innocent person is like killing all human beings - and as a nation which has suffered great losses during the past three decades as a result of terrorism, we think of fighting this evil phenomenon as our fundamental responsibility, and by Allah's favor, we will continue our efforts on the path of this great struggle with all our power.
ha: Mu dai ta hanyar dogaro da koyarwar addinin Musulunci wanda girmama mutumcin dan'adam daya ne daga cikin manyan bangarorinta sannan kuma ya ke ganin kashe wani mutum guda da bai ci bai sha ba a matsayin kashe dukkanin mutane ne, sannan kuma a matsayin wata al'umma wacce cikin shekaru talatin din da suka gabata ta fuskanci gagarumar hasara daga ayyukan ta'addanci, lalle tana ganin fada da wannan annoba ta shaidan a matsayin wani nauyi da ba za ta taba yin watsi da shi ba da ke wuyanta, kuma cikin yardar Allah za ta ci gaba da tafiya a kan hanyar fada da wannan annoba da dukkan karfinta.

en: Today the Iranian nation is known as an inspiring nation among Muslim nations.

en: It is necessary to be extremely cautious in such a world.

ha: Ina kuma taya iyalansu bakin ciki ina kuma rokon Allah akan ya basu hakuri da nutsuwa da kuma lada da sakamako da kuma rokon samun sauki ga wadanda su ka jikkata.

en: The fourth strength: international prestige.
ha: Abu na hudu cikin abubuwa masu kyau da karfin da muke da shi: shi ne mutumci da daukaka ta kasa da kasa.

en: The magnificent hajj ceremony shows us the appropriate grounds for fulfilling these responsibilities and it calls us to intensified effort and labor.

en: The path of perfection is an endless path. The more you move ahead, the more you will experience the pleasure of perfection.

en: On the economic front, they announced and reiterated that they wanted to cripple the Iranian nation through sanctions.
ha: A fagen tattalin arziki, a fili suke fadin cewa suna son su gurguntar da al'ummar Iran ne ta hanyar wadannan takunkumi (da suke sanyawa).

ha: Wato a hada lamurra da tunani - ya dau darasi sannan idanuwansa suka budu - ta haka ne basira take bayyana.

en: In a meeting with judiciary officials, I went further than this and said that even if a crime has been proven, public identification of the convict should not be the primary course of action.

en: The Islamic spirit has been revived in Muslim countries.
ha: Ana iya ganin kishin Musulunci a kasashen musulmi.

en: Because the Revolution is by nature a progressive movement, and an accelerated movement at that.

en: This is the wealth that Iran enjoys. They will run out of oil in four, ten, fifteen years, but considering the proven oil reserves, the Islamic Republic will have oil and gas for another eighty years.

en: The world of Islam, including Muslim governments and peoples, must familiarize themselves with the Saudi rulers and correctly understand their blasphemous, faithless, dependent and materialistic nature.
ha: A saboda haka ya hau kan duniyar musulmi, shin gwamnatoci ne ko kuma al'ummominsu, su fahimci mahukuntan Saudiyya da kuma gano yanayinsu ta keta hurumin abubuwa masu tsarki, rashin imani da kuma bautar abin duniya.

en: I commemorate those who were martyred in Mina and Masjid ul-Haraam last year and the martyrs of Makka of the year 1987. I pray to Glorious God to bestow clemency and mercy and the highest positions on them. I extend my greetings to the Imam of the Age- may my soul be sacrificed for his sake- and I ask Allah that the accepted prayers of that honorable Imam improve the Islamic Ummah and save Muslims from the fitna and malevolence of the enemies.
ha: Ina jinjinawa shahidan Mina da Masjidul haram na shekarar bara, da shahidan Makka a shekarar 1987, ina mai rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da Yayi musu gafara da rahama da kuma daukaka matsayinsu, kamar yadda kuma na ke mika gaisuwa da sallama ta ga shugabanmu Bakiyatullah al-Aazam (rayukanmu su zamanto fansa a gare shi) ina mai neman addu'oinsa abin amsawa wajen tabbatar da daukaka ga al'ummar musulmi da kuma tseratar da su daga fitina da sharrin makiya.

en: This will work against their interests. They do not understand.
ha: Wannan lamari ne mai cutarwa a gare su, ba su fahimci hakan ba.

en: That is to say, if you make determined efforts, progress is definite. If there is determined effort and hope, progress is definite and there is no doubt in this regard.
ha: A duk lokacin da aka yi kokari, a duk lokacin da aka yi himma, a duk lokacin da ya zamana akwai fata, to ko shakka babu za a ci gaba, wato babu tafiya gaba a dawo baya.

en: The victory of the Iranian nation in the face of the taghuti system is a perfect example of the triumph of spiritual factors over material factors.
ha: Nasarar da al'ummar Iran ta samu a gwagwarmayar da ta yi da tsarin dagutu na kasar nan wani lamari ne da ke nuni da galabar ababe masu kusaci da Ubangiji a kan abubuwan duniya.

en: Ayatollah Khamenei’s Message to Hajj Pilgrims - 2011 - Khamenei.ir
ha: Sakon Jagora Ga Maniyyata Hajjin Bana (1432-2011)

en: Ayatollah Khamenei, the Supreme Leader of the Islamic Revolution, met Sunday morning with the family of Shahid Rajab Mohammadzade - a disabled war veteran [with severe facial disfiguration due to war injuries] who recently achieved martyrdom.
ha: Da ranar yau Lahadi (28-08-2016) ne Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei ya gana da iyalan sojan da ya sami rauni a wajen yaki shahid Haj Rajab Muhammad Zadeh.

en: We need to take into consideration both what the government has managed to do and what it has failed to do.
ha: Wajibi ne ya zamanto abubuwan da gwamnati ta iya aikatawa da kuma wadanda ta gagara aikatawa su zamanto tare.

en: In any case I would like to welcome all those who have attended these competitions. I hope Allah the Exalted will bestow His blessings on all of you out of respect for the Holy Quran, and I hope He will associate us with the Holy Quran in this world and in the hereafter.
ha: Mabudi na asali shi ne dai wannan tunani cikin Alkur'ani. Ala kulli hal, mu dai muna maraba da dukkanin masu karatu da haddar Alkur'ani na kasar mu da kuma baki 'yan kasashen wajen da suka zo; muna rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da Ya saukar da albarkokinsa a gare ku albarkacin Alkur'ani, sannan kuma ya tayar da mu a duniya da lahira tare da Alkur'ani.

en: Of course for ultimate success, insight is a necessary condition, but it is not sufficient.
ha: Ko da yake wajen samun cikakkiyar nasara, basira sharadi ne na wajibi, to amma ba sharadi ne da ke wadatarwa shi kadai ba.

en: This is the path that you dear people of Iran are treading. By Allah's favor, you will continue treading this path.
ha: Wannan hanya ita ce wacce ku din nan mutanen Iran masu girma kuka rika, kuke ci gaba da riko da ita sannan kuma da yardar Allah za ku ci gaba da binta.

en: Of course the sanctions that have been imposed on us during the recent years have grown in number and variety. However, the growth is insignificant compared to the growth in the number and variety of constructive activities in the country. Thirty years ago when they started imposing sanctions on us, their sanctions were more likely to hurt us than the sanctions that they currently impose on us and they repeatedly promise that they will increase their sanctions.
ha: Ko da ya ke a shekarun baya-bayan nan an fadada takunkumin, to amma sakamakon irin ci gaban ayyukan gina kasa daban-daban a kasar nan wadannan takunkumnin sun zamanto ba a bakin komai ba. Shekaru talatin kenan da fara sanya wadannan takunkumin, mai yiyuwa ne takunkumin (wancan lokacin) su fi cutar da mu a kan irin takunkumin da a halin yanzu ake sanya mana da kuma gudanar da su kamar yadda kuma suke ci gaba da alkawarin cewa za a kara su.

en: Because they witnessed the development of the Islamic Republic's thoughts in the world of Islam, they placed more emphasis on and showed more persistence in creating discord.

en: I pray to Allah the Exalted to help us do our share of work in this great public endeavor and make God satisfied with us.

en: This is discipline. Fortunately, today we see that these things are fully observed both in the Army and the Islamic Revolution's Guards Corps.

en: Elsewhere in his speech, Ayatollah Khamenei said it is expected that the bilateral agreements between the two counties are seriously pursued by the Iraqi officials.

Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya bayyana farin cikinsa da irin ayyukan da gwamnatin ta Iraki take aikatawa inda ya ce: Yunkurin da a yau ka yi wa kasarka, lalle wani yunkuri ne mai kimar gaske, duk kuwa da cewa bukatar kasar Iraki ta dara abin da aka yi din.

ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei, a wata ganawa da ya yi a safiyar yau laraba (27-4-2011) da dubun dubatan ma'aikatan kasar Iran don tunawa da ranar ma'aikata ta duniya ya bayyana cewar ci gaba wata makoma ce mai kyau kuma ta tabbas ga al'ummar Iran.

en: I am thankful to Allah the Exalted who gave me another opportunity to arrange this warm and friendly meeting and exchange ideas about important issues of the country. I will divide my statements into three parts.
ha: Muna gode wa Allah Madaukakin Sarki da Ya sake ba mu damar wata shekarar don mu sami damar sake haduwa da kuma shirya wannan taro da ke cike da so da kauna don yin bahasi kan lamurra masu muhimmanci na kasar nan da sauraren maganganu sannan mu ma mu fadi wasu abubuwan.

en: Today the Palestinian nation is the champion of resistance. The Lebanese nation broke the phony awe of the Zionist regime on its own and won the 33-day war.
ha: A yau al’ummar Palastinu sun zamanto gwarazan gwagwarmaya, al’ummar Labanon su kadai din sun dunkufar da gwamnatin yahudawan sahyoniya sannan kuma suka yi nasara a yakin kwanaki 33; sannan al’ummar Iran kuma ta zamanto mai daga tuta da kuma jagorar tafarkin ci gaba.

en: Imam Khamenei’s Hajj Message - 2016
ha: Sakon Jagora Imam Khamenei Ga Maniyyata Hajjin Bana (1437-2016)

en: Unfortunately we see that instead of paying attention to what nations want, some people follow the path and make the move that the enemies of these nations want.
ha: Abin bakin cikin shi ne cewa muna ganin wasu mutane wadanda maimakon su lura da abubuwan da suke cikin zukatan mutane, amma sai suka kama hanyar da makiya suke tafiya a kanta.

en: They bombarded the Basij with negative propaganda in order to ruin its reputation in the eyes of the people, but they failed. "And Allah will show the truth to be the truth by His words."
ha: Sun ta yada bakaken farfagandar a kan Basiji, don su zubar da mutumcinsu a idon mutane, to sai dai sun gaza; "Kuma Allah Yana tabbatar da gaskiya da kalmominSa" (Suratu Yunus 10:82).

en: When people like you and I make our lives aristocratic and luxurious, the people will learn from us.
ha: A lokacin da muka sanya rayuwarmu ni da ku, ta zamanto rayuwa ta almubazzaranci da jin dadi, to kuwa mutane za su koya daga wajen mu.

en: Leader: Thank You.

en: The Revolution helped the Islamic Ummah remember these things.

en: They are hypocritical about Egypt. They say they support the Egyptian people. Our dear people should know that America's President has sent a message to the Iranian nation, saying that he supports them.
ha: To bai baci ba idan har al'ummar mu masu girma suka fahimci cewa shugaban kasar Amurka ya aika wa al'ummar Iran sako yana fadin cewa mu din nan masu goyon bayanku ne! suna ikirarin cewa su din nan suna adawa da masu mulkin kama-karya, suna tare da hakkokin al'ummomi; amma karya suke yi.

en: Of course, it is necessary for the people to have a jihad-like presence both in the economic arena and in the political arena.

en: But when you benefit from a native coach for soccer, basketball, volleyball, wrestling or any other sports, I become happy and I feel a sense of pride.

en: These are important points. These days are close to the birthday anniversary of Imam Mahdi (a.s.), which is a great Eid for the Muslim world and even all of humanity.
ha: Amma wannan lamari na akidar Mahdi, wanda gabatar da shi a cikin wadannan ranaku na kusa da ranar sha biyar ga watan Sha'aban da wannan idi mai girma na Musulunci kai na ma dukkanin bil'adama baki daya, lamari ne da ya dace a gabatar da shi sannan kuma wajibi ne a ba shi muhimmancin gaske kamar yadda ake ba wa sauran lamurra irin su annabci muhimmanci.

en: [Audience shouting slogans] Please listen. My purpose is not to express my opinion about past events.
ha: Manufar ba ita ce a bayyanar da mahanga dangane da wani lamari da ya wuce ba; muna so ne kawai mu kawo misali.

en: Today has been an enjoyable and pleasant day for me: being in the company of you dear brothers and youth from the Armed Forces, speaking to you in person and benefiting from the manifestations of your motivation and dynamism and from your pure and enlightened hearts.
ha: Rana ce mai kyau da faranta rai a gare ni saboda damar da na samu na kasancewa a cikinku, 'yan'uwa masu girma, matasa da dakaru masu makami, ganawa da tattaunawa da ku daga kurkusa sannan da kuma amfanuwa da irin alama da kumaji na irin wannan yunkuri na ku da kuma wannan zuciya taku mai haske.

en: In particular I would like to extend my congratulations to the individuals and families who are rendering services to the country, the Revolution and the Islamic system, the families of our dear martyrs, our disabled war veterans and their families and the families of those who have sensitive and important duties and cannot be with their families during these holidays.
ha: Har ila yau ina mika sakon taya murna na musamman ga mutane da iyalan da suke hidima wa wannan kasa da wannan juyin juya hali da kuma wannan tsari (na Musulunci); iyalan shahidai masu girma, wadanda suka sami raunuka da kuma iyalansu, da iyalan ma'aikata da jami'an da a wadannan ranaku suke ci gaba da gudanar da ayyukansu a daidai lokacin da sauran mutane suke tare da iyalansu su kuwa an hana su kasancewa tare da na su iyalan.

en: We approve of national movements that shout Islamic slogans and seek freedom.

en: They show malice and opposition, yet they expect the Iranian nation not to realize that they are hostile.
ha: Suuna nuna adawa da kiyayya, amma suna fatan cewa al'ummar Iran ba za su fahimci cewa su din nan makiya ne kuma suna kiyayya da su ba ne.

en: They should do this both in the arena of the economy and culture.

en: In this beloved and oppressed homeland, the taghuti, dependent and corrupt regime depended on different means of material power provided by international powers, but it was defeated by an unarmed nation that was equipped with faith and self-confidence.
ha: Tsarin dagutu, tsarin da ya dogara da ‘yan kasashen waje, lalataccen tsari da ya yi mulki a wannan kasar ya dogara ne da abubuwa daban-daban na duniya; to amma kuma duk da hakan ya sha kashi a gaban al'umma da suka fito hannun rabbana wadanda ba su da wani makami in ba makami na imani da dogaro da kai ba.

en: Resistance against avarice should always be the main standard in the forward movement for the officials in charge of this sector and so it shall remain, God willing.

Ta haka wadannan ‘yan’uwa biyu suka shiga sabuwar makarantar primare da aka bude mai suna “Darut Ta’alimi Diyanati” A Makarantar Hauza (Makarantar Addini)

en: He was keenly interested in philosophy and ethics.

en: Therefore, it becomes necessary to perform our daily prayers in an attentive and appropriate manner. If daily prayers are performed in an attentive manner, they will help us pay attention to our actions.

en: He resisted. He exuded patience, and others learned patience from him.
ha: Hakurinsa ya bayyana a fili, sannan sauran mutane ma sun koyi hakuri daga wajensa.

en: Some people argue that we should make concessions to the enemies in order to appease them and in this way they effectively prefer the interests of the enemies over the interests of the Iranian nation. This is wrong. They are angry because you exist, because the Islamic Republic exists, because Imam (r.a.) is alive in the minds of the people and in our national plans, because the people show their feelings for Imam (r.a.) every year on his demise anniversary.
ha: Fushin makiyan ya samo asali ne saboda kasantuwarku, saboda kasantuwar Jamhuriyar Musulunci, saboda Imam ya kasance a raye a cikin zukata da kwakwalan al'ummar kasar nan da kuma abubuwan da ake gudanarwa; saboda ranar 14 ga watan Khordad, wato ranar rasuwar Imam, saboda al'ummar Iran daga duk fadin kasar nan suna fitowa (don nuna kaunar gare shi).

en: This shows that enormous capacities exist in this area of the world.

en: Our youth made certain achievements that would have been impossible in the absence of the sanctions. In the area of infrastructure, in terms of the achievements that were made last year, the year 1391 stands out among the previous years.

en: Third, we should all know that the recent event has nothing to do with churches and Christianity. And the puppet-like moves of some insane priests and mercenaries should not be written down in the record of Christians and their religious men.

en: Today we are not short of individuals - in our mosques - who can present a view of this glorious and impressive image.

en: I read an article which quoted an American newspaper, published two, three days ago.

en: Similarly the area of our country is around one percent of the total land area of our planet. Well, we should have one percent of the total essential natural resources, but in certain cases we have 3, 4 or 5 percent of the total resources.

en: The year that has just begun – the year 1395 – is blessed with the auspicious name of Hazrat Zahra (s.a.) both in its beginning and in its end.
ha: Wannan sabuwar shekarar dai - wato shekarar 1395- farkonta haka nan karshenta, dukkaninsu sun sami albarkacin sunan mai grima Nana Fatima al-Zahra (amincin Allah ya tabbata a gare ta).

en: I do not want to use confidential reports or superficial things as evidence: what I am saying is simple mathematics.
ha: Ni dai ba wai ina so ne in kafa hujja da bayanai na sirri ko kuma wasu wadansu labarai na musamman ba ne; abin da zan fadi wani abu ne da yake a fili tamkar lissafin biyu a tara da biyu hudu ne.

en: Without a doubt, this agreement is to the advantage of all regional countries, it will further peace and global progress and it is in line with the principle of win-win.
ha: Ko shakka babu, cimma wannan yarjejeniyar, nasara ce ga dukkanin kasashen yankin nan da kuma tabbatar da sulhu da ci gaba na duniya.

en: All members of the Islamic Revolution's Guards Corps should pay attention to this point.

en: First of all, we should take care of the domestic factor.
ha: Da farko dai wajibi ne mu yi kokarin magance wadannan abubuwa da suke tattare da mu.

en: I pray to Allah the Exalted to bestow success, good fortune, dignity and glory on all you dear youth, your teachers, your commanders and all those who have played a role in creating this beautiful and glorious reality.
ha: Muna rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da Ya ba da dacewarsa ga daidaikun ku matasa masu girma, 'ya'yana masu girma, ga malamanku, kwamandojinku da dukkanin wadanda suke da hannu cikin wannan gagarumin lamari da kuma karshe mai kyau da girma da kuma daukaka a gare ku.

en: The following is the full text of message.
ha: Abin da ke biye fassarar wannan sako na Jagoran ne:

en: This tawwasul and this spiritual closeness are very good and necessary.
ha: Irin wadannan tawassuli da irin wadannan kauna lamurra ne masu kyaun gaske sannan kuma na wajibi.

en: They should tell people which books to read before others. When a youth or somebody who is not used to reading books is encouraged to start studying and to move ahead, he or she will often find a way that is appropriate for him or her.
ha: (A matsayin misali) Da farko dai wannan littafin, sai kuma wannan, daga nan kuma sai wannan. A lokacin da wani matashi da wani saurayi da ma duk mutumin da bai zamanto yana da kauna da kuma kula ta azo a gani ga lamarin karatu ba, ya shigo wannan fagen, a sannu zai gano hanyar da ya kamata ya kama.

en: It is the hand of divine power that helps human beings grow like this.

ha: Mu dai wata al'umma ce da take da mutane biliyan guda da rabi sannan kuma mu ke a wani waje mai matukar muhimmanci a bangaren dabi'a da albarkatun kasa.

en: The President of Slovenia referred to Iran as the main pillar of stability and security in the region and a country that deserves respect.
ha: Mr. Borut Pahor ya bayyana Iran a matsayin wani tushen zaman lafiya da kwanciyar hankalin yankin Gabas ta tsakiya kana kuma abar girmama.

en: But by Allah's favor and with their presence, resistance and firm determination, our people will respond to all these machinations and their response will be crushing and decisive.
ha: To amma al'ummar Iran cikin yardar Allah, za su mayar wa wadannan mutane da martani ta hanyar fitowarsu da kuma irin tsayin dakan da za su yi. Sannan kuma martanin da za su mayar din wani martani ne mai ruguzarwa.

en: The Americans accuse Hezbollah and the Lebanese Resistance - who are the most self-sacrificing forces in their country in the area of national defense - of terrorism.
ha: Amurkawa suna tuhumar kungiyar Hizbullah, kungiyar gwagwarmayar kasar Labanon - wacce ta kasance mafi sadaukarwar kungiyar kare kasa da za a samu a wata kasa - da ayyukan ta'addanci.

en: The sanctions caused the massive domestic capacities of the Iranian nation to become activated. The sanctions motivated us to start doing great things.
ha: Wato wannan takunkumin ya yunkurar da al'ummar Iran da kuma irin kwarewar da suke da ita, ta yadda suka gudanar da ayyuka masu girman gaske. Idan da ba don wannan takunkumin ba, da kuwa wadannan abubuwa ba su faru ba.

en: The people of Libya saw that a simple threat was enough to make Gadhafi load all the nuclear facilities of his country onto a ship and tell westerners to take them away.
ha: (Mutanen Libiya) da idanuwansu sun ga cewa daga 'yar wata barazana da aka yi masa, sai ga shi ya tattara dukkanin kwarewa da kayan aiki na nukiliyansa, ya sanya su cikin jirgin ruwa, ya mika wa mutanen yammaci, ya ce ku tafi da su!

en: These disastrous conditions can abort the progress of Islamic Awakening, destroy the mental awareness which has been created in the world of Islam, drag Muslims- once more- towards stagnation, isolation and decline and consign to oblivion important and fundamental issues such as the liberation of Palestine and other Muslim nations from the transgressions of the USA and Zionism.
ha: Wannan yanayi mai cike da matsaloli, yana iya cutar da wannan farkawa ta Musulunci da aka samu da kuma lalata irin karfin gwiwan da aka samu a duniyar musulmi, sannan kuma al'ummar musulmi su ci gaba da zama cikin wannan yanayi na koma baya da kuma ci gaba da mancewa da batutuwan da suka shafe su masu muhimmanci irin su ‘yantar da Palastinu da sauran al'ummar musulmi daga ‘yan siyasar Amurka da yahudawan sahyoniya.

en: He added: "During their long domination over Iran, satanic governments prevented the presence of Iran's Navy in regional and international waters, but today you should make up for the past backwardness by making intensified efforts."
ha: Jagoran ya ci gaba da cewa: Tsawon shekarun da hukumomin dagutu suka yi suna iko da kasar Iran sun hana sojojin ruwan Iran samun ci gaba da kuma kasantuwa a cikin Tekunan wannan yanki da ma na kasa da kasa, to amma a yau kan wajibi ne ku kara himma wajen cike gibin da aka samar tsawon wadannan shekaru.

en: And pretending not to be hostile towards Islam and other Muslims is a great lie and evil deception.
ha: Sannan kuma bayyanar da cewa ba sa adawa da Musulunci da kuma musulmi karya ce tsagoronta da kuma yaudara ta shaidanci.

en: In all these messages, the Leader mentions the evil plots of the arrogant powers to annihilate the Islamic Ummah.
ha: A cikin dukkanin wadannan sakonni an yi ishara da shaidanci da ma'abota girman kai na duniya suke yi wajen kawar da al'ummar musulmi da kuma dalilan irin danyen aikin da suke yi.

en: This is one issue.

en: The people in various public groupings can play a role with firm determination and with national willpower.

en: Monotheism and establishment of perfect sharia and justice - these are the goals and they cannot be changed.
ha: Tauhidi da tabbatar da shari'ar Musulunci a yanayi na gaba daya su din nan manufa ce, wadannan wasu abubuwa ne da ba za a iya sauya su ba.

en: It is a fact that throughout the world, armies are established and deployed with the slogan of safeguarding national interests, but is this really the case?
ha: Na'am a duniya ana ikirarin cewa an kafa sojoji ne da manufar kare manufofi na kasa, to amma shin a hakikanin gaskiya haka lamarin ya ke?

en: Dear people, honorable scholars, esteemed luminaries and young seminarians, you should know that today the responsibility of the clergy is heavier.

en: By making prayers obligatory, divine religions quench the thirst of human nature and save it from confusion and misguidance concerning the quenching of this thirst.

en: I welcome you honorable guests and I ask Almighty and Merciful God to bless this collective effort and make it an effective step towards happiness of Muslims. "Surely He listens and responds."

ha: Wannan zama dai, wani zama ne da ke da alaka da al'adu dari bisa dari; sannan kuma manufa ta farko na shirya irin wannan zama da kuma ganawa da ku ‘yan'uwa maza da mata masu girma, ita ce nuna godiya ta ga irin kokarin da jami'an dakunan karatu da masu kula da ayyukansu suke yi a duk fadin kasar nan, saboda ayyuka masu girma da suke yi kuma masu muhimmanci.

en: The Holy Quran says, "Say you: â€˜We believe in Allah, and the revelation given to us, and to Ibrahim, Isma'il, Isaac, Jacob, and the Tribes, and that given to Moses and Jesus, and that given to all prophets from their Lord'" [The Holy Quran, 2: 136].
ha: Alkur'ani yana fadin cewa: "Ka ce: Mun yi imani da Allah, da abin da aka saukar zuwa gare mu, da abin da aka saukar zuwa ga Ibrahim da Isma'il da Ishaka da Ya'akubu da Jikoki da abin da aka bai wa Musa da Isa, da abin da aka bai wa Annabawa...."

en: I hope Allah the Exalted will bestow His blessings on you dear people of Iran, on you dear government officials and on you faithful, spirited, active and talented youth. I hope God will help you benefit from the prayers of the Imam of the Age (may our souls be sacrificed for his sake).
ha: Ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da Ya sanya ku, ku din nan al'ummar Iran, jami'an gwamnati masu girma, ku din nan matasa masu imani da kyakkyawar ruhi da kuma kwarewa cikin tausayawa ta Ubangiji da kuma addu'oin mai girma Bakiyatullah (rayukanmu su zamanto fansa a gare shi).

en: After all, every person has his own strengths and weaknesses.

en: Basiji acquisition of knowledge, basiji accumulation of wealth, basiji diplomacy, basiji politics, basiji management, basiji organization - the concept of Basij can be extended to all these areas. The concept includes innovation and sincerity. Sincerity is the main pillar of basiji work.

en: Almost everywhere, clerics and theologians have been the intellectual authority and spiritual support for the people and wherever they have appeared in the role of guides and pioneers at the time of great developments and have moved forward in the first rows of popular movements in the face of dangers, the intellectual bond between them and the people has been strengthened and they have played a significant role in showing the path to the people. This is as beneficial to the wave of Islamic Awakening as it is unpleasant and distressing to the enemies of the Islamic Ummah, those who bear grudges against Islam and those who are opposed to the rule of Islamic values, and they are trying to take away this intellectual authority from religious strongholds and create new centers for it.
ha: A duk lokacin da aka sami faruwar wani sauyi, malaman sun taka rawar masu shiryarwa, haka nan kuma sun kasance a cikin sahu na mutane wajen fuskantar hatsari. Alaka ta tunani a tsakaninsu da mutane ta karu sannan kuma shiryarwarsu ta yi tasirin gaske wajen fahimtar da al'umma inda aka sa a gaba. Kamar yadda hakan ya zamanto mai albarka da kuma amfani ga yunkurin farkawa ta Musulunci, haka nan kuma suka zamanto babbar matsala ga makiyan al'umma da masu kulla makirce makirce ga Musulunci da kuma masu adawa da tabbatar da iko da hukuma ta Musulunci.

en: Since sixty years ago up until today, the occupation of Palestine has been the biggest tragedy that has been imposed on the Islamic Ummah.

en: Jihad against our inner selves is what we all need today.

en: Even if all the other conditions are met, it will be very difficult to achieve success and reach your goal in the absence of insight.
ha: Idan har aka samu dukkanin wadannan abubuwa, amma sai ya zamanto babu basira, to kuwa samun wannan nasarar lamari ne mai wahalar gaske.

en: Imam Ayatollah Seyed Ruhollah Musavi Khomeini (May 17, 1900 – June 3, 1989) was a Muslim cleric and Marja, and the political leader of the 1979 Islamic Revolution of Iran which overthrew Mohammad Reza Pahlavi, the last Shah of Iran.
ha: A ranar ashirin ga watan Jimada al-Thani 1320 hijira Kamariyya, wadda ta yi daidai da 30 ga watan Shahribar 1281 hijira shamsiyya (24 ga Satumba 1902 miladiyya) aka haifi wani jariri a garin Khumain, wani gari da ke lardin tsakiyana Iran.

en: I pray to Allah the Exalted to bestow success on the Iranian nation on this front and all other fronts.
ha: Ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da Ya ba wa al'ummar Iran dacewa a wannan fagen da kuma dukkanin fagage.

en: Imam (r.a.) spoke to the people through his heart and the people accepted his call with their heart and soul.
ha: Imam yana magana ne daga tsakiyar zuciyarsa, sannan su kuma mutane suka amsa masa wannan kira nasa da dukkanin abin da suka mallaka.

en: They acted directly or used the United Nations - which was under their control - to impose these sanctions.

en: And this gradual fall of western civilization is taking place. I do not think that this generation or the next generation will miss witnessing this.

ha: Ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da Ya tabbatar muku da kuma dukkanin al'ummar musulmi shiriya, taimako da kuma rahamarsa.

en: ...This sacred secret was nothing but the motivation and resolve to rise, and gradually people of Egypt cemented this thought in their mind and at a historical juncture they manifested their resolve and entered the arena in a magnificent show of their power.

en: But this was another precious experience for everyone so that we understand that establishing relations and speaking to the Americans will not have any effect on reducing their enmity."
ha: To amma dai hakan wata kwarewa ce mai matukar muhimmanci da aka samu.

en: What Imam Hussein (a.s.) did was an extraordinary feat.
ha: Wannan ita ce sadaukarwar da Imam Husaini (a.s) ya yi.

en: Therefore, it is not right to hand out the same punishment to everybody.
ha: A saboda haka babu yadda za a yi wa dukkaninsu hukumci guda.

en: Trust your young generation. Revive their feeling of self-confidence and benefit them by the experiences of the elders.
ha: Ku yarda da kuma dogara da matasanku, ku rayar da ruhin yarda da kai dake tattare da su, sannan kuma ku amfanar da su da irin kwarewar da kuke da ita.

en: There are great aspects to what is happening.
ha: Abin da a halin yanzu yake ci gaba da faruwa, yana da bangarori daban-daban.

en: Currently, we can witness the bullying and interference of America and some of its followers in the region in the countries in which the breeze of awakening has turned into the storm of uprisings and revolutions.
ha: A halin yanzu muna iya ganin tsoma baki da tursasawar da Amurka da wasu ‘yan amshin shatanta a wannan yankin suke yi cikin lamurran kasashen da iskar wannan farkawar ta kada ta kuma haifar da yunkuri da kuma juyin juya hali.

en: In spite of America's critical economic situation, the current US President spent hundreds of billions of dollars from the tax paid by US citizens in order to keep banks, arms companies and oil industries going. That is to say, he is spending the money that belongs to the American people on American companies and banks.
ha: Shi kansa wannan shugaban kasar Amurkan na yanzu ya yi amfani da biliyoyin dalolin mutane a irin wannan mummunan yanayi na tattalin arziki da Amurka take fama da shi don ya sake rayar da bankuna; don ya rayar da masana'antun makamai, don ya rayar da masana'antun mai; wato yayi hakan ne don rayar da kamfanoni.

en: Think tanks, backstage policy-makers and designers of global issues in powerful countries of the world - who have control over the majority of global media - do not want the dimensions of this crisis to be revealed to the people of the world, otherwise the dimensions of the crisis are far more serious than this.
ha: Cibiyoyi tunani da masu tsara musu siyasa a bayan fage, masu tsara abubuwan da ke gudana a manyan kasashen duniya - wadanda a mafi yawan lokuta kafafen watsa labarai ma suna hannunsu ne - lalle ba sa son ganin al'ummomin duniya sun fahimci hakikanin matsalar da suke ciki. Don kuwa bangarorin wannan matsalar sun fi abubuwan da suke fadi.

en: Sometimes stealing is from a particular individual and other times it is from a nation, which is more serious.
ha: A wani lokaci a kan saci kudi ne daga aljihun wani mutum guda, a wani wajen kuma daga aljihun wata al'umma ce; to wannan ya fi muni.

en: You should do profound work regarding logical issues, moral issues, historical issues and issues that are related to the Revolution.
ha: Wajibi ne ku gudanar da ayyuka masu zurfi a fagen lamurran da suka shafi sanin Allah, lamurran da suka shafi kyawawan halaye, dangane da lamurran da suka shafi tarihi da kuma lamurran da suka shafi juyin juya halin Musulunci.

en: Dear God, make the bond of kindness, brotherhood, friendship and closeness stronger among different organizations of the Armed Forces, including the Army, the Islamic Revolution's Guards Corps, Basij and the Police Force.
ha: Ya Ubangiji Allah! Ka sanya so da kauna da tausayawa da 'yan'uwantaka da fahimtar juna tsakanin dakarun kasar mu, kama da sojoji da dakarun kare juyin juya halin Musulunci da 'yan sanda da sauransu.

en: In Islamic democracy, Islam is the essence and the soul. There must be no deviations from Islam.
ha: A tsarin demokradiyya na Musulunci, tushe da asalin abubuwa daga Musulunci suke; bai kamata a yi kuskure cikin hakan ba.

en: One pillar of hajj is tawaf around the House of God.
ha: Idan har muka lura da tushen aikin hajji, daya daga cikin su shi ne dawafin Dakin Allah.

en: Our country has far too much potential to be considered a second rate country in the world.
ha: Wannan kasar dai tana da dama mai yawa da ta fi karfin a kira ta da sunan kasa mai daraja ta biyu a duniya.

en: If security was taken away from a nation, all paths of progress would be closed to that nation.
ha: Idan har aka kawar da tsaron da wata kasa da wata al'umma suke da shi, to kuwa za a rufe mata dukkanin kofofi na ci gaba.

en: Once again I would like to advise you to read history.
ha: A nan ma dai ina sake kiranku da ku karanta tarihi.

en: This is part of the effort to reform the norms of consumption, which I discussed with our people in this place two years ago. It is also part of economic jihad, which I discussed last year. National production is important and it must be the goal.
ha: A fagen amfani da kayayyakin da aka samar, mafi yawan aikin yana hannun mutane ne; wanda hakan wani bangare ne na gyara irin yadda ake amfani da albarkatun kasa da shekaru biyun da suka gabata a wannan wajen na kirayi al'ummar Iran zuwa gare shi sannan kuma wani bangare na jihadin karfafa tattalin arzikin da na yi magana a kansa a shekarar da ta gabata. Samar da kayayakin cikin gida lamari ne mai muhimmanci; wajibi ne mu sanya hakan ya zamanto ita ce munafarmu.

en: The people should know these things.
ha: Wajibi ne mutane su fahimci wadannan abubuwa.

en: Ayatollah Khamenei urged the youth to increase their insight and reflect upon realities, adding: "By Allah's favor, the youth of our country have an enthusiastic, influential and insightful presence in political, economic, scientific and technological arenas today."
ha: Yayin da yake sake kiran matasa din da suka kara irin basira da tunanin da suke da su, Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya ce: Alhamdu lillahi a yau kasantuwar matasanmu a fagagen siyasa, tattalin arziki, ilimi da fasaha, kasantuwa ce da take cike da nishadi wacce kuma ta ke yin tasiri sannan kuma ta kasance tare da basira.

en: Your ability to suppress your anger is a great virtue if you are an ordinary person and the scope of your anger is limited to a religious brother, a member of your family or one of your employees. "And those who restrain (their) anger and pardon men..." [The Holy Quran, 3: 134] But if you are in charge of something in society and you have a social position, if your words and actions and your approval and rejection affect your society, then your anger is not the same as the anger of an ordinary person.
ha: A wani lokaci a kan samu mutum ya zamanto wani mutum ne da aka saba da shi (wanda ba shi da wani nauyi na jama'a a wuyansa), to fushin da za ka yi ya shafi wani dan'uwanka cikin addini ne, ko kuma daya daga cikin iyalanka ko dangane da daya daga cikin ma'aikatan wajen aikinka ne - to hadiye fushi wani lamari ne mai kyaun gaske "Kuma masu hadiyewar fushi, kuma masu yafe wa mutane laifi(3)" a wani lokaci kuma ya kan zamana kai din nan wani jami'i ne, kana da wani matsayi; yunkurinka, tabbatarwa da kuma korewarka da kuma ayyukanka suna da tasiri cikin mutane; to a irin wannan yanayin fushinka ba fushi ne na wani mutum da ba shi da wani nauyi na al'umma a wuyansa ba.

en: All our people should be vigilant in this regard, young and old. We are always in need of advice, both when we are young and when we are old.
ha: Wajibi ne su kansu matasa su kula, haka nan su ma tsoffi. Mu ma dai a lokacin samartakanmu mun kasance muna da bukatar nasiha, to a halin yanzu ma dai da muka tsufa, muna bukatar nasiha.

en: Here each of you has the opportunity to become familiar with your Muslim brothers and their indigenous culture.
ha: Kowane guda daga cikinku yana da wannan dama ta ku hadu da 'ya'uwanku musulmi da samun masaniya kan al'adunsu.

en: These are valuable achievements.

en: Praying is a great blessing that provides us with the opportunity to talk to God and humbly prostrate before him several times a day. The same is true of the hajj.
ha: Wannan wata babbar ni'ima ce da a kowace rana za mu kama hanyar ganawa da Allah Madaukakin Sarki a lokuta daban-daban, tattaunawa da Allah Madaukakin Sarki, tawali'u da kankan da kai a gaban Allah Madaukakin Sarki, lalle wannan ni'ima ce mai girman gaske; wannan wata dama ce mai girman gaske; to shi ma aikin hajji haka yake.

en: Perfect and genuine faith is one that is accompanied by jihad in the arena of action.

en: Of course, my dear ones, there is a basic principle.
ha: Koda yake tabbas akwai tushe na asasi da aka tafi a kan su, Ya ku ‘yan'uwana!

en: I hope Allah the Exalted will bestow His grace and blessings on all of them, all of you and all those who made a contribution.
ha: Ina rokon Allah Madaukakin sarki da ya sanya su, ya sanya ku da dukkanin wadanda suka taimaka cikin tausayi da kuma kulawarsa. Wassalamu alaikum wa rahamatullah wa barakatuhu.

en: But what is happening today is unprecedented. These developments do not have a parallel. The events that happened in the 1960s - in Africa, in Latin America and in certain Asian countries - were often limited to one party or organization spreading its domination over the destiny of a nation with a material and Marxist orientation, a party or organization that lacked spirituality and divine elements.
ha: To amma abin da a halin yanzu yake faruwa, lamari ne da ba a taba ganin irin sa ba; wato lamari ne da ba shi da tamka. Abubuwan da suka faru a shekarun 1960 miladiyya - shin a Afirka ne ko kuma a Latin Amurka ko kuma a wasu daga cikin kasashen Asiya - abin da ya faru shi ne nasarar wata jam'iyya ko wata jama'a ce a kan makomar wata al'umma; da wata akida ta abin duniya da markisanci wanda babu Allah a cikin hakan.

en: The Iranian nation can move forward.
ha: Al'ummar Iran za ta iya ci gaba.

en: The future of the country is bright. The capacities of the country are extraordinary and unique.
ha: Makomar wannan kasar dai makoma ce mai kyau. irin karfi da albarkatun da kasar nan take da su abubuwa ne masu yawa.

en: Labor and capital are the two wings of national production.
